byas na/ /bag yod pa la gnas pa yi/ /rab byung 'bras bu bcas par 'byung / /gal te khyed cag rab 'byung zhing / /bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na ni/ /bram ze ral pa 'dir bregs te/ /bdag
cag rab tu 'byung bar bya/ /sems rtog rab tu mgu gyur nas/ /sor mo bcu yis thal sbyar te/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas/ /bram ze ri bos de gsol pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya
po| |'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni/ /thub chen rab tu 'byung ba dang / /bsnyen par rdzogs par thob par 'tshal/ /de nas ston par thugs rje can/ /drang srong chen po thugs brtse bas/ /dge
slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /de dag bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa mo'u 'gal dang / /dga' yod gnas brtan ka pi ni/ /spobs pa
rtogs par khong du chud/ /chu bo bzang po'i 'gram du ni/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du/ /spobs pa byang ba'i gnas brtan gyis/ /de dag la ni gdams ngag phog /der ni de las chos kyi
gtam/ /rjes su mthun par de shes nas/ /ring por ma thogs rnam grol te/ /dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod/ /de dag mthong thob bde gyur pas/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/ /sangs
rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la/ /rab tu mgu bas phyag byas so/ /dam pa'i chos dang tshogs gtso dang / /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang bged pa dang / /bag yod
pa la phyag byas so/ /de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa'am/ /bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /bkur sti byos la skyabs
su dengs/ /'di na de nyid gzigs pa yis/ /'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags/ /gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la/ /bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad/ /chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen//
sangs rgyas bstan pa chos kyi ni/ /bdag nyid chen po mchog gyur la/ /thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten/ /ke na'i bu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ ka shi'i tshong rdal du byon to/ /ka shi'i tshong rdal de na/ sngon 'breg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pha spad gnyis shig yod pa las/
bus smras pa/ pha/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge
'dun sku mnyel gyi/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drangs na/ de la ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam/ 'on te dge
slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/ des smras pa/ khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig/ nga ni/ thug pa sta gon byed do/ /des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so/ /

de yang me long zhig thogs nas/ tshong dus su song ba las/ des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/ des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di lta bu'i mkhyen
pa yang mnga' 'am/ des smras pa/ yod do/ /gal te mnga' na bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags
pa| bregs lags sam/ khyim bdag/ bregs zin to/ /de mgu nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas/ khyod mchog ci bzhed pa 'don to/ /des smras pa/ kho bos
sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nas thug la spyan drangs kyi/ nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ nas thug lta khyod la ci rung / bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod
pa dag dbul gyi/ bzhud la spyan drongs shig /nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas de song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod pa dag brim pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis bsam pa/ bdag cag
ngan pa la mgron du bos na/ kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes/ de rnams kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ngan pa la mgron du pos la/ kha zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ da la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag rigs dang mthun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bstan par mi
bya| rigs dang mthun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi bya'o/ /bsrel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sngon sman pa yin na/ gtsa' khab kyi snod bsrel ba dang / sngon yi ge pa yin na/ ram
phyis bsrel ba dang / bzo mkhan rab tu byung ba khab ral bsrel ba ni/ ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can
na srin bu bad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/ /sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig ste/
bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang
gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag/ bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na
bzhugs so/ /zhes thos kyi/ gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na/ gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur pas/ ye khrims shig
bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya zhing / bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar
bya'o/ /bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/ de la tshogs kyis kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do/ /de nas sdig can gyi gyad thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas
sdig can gyi gyad rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas gyad sna
chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni/ de nyid na 'dug pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan khyod dad par gyur tam ci/ des smras pa/ bdag dad par ma gyur mod kyi/
'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/ kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i
phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig/ btsun pa/ de lta lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni/ sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dad/ chos la ma lags/ dge
'dun la ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur pa de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan la gang thos pas gyad sna chen po la gtogs
pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las
langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad des gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge
slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 'od ldan/ nga sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs
zin to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang / ji ltar sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do/ /'od ldan/ gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na/ de
bzhin du ngas khyod la gnang ngo / /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ stan las langs te chas nas/
sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sdig can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag/ re zhig sdod cig/ bdag gis thog mar bcom
ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs
tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas/ kho bo cag mi nyan to/ /des
smras pa/ ji ste mi btub na/ bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo/ /de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ mi gnang ngo / /dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ shes
ldan dag/ 'di dad pa med pa zhig las/ 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dag 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo / /zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo / /de nas des g.yos mkhan
dag bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyi/ bca' ba gcig pu gang kho nas 'grangs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sta gon gyis shig/ des dri zhim po
sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa re res re re 'grangs par 'gyur pa'i bca' ba gang yin
pa dag byas so/ /de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya
ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang / btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod bas longs ma spyad do/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la bltas pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ gyad sna chen po
la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag cag bslus lags kyi/ bzhes shig /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang / de kho nas dge slong rnams 'grangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs pas/ sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to/ /nyi ma gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
dang | bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur spyon/ chos tshur spyon/ dge 'dun tshur spyon/ 'di dag snoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ kho bo la sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis
rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes smra na/ bdag gir mi bya'o/ /'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni/ khyod nyid lags so zhes smra na/ blang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin
du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes brjod par bya zhing / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes rgyas par
sbyar par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro khang la spyan drangs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pas ri zhes bya ba/
gzhon nu thor bu lang tshol bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa des bsam pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gang gis nyung du byin pa dang / gang gis mang du byin pa dang / gang gis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis
rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gsheg par brtsams pa las/
ji tsam na/ shing rul pa zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang / de dug gi shugs kyis brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing
bzhin yang gyur/ mig kyang gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yin/ gzhan dag
gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i sras mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi/ gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ nye du rnams kyis 'di la dpyad
byed pa zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa la dris la dpyad byos shig/ dge slong dag gis sman
pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman
pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams kyis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyod nyid kyi ston pa bcom
ldan 'das ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa kho na yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ zas sbyar ba ni/ lci ba dang / gcin dang / thal ba dang / sa'o/ /de la lci ba ni/ byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o/ /gcin yang de kho na'o/ /thal ba ni/ shing

lnga po/ kan tsa ni'i dang / ka pi da ka'i dang / a shwa tha'i dang / u dum wa ra'i dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o/ /sa ni/ sa las sor bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o/ /'di ni/ sbyar ba'i zas yin no/ /de nas dge
slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ri la zas sbyar ba byin na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ dge slong sa ri la srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
yongs su bzung ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/
mnyan te bgyi'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga le/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta

b+ha dre/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pA ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a nar+tha/ pra sha ma Ni/ sarba mang+ga la sA d+ha ni/ ma na se/ ma na se/ ma hA ma na se/ a ts+yud te/ ad b+hU te/ a da t+yed b+hU te/ mu ka te/ mo

tsa ni/ mo k+Sha ni/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a mri te/ a ma re/ a ma ra Ni/ brah+me/ brah+ma swa re/ pU ra Ne/ pUr+Na/ ma no ra the/ mu ka te/ dzI wa n+te/ sa ri'i gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams
cad pas srung sa shig swAhA/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slong sa ri la bde legs
su 'gyur bar byas pas/ dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang / gces spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lags so/ /dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das

pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang / gces spras byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri'i rgyal po
gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la/ rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te/ nyin mo bde legs su
gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te/ mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags/ 'dod pa rnams la zhen/
'chums/ brgyal/ myos/ rab tu rmongs/ rab tu brgyal te/ bag med pas nags kyi rma bya mor ba tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos
tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las/ ji tsam na/ ri'i ser ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de der yun ring du phyir rgol pa/ dgrar
gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya rnyis bzung ste/ de ni/ mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang / rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa rnyed nas/ rma bya chen mo'i rig pa 'di kho

na yid la byas so/ /'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mA r+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba
a nar+tha/ pra sha ma ni/ sarba mang+ga la sA d+ha ni/ ma na se/ ma na se/ mahA ma na se/ ad ts+yud te/ ad b+hu te/ ad t+yed b+hu te/ muka te/ mo tsa ni/ mok+Sha ni/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a
mri te/ a ma ra Ni/ brah+ma swa re/ pU ra Ne/ pUr+Na/ ma no ra the/ muka te/ dzI wa n+te/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig swAhA/ de rma bya'i rnyi chad nas bros so/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam

du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ nga yin te/ de na yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rigs sngags kyis phan pa dang / gces spras byas so/ /
da ltar na yang ngas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis pham pa dang / gces spras byas so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri la ji tsam pa bde legs su
'gyur ba bgyis pa la gzigs/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na/ sbrul sngags mkhan
zhig yod do/ /rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sprul gyis zin nas de shi ba dang / sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong sa ri yin no/ /sman gyi gzhi rdzogs so// //gos kyi gzhi'i
bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang / /de bzhin kha tshar ring po dang / /dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang / 'chi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang / /tha ma dag ni nad pa yin/ /bsdus
pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang / /dbyar gyi ras chen gding ba dang / /g.yon pa bde gshegs mon dar dang / /bal dang sha ma zar ma'i ras/ /sdom la/ dum bu
sa skyong seng ge dang / de bzhin yangs par song ba dang / /sems 'phrog drang srong sa 'tsho dang / /a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang / /tshong dpon chung ma rigs skyes dang / /sman pa yi ni
lung dang ni/ /rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang / /u dum wa ra gzhal ba dang / /bskyed dang rgyal chen skyed mos tshal/ /bcom brlag gyad dang bud med sbrul/ /ya mu na dang dur khrod
dang / /yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med/ /rgyal po'i khab bdun bzhi lnga dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /lus 'phags na rgyal bo 'phags skyes po zhes
bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa las/ blon po'i
mchog dum bus chos dang mthun par rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do/ /des na skyes pa'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor lta zhing 'dug go /des rigs
mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ /dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las
khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de yang rtse bar byed/
dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de ni/ seng ge zhes bya bar btags so/ /sa skyong dang / seng ge rim
gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang / blon po'i mchog dum bu ni/ thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa/ gnas lnga la byang ba yin te/ des na blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /
gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go /de nas blon po de rnams zil gyis non pas/ mi bzod pa skyes nas phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal
po'i drung du dong ngo / /de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gis brtag tu ci yod/ rgyal po lha yin mod/ gzhan
su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po ni/ dum pu lags kyi/ lha ma lags so/ /gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal
srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ des 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas/ des na dbyen byed do snyam mo/ /re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/
rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug pa dang / blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba brgya stong gis yongs su bskor nas rgya bo'i pho brang du zhugs te/
rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas 'dug go /gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir byung ba de'i tshe/ yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags snyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gang gi slad du snyan du gsol ba lha'i spyan sngar bab lags
mod/ gal te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las phyung nas/ rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/
rgyal po rnams ni/ khwa ltar khum 'phrig za ba yin pas/ des bsam pa/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o/ /snyam nas de de la klan ka tshol bar gyur to/ /
'jig rten na mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bar ma yod pas/ ji tsam na gzhan dag gis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gi /thabs legs par
soms shig /de rtog pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa/ gang du 'gro/ gal te mnyan yod du song na ni/ mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i mnga' ris yin pas/ nyen 'di nyid yod do/ /
de bzhin du wA ra NA si dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di yod do/ /yangs pa can ni/ tshogs kyi dbang yin te/ bcu dga' ba gang yin pa
de la ni/ nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur bas/ de yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas/ de yangs pa can gyis li tsa byi rnams la/ bdag ni/ khyed cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dug par 'dod do/ /
zhes pho nya btang ngo / /de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis lan spring pa/ yangs pa can 'dir byon pa legs kyi/ spyon cig /de nas blon po'i mchog dum bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/
shes ldan/ bdag ni/ yangs pa can du chas kyi/ khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba de dag ni/ 'dug cig /gang dag mi 'dod pa dag ni/ sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo / /ba lang
rdzi dang / phyug rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed cag gis ba lang dang / ma he yangs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ yangs pa can du 'dong gi /go gyon
cig /de nas skye bo'i tshogs ltar de sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ bgyi ba cung zhig mchis te/ skyed mos tshal du mchi
na/ gzigs su gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin bya'i/ songs shig /des skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas/ nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/ steng bza' ba dang / bcab pas g.yogs
nas song ngo / /blon po rnams kyis dum bu bros so/ /zhes bya ba thos nas de rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du dong nas smras pa/ lha/ dum bu ni/ bros so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dengs
la slar khug cig /de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas/ /bsnyegs te smras pa/ dum bu/ lhas bka' stsal gyi/ slar log cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'i dum bu shi 'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsam pa de/ tshegs chung dus grub kyi/ dengs shig /kho bo ni/ bros pa yin no/ /
de rnams rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas/ log ste rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ blon po'i mchog dum bu ni/ bros so/ /
rgyal pos ma legs so/ /snyam du bsam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na rigs gsum du gnas te/
rigs dang po na ni/ khang pa brtsegs ma bdun stong pa gam gser las byas so/ /ris bar ma na ni/ khang pa brtsegs ma khri bzhi stong ba gam dngul las byas so/ /ris tha ma na ni/ khang
pa brtsegs ma nyi khri chig stong ba gam zangs las byas pa ste/ de rnams na ni/ mi dam pa dang / bar ma dang / phal ba rnams ci rigs par gnas so/ /yangs pa can gyi tshogs gyis khrims su
bcas te bzhag pa ni/ ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni/ ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi/ bar mar ma yin/ tha mar ma yin no/ /bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni/ ris
dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do/ /tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni/ ris gsum char du gtong bar byed de/ bud med rnams ni/ yangs pa can ma gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing /
mi 'byin to/ /bud med rin po che ni/ su la yang mi gtong bar tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyad pa kho nar byed do/ /dum bu ni/ skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te/ ris dang por khang pa
byin nas/ de na gnas par brtsams pa las/ gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe/ de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/ de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu/ khyod ci'i phyir mi
'du/ des smras pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o/ /yangs pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu/ 'dus shig /'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / des 'dus
par brtsams nas blo gros ma byin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu/ blo gros byin cig /des smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na/ blo gros ni/ mi sbyin
no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig /'dir nyas dmigs ci zhig 'byung / de tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin to/ /sngon yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams gang su la yang
rung yi ge spring bar byed na/ rtsub po dang bcas par spring bar byed do/ /gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe/ 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do/ /gang dag la 'jam po dang
bcas pa'i yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po
dang bcas par byed par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyad par yod de/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/ de dag de'i blo gros
bzhin byed de/ des na/ da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do/ /dum bus sa skyong dang / seng ge khyim phub nas/ seng ge rtse bar byed/ dga'
bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ khye'u
zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ bu mtshan rdzogs pa
zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung
ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni/ gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyi/ de dag gi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya zhig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/
skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi mi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsa byi 'di dag ni/ gdug pa rtsal po
che yin pas/ 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gi/ 'di slar zlog cig /des de bkug nas smras pa/ bu/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni/ gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di dag gi skyed mos
tshal ma rung par ma bya zhig /de dag gis gnod pa byas sa re/ des smras pa/ yab/ 'di dag la ni/ skyed mos tshal mchis na/ bdag cag la ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ bu/ skyed mos tshal gyi
don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo/ /des tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyi/ bdag la skyed mos tshal zhig thugs dpag
mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /de rnams kyis de dag la skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed
du bcug go /gcig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na/ sa skyong dang / seng ge'i
shing sA la'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /zhes brjod do/ /sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas/ li tsa byi rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /
de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu/ khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par ri bor che ge mo zhig tu song la/ der rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug cig /de der
song nas rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta bya bar brtsams so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/ de rnams kyis blon po'i
mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa las/ des kyang dus thung du zhig tu chos dang mthun bas sde dpon byas nas shi'o/ /yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas/ su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces
byas pa dang / de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs pas na/ de nyid kyi bu gzhug go /kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa skyong ni/ gdug pa/ rtsal
po che zhig ste/ gal te sde dpon du bcug na/ gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni/ des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed
nus pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod na/ sde dpon du gzhug go /thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no/ /des smras pa/
sa skyong ni/ bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge/ sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'drang ba des
sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'dod na/ kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go/ des bsam pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na/ de ni/ ma 'os
pas ye bskur ro/ /snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring pa de la dum bu la sogs
pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri ba las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe/ seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
zhig na/ ri bor na sa skyong / rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri bor gang yin pa der spring pa 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste bklags nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan
dag/ sngon ni/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs/ dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri na/ da ni/ seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri na/ ci/ kho
bo'i pha shi'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shi'o/ /de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bo nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba ji ga rigs sam/ seng ges ji
ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsam pa/ bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas kyi/ rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o
snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo/ /zhes pho nya btang ngo / /des de la spring pa/ 'ongs pa legs kyi/ shog cig ces spring pa/ de rgyal
po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i
btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de/ sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de thugs mi dgyes
shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /lha/ thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho
phun sum tshogs pa/ lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni/ pha 'gum pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ gcig shos la ni/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar
'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan na/ lha'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o/ /de nas sa skyong gis seng ge
la spring ba/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ khyod kyi nye gos can tshur bkris shig dang / btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro/ /des de la yi ge'i lan spring pa/ gar
bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad kyi/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so/ /ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ yangs pa

can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtang ngo zhes bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bos de skyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang / khyod kyis khrid de songs shig /de

nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song ba las/ rim gyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srung zhig shi nas mi
ma yin pa rnams su skyes pa des/ yangs pa can pa rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni/ mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyi/ bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/ mgul bar dril sbyongs shig dang /
gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na/ bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa'am/ 'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrag bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs

brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go/ sa skyong gis seng ge la spring pa/ kho bo skyed
mos tshal na sdod kyi byung zhig/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/ nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyi/ rgyan rnams thogs la skyed
mos chal du phyung zhig/ de rgyan rnams 'dogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan rnams 'dogs/ kho mo bag mar btang ngo / /su zhig la/
rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o/ /des smras pa/ kho mo phu mo yin na/ khyod ci ste bag mar btang / gal te de ltar na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las
dril gyi sgra byung ngo / /yangs pa can gyi tshogs rod rod por gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so/ /seng ge dngangs pas nye gos can yin no/ /snyam nas/ gos

can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang dngangs pas gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo / /yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyegs nas/ de dang de rnams su lhan cig
'thab par brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas/ des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas khyod cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun
zin gyi/ lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyi/ slar dengs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ nged cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do/ /go phud cig/ de rnams kyis go phud pa dang / lnga
brgya sa la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni/ srin po yin no/ /snyam nas skrag ste bros so/ /yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/
shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi dgra 'di la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan glon du gzhug gi/ glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas gzhag go/
zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go/ sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can bobs shig/ des smras pa/ khu gu/ bdag ni/ nye gos can ma lags te/
bdag ni/ gos can lags so/ /khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras
pa| sa skyong 'ongs sam/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /lha/ bdag mchis lags so/ /nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha/ khrid de mchis kyang mchis la/ khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so/ /ci zhig
zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas/ gos can khrid de mchis so/ /blta'i/ khrid de shog cig/ de nang du khrid pa dang / rgyal pos lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa
mthong nas/ bud med kyi yul gyis 'phrog pas mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas
gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na/ da btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na/ lus
'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so/ /de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dwags
kyi phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan ba zhig gnas so/ /ji tsam na ri dwags mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhig/ drang srong
de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun to/ /de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan gzan gdug
pas kyang gzem par bya bar ri dwags skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsod dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha/ 'di su la g.yar
mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin na/ shes ldan dag/ rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha/ de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so/ /gal te de ltar na/ ngas
drang srong de yongs su spangs so/ /de gsad par brtsams te/ de gsod pa na/ smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis/ bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa bsad
par bkris/ gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni/ shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu srung pa/ shin tu btsas pa yin pas/ gal
te gzhan du skye ba blangs na/ lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyi/ rnam pa thams cad du bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig ces byas so/ /des smon lam
log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la khrag gi char bab bo/ /gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o/ /
bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis
smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ btsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal po sems khong du chud de 'dug nas 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar
'gyur snyam mo/ /mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha/ ras kyi bar stsang shas bltams par bgyis te gsol la/ nyid btsun mo la stob mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal
pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so/ /de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar
gyur to/ /yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o/ /bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas
khrag blud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang yang bral bar gyur te/ ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas te gang gis
nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char bab bo/ /rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bstan
bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku tshe dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ rnam pa
thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyi/ 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na/ ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na li
tsa byi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i skyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal yod pa las/ der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa/ kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong ngo / /de
ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ de srung du
gsol cig dang / dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par
gyur te/ skyed mos tshal der kun nas srung ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma bgrang pa la zhugs so/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / skyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma
dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang / rol
mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas/ skyed mos tshal de na de rtse bar byed/
dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa las/ chu shing gi sdong po gas nas/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas
ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni/ a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 'di'i ming a mra skyong

ma zhes bya'o/ /ji tsam na/ khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//

de slong ba'i phyir yul krung krung ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag
'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsam pa/ gang kho na la ma byin pa de dag kho na sdang bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pas/ re zhig tshogs la brtag go/ snyam nas/
des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de/ bdag gis
bsnun/ bsnyod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs rgyud dang 'tsham par 'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin na/ tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ sngon
tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che mi gtang ste/ tshogs kyis spyad do/ /zhes bcas pa yin gyi/ re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba zhig blta'i/ khrid de shog cig/ des de tshogs
kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad de kun tu brtag par brtsams nas smras pa/
khyim bdag/ 'di ni/ bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyi/ su la yang mi sbyin no/ /de nas khyim bdag ming chen/ yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas/ de 'gram pa
la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab/ ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo/ khyod bud med rin po che yin no/ /zhes tshogs
kyis spyad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs so/ /yab/ ci/ khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu mo/ sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni/ tshogs
kyis spyad do/ /zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do/ /des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa lnga zhig stsal
na| bdag tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa stsal pa dang / skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kaR+sha

pa Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang / bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag
pa'o/ /ming chen gyis/ a mra skyong ma'i 'phrin bzlas pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la/ ris dang po'i khang pa ni/ bud med rin po che
kho na la 'os so/ /gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ gcig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sha 'khon rnams las ni/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha 'khon tha chad
yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa dang gcig shos kyang nang du zhugs na/ gdon mi za bar gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro/ /nang du 'jug pa des kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs te
nang du 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang / rgyan du dgos so/ /zhag bdun lon pa dang khang pa byul bar bya'o/ /zhes gang smras pa de yang
bden te/ sngar ram/ phyis byas kyang rung / de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams kyis phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go/ zhes gang
smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad tshong ma yin pas/ gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa brtags na/ su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la
mchog lnga byin nas/ tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/ dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig
ni| yul la chags ches pa'i phyir mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni/ reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so/ /des
bsam pa/ 'di dag ni/ skyes pa ma yin gyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
gang na rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ phyug po'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong
ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags te/ dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di ni/ gang zhig /'di ni/ rgyal po
rab snang ngo / /gzhan 'di gang zhig /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo/ /gzhan 'di gang zhig /bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed do/ /gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
gzugs can snying po'o/ /des de bzhin dris pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so/ /de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas des
bsam pa/ skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas ni/ bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par nus snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir song nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ sus smad tshong ma ji lta bu mthong / sa
skyong gis smras pa/ lha/ re zhig gzhan lta zhog/ yangs pa can na smad tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba/ shin tu gzugs dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi 'tshal
ba| lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so/ /des smras pa/ sa skyong / gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong / de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do/ /des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi
rnams ni/ yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa/ slar rgol ba/ dgra bo lags pas/ khyod la gnod pa bgyid du mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mi rnams ni/ skyes bu'i dpa'
snying can yin pas 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ lha/ gal te don ma mchis pa la gtsigs che bar mdzad na/ gshegs mod/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan
cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa skyong ni/ skyed mos tshal na sdod do/ /rgyal po ni/ a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji
tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo / /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams rod rod por gyur nas shes ldan dag /bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal
ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ a mra skyong ma la dris pa/ bzang mo/ 'di ci zhig yin/ lha/ sdum par nyul bar bgyid do/ /ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i
slad du'o/ /ji ltar bya/ ci/ 'bros sam/ lha/ mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig/ lha/ dgung bdun lon dang / bdag gi sdum par nyul bar bgyid pas/ re zhig dgung bdun du rol bas
dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes rgur mdzod la dgung bdun lags dang / dus mkhyen par bgyi'o/ /de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji
tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/ lha/ bdag la sems can zhugs lags so/ /des de la seng ras shig dang /
sor gdub kyi rgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na/ khyod nyid kyi yin no/ /'on te khye'u yin na/ seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du
bkri zhig/ de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang / dril bu 'khrol bar 'dug go/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dgra bo byung gi /rjes
bzhin btsal lo/ /zhes li tsa byi skyon gor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyegs pa dang / sa skyong gis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ lha/
yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams mchi na/ lha/ ci/ 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi'am/ 'on te shing rta bda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni/ dub pas shing rta 'ded kyi/ khyod kho nas 'di dag
dang lhan cig 'thab mo khye zhig/ des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las/ yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyi/ slar ldog go/ de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te/ 'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang
gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon du gzhug go/ zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang la/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa
zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas zhes bya ba nas/ bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse
par byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig smras pa/ bran mo'i bu khyod/ brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni/ skyes na/ pha su yin/ des ngus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang / des
smras pa/ bu/ ci'i phyir du/ des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu/ gal te yang dris pa dang / nga'i pha lta bu ni/ khyed cag gcig la yang med do/ /zhes smros shig/
gal te su yin zhes smra na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no/ /zhes smros shig /ji tsam na/ de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du
smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu ni/ khyed cag gcig la yang med do/ /su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no/ /de rnams kyis/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi dgra
gang yin pa de ni/ 'di'i pha yin no/ /zhes lhag par yang brdegs so/ /des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni/
gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di gsod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo/ /de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang / tshong ba rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab
tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas thob la dengs shig dang / sho gam mi gcod par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la/ sor gdub kyi
rgya 'di/ 'di'i mgul du thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog cig/ de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so/ /bu la yang mu tig gi do shal zhig byin nas smras pa/ bu/ rgyal
po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus pa dang mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te pang du 'dug cig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go /zhes smras pa dang / de la
yang / bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig/ de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te sor gdub kyi rgya brtags nas
rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs te pang du 'dug go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
khye'u 'di ni/ 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go /des smras pa/ yab/ bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun du smras pas/ rgyal bu gzhon
nu 'jigs med/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi
bud med la lhag par chags pas/ glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i
khab na/ tshong dpon phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas zhes bya ba nas dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar
gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de bzhin du mdzod cig /de zong thogs te
yul gyi mthar song ngo / /de yang kha zas zhim po dang / gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas de'i khyim drung nas song ba
dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro/ /de nas rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog /des smras pa/ lha/ g.yar tsha lags kyi/ khyod nyid nang du
gshegs shig /de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur
nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ bdag ni/ sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras khra bo byin nas smras pa/ gal te re zhig
khye'ur gyur na/ seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du bkri zhig /'on te bu mo yin na ni/ khyod nyid kyi yin no/ zhes smras nas rgyal po song ngo / /ji
tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste/ rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas des chung ma la/ bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig /kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te zhag 'di tsam kho na na
phyin par 'ong ngo spring ba des thos nas/ bdag gis ni/ bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'ong na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyur nas/ des ji ltar gyur pa
rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar spring pa/ bag ma tsha bar 'dug cig /ji nas kyang myur du mi 'ong pa de ltar ngas bya'o/ /rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba/ ded
dpon/ nga la rin po che che ge mo dang / che ge mo dag cig dgos kyi/ de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig /de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo / /de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas
btsas pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /ma bslab kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas/ des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bsnyod nas sor
gdub kyi rgya mgul du btags te seng ras kyis dkris nas sgrom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyed kyis dkyil
'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig /des de bzhin du byas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzang
gi gzhir song nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dus pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me mthong ngo / /de nas zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ /shes ldan dag
rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me 'bar ba'o ni/ ci yin ltos shig /de dag gis bltas nas smras pa/ lha/ sgrom bu zhig mchis so/ /des smras pa/ longs shig /rgyal bu gzhon nu
'jigs med kyis smras pa/ lha/ sgrom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal par ci gnang / rgyal pos/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes khas blangs so/ /ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po
la phul ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kha phye zhig/ kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on te shi ba zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gson
lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de bsnun bsnyod bskyed do/ rgyal pos gson nam zhes
tshig tu byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grags so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos
chen por gyur to/ /de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo'i gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni/ ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyi/ bdag cag ni/
bzo cung zad bslab ste/ des na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gyon pa/ mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams
kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis mthong bas/ des rgyal po'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras
pa| shing rta mkhan lags so/ /'di ci 'thob/ 'tsho ba'o/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas shing rta mkhan bslab bo/ /snyam nas de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha/
bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab bo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab/ rgyal po'i bus ni/ bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so/ /bu/ gal
te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs shig /des bslab par brtsams so/ /'tsho byed kyis kyang sman ba gos dkar po gyon pa/ mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas
rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs par mthong nas des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so/ /de ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do/ /ci 'thob/ gal
te nad pa zhig sos na/ rngan pa 'thob bo/ /'on te gum na/ mi tshol mi 'dri'o/ /des bsam pa/ sman dpyad bslab bo/ /snyam nas/ de ba'i gan du song nas smras pa/
lha/ gnang bar mdzod cig /sman dpyad bslab lags so/ /bu/ khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no/ /khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha/ rgyal po'i bus ni/ bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba
lags so/ /bu/ gal te de lta na slobs shig /des sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad ni/ lobs na/ des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo
'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de/ /des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so/ /zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha/ rdo 'jog tu mchi'o/
ci zhig gi phyir/ de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bas de slob tu mchi'o/ /bu/ khyod 'dis 'tsho'am/ lha/ yang
na ni sman dpyad mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o/ /bu/ gal te de lta na songs shig /des rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po la spring pa/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes
kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gi /'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig /de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal
po'i bu 'di/ khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyi/ 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig /rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis khyad par dang bcas par
lobs so/ /rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe nad pa la bltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/ de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas/
des nad pa'i sman bstan pa/ 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo / /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ mkhan pos nyes te/ gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na/ 'di deng nyid 'chi
bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni/ legs pa ma yin gyi/ thabs shig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di
skad ces gsung ngo / /kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig zer ro/ /des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur to/ /ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun
shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ na ba ji ltar/ sos par gyur to/ /sang yang de nyid byin cig /ci/ snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci/ bdag gis sngar
bstan tam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to/ /'di ni/ 'tsho byed la 'phrin du spring pa yin no/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gis nyes
kyi/ 'tsho byed ni/ shes rab can yin no/ /snyam bsam nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig /rgyun shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba
skyes pas/ de gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byed khrid do/ /bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni/ spro bas ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag
cag la ni/ mi mdzad do/ /des smras pa/ 'tsho byed ni/ shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi/ khyod kyis ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /de rnams
kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lta na/ ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o/ /bla ma ze'i khye'u de rnams la/ khyod kyis ni/ rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig /
khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o/ /zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo / /'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis ji skad bstan pa
kho na bzhin byas so/ /'tsho byed kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsam pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gis ji skad brjod par bya'i/ thams
cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin 'dri'o snyam nas/ de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin smras so/ /rgyun shes kyi bus/ ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri
bar brtsams te bram ze'i khye'u/ rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa/ ma 'tshal lags so/ /'tsho byed la dris pa dang / des
rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so/ /ngas/ 'tsho byed ni/ shes rab can yin te/ cung zad bstan
na yang de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so/ /zhes smras pa ni/ don de yin no/ /gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o/ /zhes des de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la dengs la sman
ma yin pa dag khyer de shog cig /de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de/ de dag gis blangs so/ /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ sman ma yin pa ni/ cung

zad kyang med do snyam nas des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blangs so/ /ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis/ lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig /zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer
nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las/ de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa/ gang du 'gro/ des smras pa dang / des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa
las/ des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur to/ /de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud 'di khyed snoms shig /des phrum tshud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni/ de nyid la
byin nas de phrum tshud khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis/ lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i rjes shig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la brtag
par brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i rjes so/ /'di ni/ glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyi/ 'di ni/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig
g.yas pa zhar ba/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni/ bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho bca'i
bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no/ /ji tsam na/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /'di thams
cad ni/ sman yin te/ re zhig 'di ni/ che ge mo zhig gi nad che ge mo zhig yin la/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin no/ /'tsho byed la dris pa/ khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/
des smras pa/ mkhan po/ de thams cad sman lags te/ sman ma lags pa ni/ ci yang ma mchis so/ /'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / phrum tshud
cig 'tshal te mchis so/ /'di dag ci dgos/ sdig pas zin pa la 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/ phrum tshud kyis ni/ glan par bgyi'o/ /rdo'i dum bus ni/ ston
ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chags par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun shes kyi bu 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsam pa/ mkhan po ni/ 'di la khros so/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis smras pa/
mkhan po/ ci/ 'di gcig pur bas snyam mam/ bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas/ 'di ni/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig
g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni/ bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho
btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/ 'tsho byed/ bden nam/ mkhan po/ med do/ /de glang po che'i rjes sam/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras
pa| mkhan po/ bdag ni/ rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na/ ji ste mi 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni/ zlum po/ ba lang mo'i rjes ni/ chu ring ngo / /mig g.yas pa zhar
bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lags so/ /sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba lags so/ /deng kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji
ltar shes/ gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so/ /glang po che'i phru gu phor 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchis pas so/ /de
la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang ba'i bar du gcis pa las so/ /de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog
'thu zhing mchis pas so/ /de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so/ /deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ljan ljin
dang bcas te 'byung ba las so/ /de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/ mgron po gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i
khye'u zhig btang ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /khyod kyis thos sam/
'tsho byed ni/ de 'dra bar shes rab can yin no/ /'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslab bo/ /ji tsam na mi zhig klad nad kyis thebs nas rgyun
shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ re zhig de ring dong brkos la lci ba dag sta gyon gyis shig dang / sang bdag
gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o/ /'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje/ bdag gis cung zad bslab pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin
na| bdag gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslab kyi/ khyod kyis bdag dben pa zhig tu zhog cig dang / khyod kyis las ji ltar byed pa blta'o/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /des
de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go /de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du bcug ste thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas des skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams
pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ gzu lum du ma len cig /rigs kyi bu 'di deng nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan
po/ bdag mchis so/ /kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzad de/ rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang / de nas 'or cig /
des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur gyi/ khyod khrus byos la shog cig dang / klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad
sbyin no/ /des khrus byas nas 'ongs pa dang / des de la klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ bdag cag ni/ 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyi/ yul 'dir khyod kyis
ma bya zhig /mkhan po/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du song nas phyag byas nas bdag gis sman dpyad bslab
lags kyi/ mchi'o/ /de'i tshe rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob skya seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/ des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa
mtha' 'khob pa skya seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyi/ 'di ltar khyod ni/ shes rab can nus pa yin pas/ re zhig de phobs la phyis songs shig dang / de lta na/ bdag cag gis 'jig
rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro/ /des de la khas blangs pa dang / de nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/ de mtha' 'khob pa skya seng de rnams phabs nas/
gte'u bzung / dpya blangs te/ slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' nas/ de nyid la rjes su yi rang ste des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu
la byin no/ /de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas de nyid du dbyar gnas te/ de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas grong khyer
bzang byed nas chas pa dang / mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang pags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras
pa| kye nang rje/ ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na/ 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas
skabs su gyur to/ /de shing brtag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ci/ shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/ 'tshong ngo / /rin ji tsam/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya'o/ /des de nyos nas de nas
bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas/ de'i mthu ni/ 'di 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/ mar me khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin
du nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo / /de rim gyis yul u dum wa rar phyin pa dang / de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bos gzhal nas bre mgo la snun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/
kye nang rje/ ci'i phyir de ltar byed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya'o/ /tshur shog /blta'o/ /zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed

pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snang ngo / /de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod do/ /des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras
pa/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /des khas blangs so/ /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'di'i dpyad bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ re zhig /de ring
dong brkos la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig dang / sang dpyad bya'o/ /des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo / /'tsho byed kyis de'i phyi de nyin 'ongs nas de dong du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa dbye
ba'i dpyad kyis/ klad pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tsha bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg par byas te des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor

bas sos par gyur to/ /des de la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / yul ro hi ta ka na khyim
bdag cig la skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa las/ shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes so/ /de'i
bu ni/ khyim gyi dbon por gyur nas des skyed mos tshal der srung ma'i mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do/ /gnyis pa bzhag pa dang / de yang bsad nas khyim bdag gi bu des
skyes mos tshal de bor ro/ /ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig skyed mos tshal der song nas nub mo brang btab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o/ /bdag ni/ mi ma
yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug go /ji tsam na/ mi ma yin pa des/ dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i
nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gis sngar bzung na/ ci'i phyir 'di bsdig /khyod la ra spu'i dud pas bdug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni/ khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis su
'bros par 'gyur ro/ /des kyang slar smras pa/ khyod la yang la phug gi sa bon/ mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni/ khyod dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /

thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de nang par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/
khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ ra spu'i dud pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /khyim
bdag gis ra spu'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang / mi ma yin pa de dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to/ /khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun
shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu chu can la dris pa/ nang rje/ khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug /des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa
dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thung shig dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /des 'thungs pas sos par gyur te/ mi des kyang 'tsho byed la kaR+sha
pa Na lnga brgya byin no/ /des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag tu phyin nas/ bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung du ngal bso zhing 'dug go /ji
ltar na gyad kyis gyad brdabs pas de'i nang grol rnams su 'khrugs nas de shi'o/ /zhes phyi rol du phyung ngo / /shing de la yang bya rgod mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig
'dug pa las/ de la phru gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma/ sha byin cig /des smras pa/ bu/ sha ga la yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma/ gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs te/ shi nas phyung ba
yin no/ /bu/ 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs na/ des 'di sos par byed pa'i gnas de yod do/ /ma/ 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas
reg par byas na'o/ /de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so/ /de nas de langs te ro drung du song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gyad kyis gyad brdabs
pas shi ba yin no/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog cig dang / blta'o/ /de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad
par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nang grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ des smyug ma'i sbubs su phye ma blugs te khas bus pa dang / phye mas nang grol rnams la
reg nas sos par gyur to/ /des kyang 'tsho byed la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma
gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ shi nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur te/ de gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur
spyod pa de shi bar byed do/ /de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed do/ /des sman pa 'tsho byed der 'ongs so/ /zhes thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tsho byed
bdag la bro nad mchis kyi/ dpyad mdzod cig /'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas/ chags pas smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad
pa lta na/ dpyad bya'o/ /des smras pa/ g.yar tsha lags so/ /des smras pa/ khyod kyi dpyad gzhan ni/ med do/ /bdag las phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so/ /de nas des sgron mor
phyung ste/ bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas srin bu de de la chags pa dang / des de blangs nas bor te sos par gyur/ de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la

lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang / des rna ba gnyis bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do/ /des kyang de la kaR+sha pa

Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis chu bo ya mu na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des de na mi ro zhig yod pa de'i rting pa'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i breng
yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa dang 'dzum pa mthong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa dang / long mo la sogs
pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni/ de kho na ltar 'dug go /snyam nas de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad gcig thal mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags

pa dang / 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ des rting pa'i rgyus pa'i breng nas drangs pa dang slar tshud par gyur to/ /des de la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no/ /
yangs pa can na mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/ der de las phru gu bdun brgya byung bas de rna ba'i nad kyis nye bar gyur nas/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ dpyad
mdzod cig /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ sngar ni/ bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyi/ da ni/ rang gi blos las bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des mi de la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje/ song la lo
ma'i spyil po byos te ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig bzhag ste sa yang dron por gyis shig /des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byas so/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi de
sa la bsnyal nas/ sa de chus chag chag btab nas de nas rnga brdungs pa dang / srin gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo/ /snyam nas phyir byung ngo / /de nas 'tsho byed kyi rna ba'i drung du sha'i
dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te phru gu rnams khrid de byung nas phru gu rnams dang / lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i dum bu bor ba

dang / mi de sos par gyur to/ /des kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no/ /de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar
'ongs pa thos nas/ des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu/ khyod kyi phu bo 'ongs kyi/ bsur song shig /de bsur song ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar bsur 'ong ba
thos nas/ des bsam pa/ gal te bdag gis de bsu ba rang gir byas na ni/ nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de slar log ste sgo gzhan
zhig nas zhugs so/ /dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te sems g.yang zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na/ bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed
kyi drung du song ste/ bdag la sman ston cig /tshig pa zos nas smras pa/ thal bas thob cig /des drang po zhog pas/ thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to/ /mig nad kyis thebs pa
gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje/ gang du 'gro /des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/
des kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos shig /de yid ches par gyur nas des thal bas btab pa dang long bar gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can
snying po'i spyi bor phol mig byung ngo / /des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /sman pa rnams khug cig /blon po rnams kyis sman pa rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras
pa| shes ldan dag /nga'i spyi bor phol mig byung gi /dpyad byos shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis na/ bdag cag gis bgyi ba ci 'tshal/ rgyal
pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'tsho byed khug cig /de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ dpyad byos shig /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ lha/ dam zhig
bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /de nas 'tsho byed kyis skyu ru ras skud cing / smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab
ste| smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs te/ gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshe na ma tshor bar spu gris reg par byas pa dang rdol to/ /de nas 'tsho bar
'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / rma de sos shing pags pa 'dra ba dang skra yang mnyam par gyur to/ /
rgyal pos khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ dpyad byos shig /des smras pa/ lha/ re zhig bshos gsol cig /rgyal pos zan zos nas/ 'tsho byed/ dpyad byos shig /lha/ bgyis lags
so| |de yid ma ches nas lag pas byugs na/ phyogs gang na rma yod par ma shes so/ /me long blangs te bltas na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo / /btsun mo la dris na/ des kyang phyogs gang na rma
yod par ma shes so/ /rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig /mi long ba des smras pa/ lha/ ci/ sras
la byams pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur ba mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni/ sos par
ma bgyis so/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na/ sos par lta ga la byas/ des smras pa/ de ni mad na/ 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa
