des bdag la bstan to/ /ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la/ khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin gyi/ da 'di dang 'di dag byos shig
dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang / smras pa/ lha/ 'di sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ de glang po che la bskyon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen
pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/ /rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran nad kyis thebs nas sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang /
des bsam pa/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o/ /gal te dpyad cig byas na ni/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na/ bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas/
'tsho byed/ bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig /des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyi sman 'di ni/ rnyed par dka'o/ /des bsam pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na/ 'di la ci byar yod/
dus la bab kyi/ bdag ni/ 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo / /de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang / srog chags go d+ha tsan+dan zhes bya ba 'thab ste lhung
ba dang / de bkres pas nyen pas de gnyis ka zos te/ lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs nas/ dur khrod dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag lhas yod pa der
song ste/ ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs pas skran rdol to/ /yar slon/ mar 'khrus nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags ma'i 'doms
kyi phyogs su phol mig byung ngo / /des rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dpyad gyis shig /des khas blangs so/ /de nas zan byas te ma ma la
byin nas khyod kyis 'di'i steng du 'dug tu chug cig /des de 'dug tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsam pa/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na' snyam mo/ /de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i
rdzas dag btab ste/ smin par shes nas zan gyi nang du gtsags bu sbas te ma ma la bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug tu chug la btsun mo 'dug nas slar slong zhig /des de bzhin byas
pa las/ gtsags bus reg ma thag tu phol mig rdol bar gyur to/ /de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang bsres pa bska ba'i chus bkrus te 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos
par gyur to/ /'tsho byed rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ khyed kyis ma yar mo'i dpyad byas sam/ lha/ bgyis so/ /khyod kyis sgren mor phyung ste ma bltas grang /
lha/ ma bltas so/ /ji ltar byas/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/ 'tsho byed lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por
dbang skur cig /mi skran can la 'tsho byed kyis sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa des smras pa/ lha/ ci/ sras la sdug pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar
mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so/ /gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni/ sos par ma bgyis so/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ngas khyod la dpyad ni/ ma byas
kyi| 'on kyang ngas khyod kyi sman ni/ rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ gal te zla
ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya zhig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le gdug pa dang srog chags go d+ha tsan+dan na 'thab nas mer lhung ba dang de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/
dbang phyug chen po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs la/ ko dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/ de lta na khyod mod la sos par 'gyur te/
bdag gis de la bsam nas sman rnyed par dka'o/ /zhes smras pa yin no/ /des smras pa/ shin tu legs par shes te/ de bzhin du bdag gis zos so/ /de nas dga' bar gyur
nas smras pa/ lha/ 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po rngo thogs kyi/ dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsol/ lan gnyis su yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/ /gang gi tshe mi dge
ba'i grogs po lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra bslus nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe/ de la skran gyi nad kyis thebs par gyur to/ /des sman pa
rnams la smras pa/ nga la dpyad gyis shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ lha'i gcen po bla na med pa'i 'tsho byed 'di na mchis bzhin du/ bdag cag gis dpyad bgyid rngo ga la
thogs/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'tsho byed khug cig /de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / 'tsho byed/ nga la skran nad byung gi /dpyad byos shig /lha/ bgyi'o/ /des bsam
pa| rgyu gnyis kyis skran rdol bar 'gyur te/ lhag par dga' ba'am/ lhag par khros pas yin na/ sems can sdig pa 'di lhag par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyi/ rnam pa thams cad du
khros par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ lha/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol ba ltar na/ dpyad bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos thos nas khros te smras pa/
legs so/ /ngas ni/ pha srog dang phral/ khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog dang phrol/ nga yang rang nyid nad kyis shi nas khyod ni/ rgyal por 'gyur mod/ des smras pa/ lha/ dpyad
ni| 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis sos par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po/
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha/ gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad du gsol/ phyis gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de
nas de bstan nas/ khyim du khrid nas bzhag go /de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod ni/ shi ba'i ros stong
pa ma yin pas/ de nas des ro'i sha blangs te yo byad kyi khyad par dag dang g.yos byas nas rgyal po drol bab pa'i dus su bstabs so/ /de nas rgyal po ma
skyes dgras sha khu'i phor pa blangs nas za bar gzas pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis 'phrog nas klad du bsnun te/ sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pha chos kyi rgyal po srog dang phral la/ bu'i sha
yang za bar byed dam/ de rngams nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ ci'i phyir bsad ces mi bzod pa skyes pas de'i skran rdol nas yar slon/ mar 'khrus te kha nas khrag dang bcas par byung ba
de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/ /de nas chu gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang / khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i zas byin pas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas 'tsho
byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing khrid de rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di
lags te/ bdag srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi phod na/ gzhon nu lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/ bdag
gis thabs bshams par bgyis par bas so/ /rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig /blon po rnams
kyis glang po che la bskyon nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/ /des 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes te bdag dang mnyam pa'i
sman pa ni/ 'jig rten na 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni/ lus kyi dpyad byed pa rnams kyi mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /
snyam mo/ /des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba las/ de dregs pa'i snyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal
po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na/ ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/ dregs pa'i snyems pa las gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i dregs pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ ma mthong lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zungs shig /des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khrid nas/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga la ba der gshegs
pa dang / de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron me bzhin 'bar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'tsho byed/ sman ji tsam 'dod pa
longs shig /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jigs lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho
byed la srung ba byos shig /de dang song nas sman rnam pa sna tshogs dag blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ sman 'di'i ming ci yin/ des gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das che ge mo lags te/ cho ga 'dis nad che ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ che ge mo zhig lags te/ nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni/ ming
yang mi shes so/ /ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ 'di ni/ che ge mo ste/ cho ga che ge mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
ro| |'di yang che ge mo zhig ces bya'o/ /'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed
la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa/ yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni/ rgyal po la 'os pa/ rgyal po la mkho ba/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro'o// //
'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gnyis pa/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa yin/ nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/ nad byung ba spong
ba la mkhas pa yin/ spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni/ 'di lta bu dang /
'di lta bu yin no zhes de ltar nad la mkhas pa yin no/ /nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni/ rlung gis kun
nas bslang ba'am/ 'khris pas kun nas bslang ba'am/ bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba'am/ bdag las gyur pa'am/ gzhan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'o/ /zhes
de ltar nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni/ mig sman nam/ bsku
mnye'am/ skyug sman nam/ bkru sman nam/ snar blugs pa'am/ du bas bdug pa'am/ nan rtsi'i las kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de ltar nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin
no| |nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni/ 'phrod pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu dang / 'di lta bu dag byas te spangs
na| phyis mi 'byung ngo / /zhes de ltar nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar na/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa yin/ rgyal
po la mkho ba yin/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan
lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang / sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /'tsho byed/ bzhi gang dag ce na/ 'di la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas ni/ 'di ni/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ni/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni/ sdug bsngal
'gog pa'o/ /'di ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'tsho byed/ sman pa zug rngu 'byin
pas ni/ skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spong ba'i sman mi shes so/ /rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spong ba'i sman mi shes so/ /'tsho byed/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ skye ba'i skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams
spong ba'i sman mkhyen to/ /rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug
bsngal rnams spong ba'i sman mkhyen to/ /de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba
dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba
dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la
skyabs su mchi na/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sman pa'i rgyal
po 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha bas g.yogs te rtag tu lhags pa
che bas/ bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyis snyun gyis thebs pa dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba
bzhin/ bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ut+pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phul
te| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnams pa las thang sum cu gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ga legs par khrus legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod de/ 'khrus
la ma g.yos pa yang yod/ 'khrus la g.yas pa yang yod/ ma 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod do/ /'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de lta na bu ram
dang / a ru ra gsol la khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad nas snyun gdangs par gyur to/ /'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po'am/ blon
po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/ des de la grong ngam/ grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ /'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i dpyad byas
pa las/ des de la brgya stong ri pa'i gos be'u ras yug po che zhig byin pa dang / des de blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa/ bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad bgyis kyang rung ste/ des bdag la grong ngam/ grong mchog stsol ba lags pas/ bdag gis lus 'phags kyi
rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang / des bdag la brgya stong ri ba'i ras shig stsal ba 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse
bas nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che bzhes so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che longs la pa'i ched du gris dros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal la yangs
par song nas gzhal bar brtsams pa las/ chos gos mang du ldang par mthong ngo / /de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang / bdag
nyid kyi bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ras chung dpung chad cig byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der ras lnga brgya brnyes
shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig rnyed na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gris dras te kha dog ngan par byas pa bcang bar bya'o/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying
po'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yin no/ /de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ ji tsam na lam gyi dbus nas 'tsho ba pa zhig mthong nas de de la gus pa bskyed de/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs so/ /de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsam pa/ lha dge slong 'ba' zhig la mngon par dad pa ma yin no/ /dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis bsam pa ni/
gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/ de gus pas glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so snyam nas/ de rnams yid gnyis su gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ su
la phyag bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o/ /lha/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma lags te/ 'tsho ba pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di snyam
du sems te/ bdag gis don 'di kho na gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi kun
tu spyod pa ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las/ de ring bdag gus pa skyes nas glang po che las babs te
dge slong lags snyam nas 'tsho ba pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyi/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan
ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'tsho ba pa gang gis bden pa mthong ba las phyag bdag gir byas pa ni nyams te/ mi rung ngo / /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom
ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi ri bo mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ ma mthong lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zungs shig/ des bzung
ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la gshegs nas lus 'phags kyi ri bo la
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyi zhing / mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam pa/ rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel cing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam la rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel bar mdzes pa de dag
mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras te drub par bya'o/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bos
dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dros la drubs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams na/ snam bu rnams kha phyogs
gcig tu bstan pas mi mdzes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal mod kyi/ 'di kho nas rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas
de yod do/ /snyam nas/ des snam bu rnams kha phyogs gnyis kar bstan na/ 'on kyang mtha' skor med pas mdzes par ma gyur nas/ mtha' skor byas so/ /de nas byas shing zin pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ngas gang gi phyir bka' stsal pa de khyod kyis shes te/ de lta bas
na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras la drub par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas lhag ma ni/ ma dras so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ 'brog gnas su byon nas 'brog gnas na 'brog gnas kyi tshal na bzhugs so/ /'brog gnas 'bab chu dang nye
bas grang zhing rlung ldang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to/ /thun bar ma la bla gos gsol to/ /thun tha ma la tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga la snam sbyar gyis g.yogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lag pa gnyis bkrus nas snam sbyar gyis
bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad do/ /de nas nam nangs nas dgongs pa/ 'jig
rten na shin tu skyid pa/ bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa su yang rung / de rnams kyi mchog ni/ nga yin te/ nga yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tsho bar spyod na/ nga'i nyan thos rnams lta
smos kyang ci dgos snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong zhig la chos gos gsum pa med nas des phying pa zhig rnyed nas des dra bar
brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs nas smras pa/ dge slong / 'di ci yin/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos
gsum pa bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ bdag la chos gos gsum pa ma mchis nas btsal ba las/ bdag gis phying pa 'di rnyed de dras nas chos gos bgyi'o/ /dge slong / 'di
ni/ dra ba'i 'os ma yin no/ /'on kyang lhan thabs kyis glan pa'i 'os yin pas lhan thabs kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge
'dun bsdus nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la chos gos med nas phying pa la 'dra bar byed kyi/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ mi 'dra ba ni/ lnga ste/ phying pa thams cad dang / snam bu thams cad dang / be'u
ras thams cad dang / seng ras thams cad dang / klam thams cad de/ lhan thabs kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o// //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /ko sa
la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin ces bya ba des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par
byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u zhig btsas so/ /zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du khye'u bdun btsas te/ de la drug gi ming ni/ ci dga'
bar btags so/ /tha chung gang yin pa de'i ming ni/ sa ga zhes bya bar btags so/ /ji tsam na/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi chung ma shi nas/ des bu drug gi khyim phub pa
dang / de rnams rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems par 'dug go/ khyim bdag ri dwags 'dzin 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong
du chud cing 'dug go/ de'i 'grogs bshes bram ze zhig yod pa de 'ongs nas des de sems khong du chud pa mthong nas des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/ bdag gi bu 'di
dag rang rang gi chung ma dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems par 'dug pas khyim zhig par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ ci'i phyir sa ga khyim mi dbugs/ gal te na yang
lhag par phung krol byed kyang sus shes/ gal te na 'di lhag par legs par byed kyang sus shes/ gal te khyod dad na/ bu mo zhig btsal lo/ /de bzhin du gyis shig/ de tshol zhing
rim gyis yul tsam par phyin to/ /tsam pa na khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i bu mo sa ga ma zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ dar la bab pa/ tshul dang dul
ba dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa/ g.yer ba zhig yod pa de/ bu mo yid 'phrog ma gang 'dod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir chas pa dang / bram ze de yang phyogs der
phyin te/ des bu mo rnams mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ 'di rnams kho na la re zhig brtag par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de brtag pa lhur len cing dal bus 'jab cing de rnams kyi phyi bzhin du
song ngo / /bud med ni/ phal cher yang ba'i rang bzhin yin pas/ de rnams las kha cig ni/ bang rgyug/ kha cig ni/ mchong bar byed/ kha cig ni/ 'gre/ kha cig ni/ rgod/ kha cig ni/ lus
sgyur bar byed/ kha cig ni/ glu len par byed de/ 'di dag dang / gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa dag byed do/ /dul ba phun sum tshogs pa de ni/ gom pa dal gyis de dag dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o//
ji tsam na/ skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang / bu mo de rnams ni/ rdzing gi 'gram du gos rnams bzhag nas mod la zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/ /de ni/ ji tsam ji tsam chur nub pa de tsam
de tsam du gos dag brdze zhing 'jug la/ ji tsam ji tsam ldang ba de tsam du gos dag 'bebs shing ldang ste/ de lta bur spyod lam zhi ba yin no/ /de nas khrus kyi brtson pa byas nas gnas
gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bu mo de rnams ni/ thog mar rang zas zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la sbyin par rtsom mo/ /de ni/ 'khor gyi skye bo la sngar byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar
rtsom mo/ /de nas zos shing 'thungs nas skyed mos tshal gyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas dong ngo / /ji tsam na/ lam gar chu rgal bar byed pa na/ bu mo de rnams ni/ mchil lham
rnams phud nas brgal lo/ /de ni/ mchil lham dang bcas pas dong ngo / /de dag kun dga'i ra par zhugs pa dang / des ni/ gdugs thogs te a mra'i tshal
du byung ngo / /gzhan dag gis gdugs rnams bor ro/ /de nas rlung dang char bab nas de'i tshe bu mo rnams lha khang du zhugs nas 'dug go/ /de ni/ bla gab med pa na'o/ /bram ze de yang
de'i rjes bzhin du song ba las/ des de'i mtshan nyid dang spyod tshul de lta bu mthong nas de nas ngo mtshar skyes te bu mo de la dri bar brtsams pa/ bu mo/ khyod su'i/ stobs kyi bshes gnyen
gyi bu mo'o/ /bu mo/ khyod la cung zad cig 'dri'i/ ma khro zhig /des 'dzum pa sngon du btang nas smras pa/ khu gu/ 'di la khror ci mchis/ dris shig/ bu mo/ 'di dag thams cad
ni| rgyug pa dang / mchong pa dang / 'gre ba dang / lus sgyur bar byed pa dang / glu len par byed cing / 'di dag dang / gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa byed cing 'gro na/ khyod ni/ tshul dang
dul ba phun sum tshogs pas dal bus rgyu zhing / de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bu mo thams cad ni/ pha dang mas btsong pa'i rdzas yin na/ gal
te bdag gis mchong ngam 'gres nas rkang pa'am/ lag pa chag par gyur na/ bdag la su zhig slong bar 'gyur te/ nges par bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du pha dang / ma kho na'i gson
par 'gyur ro/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de ni/ khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ gos rnams mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas gos gcig kyang med par mod la zhugs
nas rtse bar rtsom la/ khyod ni/ ji tsam ji tsam chur nub pa de tsam de tsam du gos brdze bar byed do/ /khu gu/ bu med ni/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan par bya dgos phas/ gal
te bdag gis gos phud pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong na/ mi rigs par 'gyur ro/ /bu mo/ khyod la de na su zhig lta/ khu gu/ re zhig khyod kho nas kyang bdag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo/
legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ rang sngar zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la zan sbyin par byed la/ khyod ni/ 'khor gyi skye bo
la sngar zan byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar byed do/ /khu gu/ bdag cag ni/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho bas bdag cag la rtag tu dus ston mchis la/ 'di dag ni/ tshegs
'byung ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas/ brgya lam na lan 'ga' rgya chen po 'thob pa'i phyir ro/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ 'jig rten
thams cad ni/ skam la mchil lham gyon la/ khyod ni/ chu la gyon pa de ci/ khu gu/ 'jig rten blun mod/ chu kho na la mchil lham bgo 'tshal te/ ci'i slad du zhe na/ thang la sdong
dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo ba dang / zug rdo dang / nya phyis kyi dum bu dang / srin kog gi dum bu rnams mngon la/ chu la ni/ de dag mi mngon pas des na/ chu kho na la
mchil lham bgo bar bgyi'i/ thang la ni/ ma lags so/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo de dag ni/ nyi ma la gdugs thogs na/ khyod
ni| kun dga'i ra ba'i shing gi grib ma la thogs par byed na/ 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod/ khu gu/ 'jig rten blun mod/ kun dga'i ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang 'tshal te/ de ci'i slad
du zhe na/ kun dga'i ra ba ni/ rtag tu spre'u dang bya rnams kyis gang bas/ bya rnams ni/ gcin rtug 'thor zhing rus pa'i dum bu dag 'thor ro/ /spre'u rnams kyang bshang ba dang gci
ba byed cing / 'bras bu'i za 'phro dag 'thor bar byed la/ rang bzhin gyis rgod bag can yin pas phan tshun yal ga gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na/ shing dum dag ltung bar byed
do| |bla gab ma mchis pa la ni/ de dag ma mchis so/ /brgya la mchis na yang de res 'ga' zhig 'bab par bas te/ des na/ kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang bar bgyi'i
bla gab ma mchis par ni ma lags so/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ rlung dang char pa byung na/ lha khang du
'jug na/ khyod ni/ bla gab med par 'dug go/ khu gu/ bla gab ma mchis pa kho nar gnas par bgyi'i/ lha khang du 'jug par ni/ ma lags so/ /bu mo/ 'di la rigs pa ci yod
khu gu/ lha khang stong pa 'di dag ni/ rtag tu dwa dang / nal phrug dang / g.yon can rnams kyis mi stong lags te/ gal te bdag zhugs pa'i yan lag dang / nyid lag dag la
'ga' zhig gis reg na/ de lta na/ bdag gi pha ma dag la mi snyan par mi 'gyur ram/ nyis na/ bla gab med par srog dang bral ba ni/ bla'i/ lha khang stong par mi 'jug go /de
nas bram ze de/ de'i spyod tshul gyis rangs shing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen gyi khyim du zhugs te bu mo thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang bcas pas bde
legs su gyur cig/ bde legs su gyur cig ces smra ba dang / khyim 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa/ bram ze/ re zhig bslang ba'i dus ni/ ma yin na/ ci zhig slong / bu mo slong
ngo| |su zhig gi ched du/ mnyan yod na blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu sa ga zhes bya ba'i 'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ de dang / bdag cag ni/ rigs mnyam
pa yin na/ 'on kyang yul ha cang yang thag ring ches so/ /des smras pa/ ring po kho na la bu mo sbyin par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye na re zhig gal te bde bar gyur pa thos pa
na| dga' ba bskyed par zad/ nye na sdug bsngal bar gyur na/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya bas dub par 'gyur zhing / nor 'ged
bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na sbyin no/ /de nas bram ze de/ bde legs su gyur cig ces smras nas song ste rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam
gyis dub pa bsal te/ blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin gyi drung du song nas de nas bu mo'i za ba dang / gnas pa'i spyod tshul dang / gzugs bzang zhing dar la bab pa dang / mdzes
pa dang / mkhas pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyad nas smras pa/ bdag gis nyon mongs pa chen pos yul dang / tshong rdal sna tshogs su rgyus pas sdug bsngal gyis de rnyed kyi/ da ni/
song la longs shig/ de nas blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin gyis nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dag bstun nas tsam par 'ongs te/ dpal gyi 'byor
pa chen pos sa ga'i chung ma blangs so/ /de mi yul du 'gro ba'i tshe mas bslab pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la rtag tu phyag bya/ me la bsnyen bkur bya/ me long dri
ma 'phyi bar bya/ gos dkar po bgo bar bya/ blang bar bya'i/ sbyin par mi bya/ tshig bsrung bar bya/ langs nas su la yang stan bstab par mi bya/ zhim po bza' bar bya/ bde
bar nyal bar bya/ them skas gzugs par bya'o/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis thos nas/ des bsam pa/ bu mo 'di lta ba log par 'dzin du bcug ste/ bdag gis 'di lta ba log pa
dang phral la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin du gzhug go/ snyam du bsam nas de blangs te chas so/ /de nas de'i ma sdug pas snying dkrugs shing mig mchi mas gang bas mgul nas 'khyud nas
ngu bzhin gyi nga ros smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod mthong ba'i tha ma ni/ 'di yin no/ /des de la shes par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/ yum/ re zhig khyod 'dir 'khrungs sam/ 'on te nye du'i khyim du/ bu mo/
nye du'i khyim du'o/ /khyod kyi khang pa de yin nam/ 'on te 'di yin/ 'di yin no/ /bdag kyang 'dir skyes la der bdag gnas par gsal/ 'du ba mchis na gdon mi za bar mtha' 'bral
bar 'gyur na/ bshums su ci mchis/ cang ma gsungs shig/ de nas ri dwags 'dzin ni/ thang la song ngo / /sa ga ma ni/ khyim thab dang / rang gi khyim nas thob pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo
dang lhan cig tu grur dong ba las/ de na rgod ma rte'u smad byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig grur gzhug par byas pa dang / rte'u thang la mi rga'o snyam nas bsgrims kyang 'jug tu ma btub
pa dang / ku co byung ba sa ga mas thos nas des smras pa/ ci'i phyir ku co 'di byung / de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ rte'u sngar chu gcig dang
rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis de bzhin byas pa dang zhugs so/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis de rnams la dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyed cag
ring zhig lon nas 'ongs/ rta rgod ma grur mchong du ma btub pas so/ /'o na ji ltar mchong / tsam pa mas thabs bshams pa zhig bstan te rte'u sngar bcug pas so/ /tsam
pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /ji tsam na mgron po rnams lam gar nub mo brang btab ste gnas pa la ri dwags 'dzin gyi mal bya skyibs shig tu bcas pa sa ga mas mthong nas
dris pa/ 'di su'i mal/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi'o/ /spos shig/ ci'i phyir/ gal te gnyid kyis log pa la bya skyibs steng du rdib na gdon mi za bar non pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/
bdag la gang zhig blangs na gyos po khyim du ma phyin par lam gar shi ba 'di lta bu'i bu mo bag mar blang zhes ji srid 'tsho'i bar mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mal de yang
spos pa las gad pa zhig pa dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos khyim bdag non to zhes kun tu brgyugs pa dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag 'di na 'dug gi/
ma skrag par mal rtogs shig/ mal spos so/ /sus/ sa ga mas so/ /tsam pa ma ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /yang skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig tu nub mo brang btab ste 'khod pa
las/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi mal lha khang stong pa zhig tu bcas pa sa ga mas mthong nas dris pa/ 'di su'i mal/ dpon po'i 'o/ /spos shig/ ci'i phyir/ gal te lha khang rdib ste de non na
shi bar 'gyur te/ bdag la zhes bya ba nas mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du'o/ /mal de yang spos pa las/ lha khang zhig pa dang skye bo'i tshogs chen
pos brgyugs pa dang zhes bya ba nas tsam pa ma ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa bsal te/
mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen gyi skye bo spras nas sa ga ma rang gi rigs dang 'tsham pa'i khyim gyi las dag byed do/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi mna' ma drug gis res mos res mos su khyim
mi'i zan sbyor ba las/ sa ga ma la yang de bzhin du bsgo ste/ khyod kyi res kyang zhag bdun pa la sbyor cig/ de'i res la 'bab tu nye ba dang / gyos po dang / sgyug mo dang / khyim bdag
rnams kyi dri'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ril bur byas nas nyi ma re re zhing bskams so/ /nyi ma re re zhing nod pa'i phye gang yin pa de las kyang pre kha phri ste bzhag la/ lhag ma mar dang bsres
pas de dang tshad mnyam par gyur to/ /sang lta bu res bab pa na/ chang btung la reg par bya ba dang / khyim thab dang rang gi me tog gi phreng ba rnying pa gang yin pa de dag bsil bar bzhag nas
ji tsam na nam langs pa dang / las byed pa rnams la sgyu rtsi dang / dri dang / me tog dang / zas dang / chang dag byin no/ /de rnams shin tu mgu nas bdag cag ring
zhig lon nas khyim bdag gi chung ma rnying pas bzhin bltas so/ /zhes de rnams kyis de'i nyin par las nyis 'gyur du byas so/ /ji tsam na/ ri dwags 'dzin gyis phyi dro'i dus su las kyi
mtha' la bltas pa na/ las mang du zin pa mthong nas des dris pa/ ci/ khyed cag gis gla mi gzhan dag cig bkug gam/ sus kyang ma bkug go/ gang gis na/ las nyis 'gyur du
byas pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dpon po/ zas ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i las bgyid do/ /de ji lta bu yin/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgya cher smras pa dang / ri dwags
'dzin gyi bu rnams kyis rang rang gi chung ma la smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sa ga mas ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du gal te bdag cag gis kyang khyim nas brkus la gla mi
rnams dga' bar bgyis pa dang / bdag la yang jo bo dang / khyed gla mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis sa ga ma la dris pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis kha zas rnams
ji ltar bshams/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / ri dwags 'dzin mgu nas/ des de kho na khyim gyi bya ba rnams byed du bcug ste/ nang mi thams cad la smras pa/ khyed cag las gang
zhig sa ga mas byin pas mgu ba ni/ des gnas par gyis la/ de dang rjes su mthun par yang gyis shig/ ji tsam na/ khyim gyi dpon mor gyur nas spyod tshul dang / gnas pa dang / des
pas nang mi thams cad dga' bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ sa ga ma'i khyim steng nas ngang pa rnams kyis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu dag
khyer nas dong pa las/ rgyal po'i khab na 'dug pa'i ngang pas de dag mthong nas skad phyung ba dang / de rnams kyis kyang skye gnas mthun pa'i gcugs pas brnag ma thub ste skad phyung ba dang /

rgyal po'i khab kyi khang thog tu 'bras kyi snye ma rnams lhung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la re re byin pa dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyis rang gi skal ba sa ga ma la byin no/ /des za ma
tog gi nang du bcug ste zhing pa rnams la bsgo ba dang / de rnams kyang shin tu mgu ste/ de rnams kyis zhing chung ngu zhig legs par bstan nas dus shes par byas te btab pa dang / lhas
dus bzhin du char phab pas sa bon dang mthun par phun sum tshogs par skyes so/ /phyi de lo la rab tu mang po skye bar gyur to/ /yang phyi de lo la ni/ de bas kyang mang por gyur te/ de bzhin
du ji tsam na/ bang ba thams cad ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras sA lus gang bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na/ ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nad kyis thebs nas des sman pa rnams bkug ste
dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gal te ngang pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu rnyed na/ de la 'jam bsgral nas gsol cig dang / sos par 'gyur
lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed la ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu'i snye ma byin pa de dag khyed kyis ci byas/ de na kha cig gis smras
pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis ni/ lha khang du phul lo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis me'i nang du stsal to/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis sgo gang du btags
so| |ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis sa ga ma la stsal na/ re zhig des cir bgyis/ rma bar 'tshal lo/ /des sa ga ma la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ jo bo/ ci/ ngang
pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu 'tshal ba zhig mchis sam/ rgyal po snyun gyis thebs pa la sman pa rnams kyis ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu bstan to/ /de nas sa ga mas gser
snod kyi nang du ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras kyis bkang nas rgyal po la bskur ba las/ rgyal pos zos nas sos par gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po la ljongs kyi mi rnams
kyis rta rgod ma ma smad gnyis shig phul ba las/ de la ma ni/ gang yin/ rte'u ni/ gang yin pa 'gas kyang ma shes nas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/
legs par rtogs la nga la gsol cig/ blon po rnams kyis nyin thog thag tu dpyad na/ dub ste gtan la ma phebs so/ /ri dwags 'dzin ni/ phyi dro khyim du song ba dang sa ga mas rkang pa gnyis
la gtugs nas smras pa/ jo bo/ ci ste de ring ring zhig lon nas gshegs/ des ji ltar gyur ba rnams rgyas par smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/
de gnyis chas mnyam par stsal dang / bu gang lags pa de ni/ myur du 'tshal nas ma'i skal pa la 'tshal lo/ /ma gang lags pa de ni/ mi 'tshal par mgo steg ge mchis te/ rtags ni/ de
lags so/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras nas/ de rnams kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin brtags nas/ de nas nam nangs pa dang rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ ma lags
so| |'di ni/ bu lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gis ji ltar shes/ lha/ 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu lags so/ /khar tsang ci ste ma shes/ lha/ bdag cag gis 'tshal bar rngo ga la
thogs/ sa ga mas de skad bstan lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa ma ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ mi zhig chu 'gram du klam bzhag nas khrus byed pa dang / mi gzhan zhig 'ongs nas
des klam des mgo la dkris nas de nyid du khrus bya bar brtsams so/ /mi de khrus byas nas langs na/ klam de ma mthong ngo / /mi des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ci tshol/ klam mo/ khyod kyi
klam ga la yod/ gal te khyod kyi klam yod par gyur na/ ji ltar ngas mgo la dkris nas zhugs pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang klam gyis mgo la dkris nas zhugs
par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'o ni nyid/ kho bo'i klam yin no/ /de gnyis khyod kyi nga'i zhes rtsod par gyur nas de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo / /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/
shes ldan dag/ legs par rtogs la gang gi yin pa de la byin cig/ de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams nas gcig la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gi lags so/ /gcig
shos la yang dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gi lags so/ /zhes khyod kyi dang / nga'i zhes pa la nyi ma 'das te/ blon po rnams dub nas dgongs ka gtan la ma phebs bzhin du khyim
du song ngo / /sa ga mas ri dwags 'dzin gyi zhes bya ba nas dris te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la
dpyad du ci zhig mchis/ de gnyis la gcig kyang phyed khyer cig/ gcig shos kyang phyed khyer cig ces gsungs shig dang / gang gi lags pa de'i mchid nas ni/ de ci'i phyir
bdag gi klam dral zhes mchi'o/ /gang gi ma lags pa de'i glo ba la ni/ re zhig bdag gis byed thob na yang der zad/ 'dir bdag la ci zhig god snyam ste/ de ltar brtag par
bgyi'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin song nas blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po la tshong pa gru
bas tsan+dan gyi sdong dum zhig skyes su phul ba dang / de'i mgo gang yin/ mjug gang yin ma shes nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ ji lta bu yin rtogs shig/ de rnams kyis nyin
thog thag dpyad na/ ma shes nas dgongs ka khyim du dong ngo / /sa ga mas zhes bya ba nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgya cher
smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la dpyad du ci mchis/ chab tu 'or cig dang / rtsa ba gang lags pa ni/ 'bying bar 'gyur ro/ /thor to gang lags pa de ni/ steng du 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /de la brtag pa ni/ de lags so/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong
ma bzhin du'o/ /ri bor na khyim bdag cig yod pa de/ de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa las de la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ de bu mngon par 'dod pas chun ma
zhig blangs pa dang / de la chung ma chen ma shos rang bzhin gyi phrag dog can zhig pas/ de'i mngal ma rung bar bya ba'i sbyor ba zhig byas pa las/ de'i mngal shin tu rnam par dag pa las
sems can dang ldan par gyur nas ji tsam na/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u zhig btsas so/ /des bsam pa/ sha 'khon rnams la ni/ 'di lta ste/ chen chun 'di
tha chad yin pas/ gdon mi za bar ma yar mos thabs gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsod par 'gyur na/ bdag gi khyim thab bam/ bdag gis ci byar yod/ bdag gis nam du ni/
srung / ye de kho na la sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ de dang khyim thab lhan cig gros byas te rung nas chen ma shos la smras pa/ che zhe/ bdag gi bu 'di/ khyod la byin gyi/ gsos shig/
des bsam pa/ khyim ni/ gang la bu yod pa de kho na'i yin par zad pas/ khyim gyi bdag mor 'gyur bas gso'o/ /snyam nas des de gsos pa las/ de'i pha yang shi bar gyur te/
de gnyis khyim gyi phyir rtsod par gyur nas gcig gis smras pa/ 'di/ kho mo'i bu yin no/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ 'di/ kho mo'i bu yin no/ /rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang rgyal pos
blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la gang yin pa rtogs shig/ de rnams kyis dpyad pa las/ nyi ma 'das kyang gtan la ma phebs nas dgongs ka khyim du dong pa
dang / sa ga ma ri dwags 'dzin la dris te zhes bya ba nas 'di la dpyad du ci mchis zhes bya ba'i ngar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de gnyis la/ kho bo cag gis ni/ gang gi bu yin pa mi shes kyi/
khyed cag gnyis las gang stobs che ba de khyer la songs shig ces gsungs shig dang / lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'dren par bgyid de/ de sdug bsngal gyis du bar gyur pa dang / de'i ma gang
lags pa de ni/ brtse ba mchis pas 'di gson na/ nam zhig mthong bar 'gyur grang snyam nas gtong bar bgyid do/ /gcig shos de ni/ brtse ba ma mchis pas gang gi tshe mi gtong ba
de'i tshe/ de la lcag gis bzhus shig dang / ji ltar gyur pa smra bar 'gyur te/ 'di la brtag pa ni/ 'di lags so/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas/
rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ ri dwags 'dzin nad kyis thebs nas de la sman pas nyi ma gcig
sman byin pa las theg gi bar gyur to/ /phyi de nyin par sman ma yin pa byin pas na bar gyur to/ /sa ga mas bsam pa/ jo bo/ ci'i slad du nyin gcig ni/ theg gi bar gyur la/ nyin
gcig ni/ na bar gyur snyam nas/ des sman gang dag gis theg gi bar gyur pa'i rtags de dag bzung nas de nas de sman pa rnams bsgo nas slar log nas rang nyid kyis dpyad byas
pa las sos par gyur to/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis bsam pa/ gang gis na/ bdag nyin gcig ni/ theg gi/ nyin gcig ni/ na bas gang gi tshe sman pa mi 'ongs pa de'i tshe theg gi ba 'di la
rgyu ci zhig yod snyam ste/ des sa ga ma la dris pa zhes bya ba nas tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i bla dpal skyed ces bya ba de la dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gshe bar gyur to/ /zhes sa ga mas thos nas/ de ri dwags 'dzin la smras pa/ jo bo/ blon po thams
cad la mthar gyis bka' 'bab par 'gyur gyi/ dpal skyed la lha bzod pa mdzad du stsal ba'i rigs so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ bzod pa byed du gzhug go/ de nas des rgyal po la
smras pa/ lha/ dpal skyed ni/ lha la glo ba nye ba lags na/ de la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /lha/ gal te bzod par mdzad na/ de'i dbang thang de
dag stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du sbyin no/ /dpal skyed kyis ji ltar sa ga mas bdag la rgyal po bzod pa byed du bcug pa shes nas de de la lan glan pa'i bsam pas gnas so//
dus gzhan zhig na/ ri dwags 'dzin pho mtshan la nad byung ste/ de'i rim gros ga ma byed pa las de 'dzem par gyur to/ /des smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la 'dzem du ci mchis/ ci/ pha'i rim
gro bu bu mos mi bgyid dam/ 'on kyang de 'dzem par gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ 'di bdag gis rim gro byar mi btub pas/ de'i chung ma zhig blang ngo snyam nas/ de dpal skyed kyi
khyim du song ba dang / des 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig smras nas/ stan bstabs te 'dug go/ dpal skyed la bu mo zhig yod pa des/ de la smras pa/ bu mo/ sa ga mo'i rkang pa gnyis la
zungs shig/ sa ga mas smras pa/ bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa la bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang lags pa de ni/ mchis so/ /zhes smras nas yang smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra
shis par gyur cig/ dpal skyed kyis smras pa/ ci zhig slong / bu mo slong ngo / /su zhig gi ched du/ des smras pa/ gyos po'i ched du'o/ /de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ dpal skyed kyi chung mas
smras pa/ dgog cig na/ de la ci ste sbyin/ sa ga mas smras pa/ mi rnams kyi lang tsho ni/ nor yin pas/ dpyad du ci yod/ byin cig/ dpal skyed kyis smras pa/ bzang mo/ bdag
cag la sa ga mas phan btags kyi/ byin cig/ gal te de lta na sbyin par bgyi'o/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs nas de de'i rim gro byed par
gyur te/ sa ga ma ni/ de ltar mi byed do/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ bdag la tshig byin cig/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ cung zad nyams par ma gyur tam/ bu mo/ khyod la mas
bslab pa gang yin pa de cung zad blangs te mi gnas sam/ jo bo/ thams cad blangs lags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la phyag byos shig ces mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ mna' ma'i
nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu ni/ gyos sgyug lags pas/ re zhig bdag gis phyag bgyis lags so/ /me la bkur sti bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/
bud med kyi khyim thab me lta bu lags te/ khyim thab la ha cang bsnyen par mi bgyi/ ha cang ring bar yang mi bgyi ste/ bdag ni/ khyim thab la me lta bur bsnyen bkur bgyid do/ /
me long 'phyi bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ sdum pa ni/ me long lta bu lags pas rtag tu zhal zhal bgyi zhing phyag dar bgyi ba lags te/ sdum pa de la bdag
gdugs gcig bzhin du byi dor bgyid lags so/ /gos dkar po bgo bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ khyim gyi las bgyid pa na/ gos gzhan dag kho nas so/ /
lha mchod pa dang khyim thab kyi drung du mchi ba na ni/ gos dkar po rnams bgo bar bgyi ba ste/ de yang bdag bgyid lags so/ /blang bar bya'o/ sbyin par mi bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang
lags pa la/ ci zhig blang bar bgyi zhe na/ 'jig rten las tshig ngan pa smras pa'o/ /tshig ngan pa ni/ su la yang smra bar mi bgyi ba ste/ de yang bdag gis yang dag par blangs te
gnas lags so/ /tshig bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ gsang ba'i tshig mi 'phel bar bgyi ba ste/ bdag la ngag bsdam par mchis lags so/ /langs nas
su la yang stan bstab par mi bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ de 'di skad ces/ khyod rigs kyi mna' ma yin pas khyod gnas dben pa na 'dug par bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba lags te/ bdag
dben pa kho na na mchis lags so/ /zhim po bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ shin tu bkres nas bza' bar bgyi ba ste/ bdag ni/ rtag tu khyim gyi skye bo zas 'tshal ba'i
'og tu 'tshal lo/ /bde bar nyal bar bya zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ mtshan mo khyim gyi dgos pa thams cad bgyis nas snod brtul te ci nas kyang yang ldang mi dgos par khyod
nyal bar bya'o/ /zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'di ni/ legs par gzhag pa'o/ /'di ni/ nyes par gzhag pa'o/ /zhes bdag de kho na bzhin du bgyid do/ /them skas bca' bar bya'o//
zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ 'di skad ces/ khyod sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa des lha'i 'gro ba thob nas 'dir mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa 'di ni/ las kyis yin pas/
'dir yang khyod kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya ste/ sdig pa mi bya'o/ /'di ni/ dbyig gi ya gad mtho ris kyi them skas lta bu yin no/ /zhes bgyi ba lags te/ de yang bdag
rngo ci thogs kyis bgyid do/ /sa ga ma/ legs so/ legs so/ /khyod kyi ma mkhas pa yin na/ gang gi phyir mas ldem por smras pa rtogs pas na/ khyod ni/ lhag par yang mkhas pa
yin no/ /'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gsum pa/ de nas ri dwags 'dzin 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
gnang na/ sa ga ma la bdag gis ma zhes 'bod do snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ mna' ma la ma zhes 'bod du rung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te chos lnga dang
ldan na ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad g.yog byed pa dang / thab rir bab pa'i chung ma len pa dang / srog gi skyabs byed pa dang / nor srung ba dang / shes rab kyi bgo bsha' byed pa'o/ /
bar sdom lnga la/ nad g.yog dang ni chung ma dang / /srog dang nor ni sbyin pa dang / /shes rab bsgrub par byed pa dang / lnga po 'di dag mar bshad do/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin ko sa la
rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ bdag ni/ sa ga ma la ma zhes 'bod par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa

ga mas nga la yang rim gro byas pas/ phyi mo la dris la ngas kyang de la sring mo zhes 'bod do/ /des phyi mo la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyis bos kyang rung / ma bos kyang rung / de ni/ khyod
kyi sring mo kho na yin no/ /ring du 'phur tshangs sbyin mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo dang 'dus pa las/ de las bu pho zhig btsas te/ de'i ming stobs kyi bshes gnyen du btags pa las/ de rgyal
po mes kyis nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir spyugs pa las/ tsam par song nas gnas pa de'i bu mo ni/ 'di yin te/ des na khyod kyi sring mor 'ong ngo / /de nas rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas dril
sgrog tu bcug pa/ sa ga ma 'di/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ni/ ma/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ni/ sring mo yin no/ /des sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i
dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma'i sngon gyi kun
dga' ra ba'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /zhes gdags pa byas so/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ sa ga ma las sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo / /zhes ri dwags 'dzin gyis thos nas lag pa 'gram
pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ yul gyi bzang mo la phung ba ci 'dra ba dag byung bar gyur snyam nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dor bar brtsams pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/
jo bo/ ma dor bar bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig /des bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma dor bar gzeb bu sum cu rtsa gnyis byos la/
shing bal gyis bkang ste/ gzeb bu rnams kyis nang du sgo nga re re zhig la sa ga mas dus gsum du lag pas byugs shig ces sgos shig dang / de nas nyi ma bdun
pa lags nas/ gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin du byas pa las/ nyi ma bdun pa lags pa dang gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis byung nas bsring bskyed de/ /de nar
son pa dang / rtsal po che thub brlag pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ de rnams shing rtar zhugs te phyir byung nas slar 'jug pa dang / mdun na 'don gyi bu shing rtar zhugs
nas phyir byung ba dang / ji tsam na/ phan tshun shing rta'i mda' gnyis thug pa dang / mdun na 'don gyi bus smras pa/ zur cig /de rnams kyis kyang smras pa/ khyod nyid zur cig /mdun na
'don gyi bus/ 'jal to zhes byas nas tshig rtsub po smra bar bsam pa dang / de nas sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis shing rta'i mda' nas bzung ste 'phangs pas phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng du brdab
bsnun te/ de de nas gos kyis mgo bskyur te pha'i drung du song nas mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/ yab/ sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su bgyis so//
bu/ ci'i phyir/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ thabs shig bsham pa byas la de rnams mthar gyis kha gdag gi /mya ngan ma byed cig /de de rnams
la klan ka tshol ba lhur len cing gnas so/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ri bor ba log par gyur nas/ rgyal pos de la dmag kha chen zhig bkye ba las/ rdugs
rab tu rdugs nas slar log go /de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du dmag kha chen po bkye ba las/ rdugs/ rab tu rdugs te slar log nas rgyal po rang nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi dang byung ba dang / sa ga ma'i bu nang du 'jug pa de rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ gang du gshegs/ ri bor rnams 'bebs su'o/ /lha/ bzhugs shig /bdag cag mchi'o//
de bzhin du gyis shig /des de rnams la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gtad nas de rnams dong ste ri bor ba rnams phab nas gte'u bzung / dpya blangs te slar 'ongs pa dang / mdun
na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa rtsal po che dag cig ste/ re zhig lha'i dka' bas bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'di dag gis 'bring gis bsgrubs kyi/ lhas 'di
la dgongs shig /rgyal po rnams ni/ khum 'phrig can yin pas/ snying la bzhag ste slar mdun na 'don la dris pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ /des smras pa/ lha/ de la ji ltar bsgrub
par bgyi/ gal te de dag 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha/ rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de mi dga' nas bsam pa/ de ltar 'gyur srid kyi/ ji ltar
gsad par bya zhe na/ thabs bshams pa sems shing / gsang 'phel du dogs pas su la yang mi 'dri bar de dag nyid kyis dpyad pa las/ blo skyes pa/ 'di
kho nar mgron du bos la brdungs te gtang ngo snyam nas/ des sa ga ma la spring pa/ che zhe/ bu rnams sang 'dir zan zo zhig /des bsam pa/ sang ni/ bu rnams zhang po'i der za bar
'gyur gyi/ bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der stong ste phyin pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos
dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma
stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga
la gnang ngo / /zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po'i pho nya de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs
nas/ khye'u shog cig ces bos so/ /de nas rgyal pos dug ha la lha la dang zas su sbyar bas rmongs par byas nas/ mgo rnams bcad de/ de nas gzeb bkang nas steng du phu bo shos kyi
mgo bzhag ste rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas sa ga ma la bskur ba dang / sa ga mas bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar lhas sring mo'i bu rnams la bgo ba zhig bskur ba yin gyi/ bdag gis
kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bgo bar dbul lo/ /snyam nas/ de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang
zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gzeb
kha phye bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sa ga mas bden pa ma mthong bar bu bsad pa mthong na/ bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod
do/ /snyam du dgongs nas sa ga ma la bka' stsal pa/ re zhig 'dug la chos nyon la phyis ci dga' bgyis shig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chos mnyan
pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas
bden pa mthong bar mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bden pa mthong nas gzeb kha phye ba dang / bu'i mgo rnams mthong nas de nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
'du byed thams cad ni/ 'di ltar mi rtag pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sa ga
ma'i bu rnams brdungs pa ni/ nyes so/ /gal te ma brdungs par gyur na/ 'di rnams kho nas grogs byas pas de'i lag mthil du sa mtha' dag 'jog par 'gyur ba zhig /de nas
ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lus rdul gyis g.yogs shing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod
lus rdul gyis g.yogs shing gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ btsun pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil
'khor chen po legs par phab ste gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i bgyi ba dang / rgyal po'i sgrub pa tha dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag bdag gis bgyis te yongs su rdzogs nas lus rdul
gyis g.yogs shing mchis pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri bar bya'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po/ dper na/ khyod la 'dir
shar phyogs nas mi yid ches pa/ yid brtan du rung ba/ brtan pa/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ lha/ bdag da gzod 'di nas shar phyogs su mchi na/ de nas
bdag gis ri brag chen po ma chag pa/ ser ka ma mchis pa/ phrag ma mchis pa/ shin tu mkhregs pa/ gcig tu stug pa zhig sa'i bar dang / nam mkha'i bar gyi sems can thams cad
dang / srog chags thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma ji snyed pa thams cad phye mar klog cing mchi ba mthong gi/ lha khyod
kyi bgyi ba'am/ sgrub pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig ces zer la/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas mi zhig 'ongs te zhes bya ba nas bgyi ba'am/ sgrub pa de
mdzod cig zer te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po/ mi zad par byed pa mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa ni/ rnyed par dka' na khyod kyis ci zhig
bya| btsun pa/ 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po/ mi bas par bgyid pa/ mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba lags pas/
don spyad pa dang / chos spyad pa dang / bsod nams spyad pa dang / dge ba spyad pa dang / bzang po spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par byed pa ma lags par gzhan ci
zhig bgyir mchis/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod ci'i phyir 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu'i zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par
bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /btsun pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par
phab ste gnas pa de rnams kyis glang po che rnams dang / glang po cher 'gyed pa dang / rta pa rnams dang / rta par 'gyed pa dang / shing rta pa thams cad dang / shing rta par 'gyed pa dang / dpung
bu chung rnams dang / dpung bu chung du 'gyed pa dang / gsang tshig mkhan rnams dang / gsang tshig mkhan du 'gyed pa dang / nor rnams kyis nor bu rgyal tha dad pa gang lags pa de dag
thams cad de'i tshe 'gyed pa'i mthu ma mchis pa dang / stobs ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gnon pa ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ 'jigs
pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu nye bar gnas na zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba ma lags par gzhan ci zhig bgyir mchis zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du srog chags 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rga ba dang / 'chi bas 'joms pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar rga ba dang / 'chi
bas 'joms pa na/ skyes pa gang dag gi don spyad pa dang zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bya ba ma yin par gzhan ci zhig byar yod ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar che zhing rgya che ba/ /ri bo nam mkha' las 'ongs pa/ /kun nas yang dag 'ongs pa yis/ /sa ni phye mar
rlog pa na/ /de la glang po ches mi rdzi/ /dpung bu chung dang shing rta dang / /rtas min gsang tshig mkhan dang ni/ /nor gyis 'gyed pas rgyal mi thob/ /de bzhin rga dang 'chi ba yis/ /mi
rnams 'joms par byed pa na/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po dang / /tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan/ /khyim pa de bzhin brtul
zhugs can/ /lang tsho nyid dang rgan po dang / /de bzhin bar ma'i mi rnams la/ /cung zad kyang ni 'dzem med par/ /thams cad mngon du 'joms par byed/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa'i
mi| |bdag gi don la lta ba yis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ /bla med dag la dad bya zhing / /lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis/ /dam pa'i chos ni spyad
byas na/ /'di na smad par mi 'gyur zhing / /mtho ris song nas dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'
ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs nas song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la/ de rnams
las kyang bu pho sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ rtsal po che thub brlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /gang du smon lam
btab lags/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du khyim bdag gcig gi bu shi nas/ de'i chung ma de rtag tu mngon par 'dod par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su mya
ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ wA ra NA sir rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las brtsigs so/ /de nas
bud med bu med pa bu mngon bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas mchod rten de la byi dor byas nas 'dug go /des 'dun pa'i slong mo byas nas mchod rten de la mchod pa byas
te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te
song nas grong khyer du zhugs so/ /de na bud med cig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas ngu ba dang / des gzhan zhig la dris pa/ ci'i phyir 'di ngu bar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams
smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ gal te bdag kyang bu byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa las/ ji tsam na/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga'
'dun gyi mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa na bud med de yang de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go /de rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/
bdag cag tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de de rnams la dris pa/ bu dag /khyed kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum/ 'di dang
'di dag go /des smras pa/ bu dag /gal te de ltar na/ khyed cag gi mar bdag kho na gyur cig /yum/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams
dong ngo / /des bsam pa/ re zhig bud med de lan gcig btsa' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas de ltar ngu na/ bdag la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis btsa' na/ ji ltar bya zhes
de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/ mchod rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgo nga 'byung ba de/ thang gcig tsam gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la/ smre sngags kyang mi 'don to/ /des
bsam pa/ 'byung ba'i thabs 'di ni/ rung ba yin no/ /snyam du rig nas mchod rten de la dad pa drag pos smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ ji ltar bya gag mo 'di thang gcig tsam
gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin du bdag gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang ci sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni/ sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gang yin pa de ni/ sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/ 'dis de na smon lam btab
pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo / /btsun pa/ sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa ma
bgyis shing / skyon ma mchis par rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bkum nas de rnams kyi mgos gzeb bkang ste/ sa ga ma la bskur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag /'di dag kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /
sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na chang tshong zhig gnas so/ /chom rkun pa rab tu mang po chang tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dris pa/ chang yod dam/ chang tshong gi chung mas smras pa/ yod do/ /
zhes de rnams la chang blud na/ 'dzar ba med nas/ des glang zhig bstan te/ 'di sod cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ mtshon cha med do/ /des gta' blangs nas mtshon cha byin pa dang / de
rnams kyis de gsod par brtsams so/ /de gsod pa na sems la bdag gsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni/ chang tshong gi chung ma 'di yin gyi/ bdag gang du 'di rnams kyi mgo
bcad nas gzeb bkang ste/ 'di la bskur bar 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces bsam mo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gang yin pa de ni/ ko sa la'i
rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no/ /chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni/ sa ga ma'i bu 'di dag rnams yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ sa ga ma 'di
nyid yin no/ /zhes rgyas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drang srong
mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bsti gnas na drang srong zhig yod do/ /de de na 'chag pa las bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa rdzab can gyi phyogs shig tu gcin khu chu dang bcas
pa zhig gcis so/ /glo bur du ri dwags mo skom pas nyen pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ de skom pas nyen pas de 'thungs nas mo'i dbang po la bsnams so/ /sems can rnams kyi
las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ phyogs de nyid du 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang / des de
bsnams na skal ba mi mthun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo / /ji tsam na/ drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las/ khye'u de mthong nas/ 'di su'i bu yin zhes de bsam
pa la zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na/ bdag gi yin par mthong nas/ des de bsti gnas su bzhag ste/ bsnun bsnyod bskyed nas de'i mgo ri dwags kyi 'dra bas ri dwags mgo /ri
dwags mgo zhes bya bar grags so/ /dus gzhan zhig na drang srong shi nas/ ri dwags mgos klad pa'i thod pa rdob pa'i rig pa bslab ste/ de thod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung
ston par byed de/ gal te re zhig sgra drag por gyur na/ gyen du 'gro ba ltar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /'on te 'bring du gyur na/ gyen du 'gro ba mir skye bar lung ston par
byed de/ de ni/ bde 'gro'i rtags so/ /ngan 'gro'i rtags ni/ gal te re zhig sgra mi gsal bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /
'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /'on te sgra chung bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par byed do/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi
'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ mgo bzhi khyer te drang srong
de'i drung du song nas khyed kyis lung ston cig /des rgyun du zhugs pa'i thod pa la brdabs nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ lha rnams su skye'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no/ /phyir mi
'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no/ /dgra bcom pa'i thod pa la yang brdabs na/ ma shes rnams par ma shes nas ngo tshabs de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ /bdag
cag bstan pa de las nyams gyur tam/ /'on te slob dpon rigs las ma skyes sam/ /'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nam/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
smras pa/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ /khyod kyis rig pa kun legs goms ma byas/ /re zhig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byos la/ /khyod kyis phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig /
ri dwags mgos smras pa/ khyod kyis rig pa thams cad la byang ba 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /de nas ri dwags mgo/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dud
'gro yi dwags dmyal ba lha mi skye bo'i 'gro 'tshal na/ /rig pa'i skyon gyis sems can spyod pa drug pa ma 'tshal gyi/ /gtso bo srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol byon pa po/ /pha rol smra
kun las rgyal drug pa ma 'tshal de ci gsung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me ru bsregs ba lcags kyi me/ /lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas/ /rims kyis nye bar
zhi pa yi/ /'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa/ /de bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las/ /brgal te yang dag rnam grol ba/ /mi g.yo go 'phang thob rnams kyi/ /'gro ba gdags su yod ma
yin/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ri dwags mgos 'di skad ces gsal te/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs
par mdzad de/ de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu
zhing gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa
na 'chag cing rgyu skar rnams gyur pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags mgo la bka' stsal pa/ ri dwags mgo /ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur
soms shig /des bsam nas/ btsun pa/ 'jig rten 'di ma rung / 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/ rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas ba dang sbyar na/ lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams mthun par byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ yang shes par gyis shig /des gsol pa/ lo drug tu lags so/ /de bzhin
du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang gsol pa/ lngar lags so/ /de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par spos shig /de ring kho nar lhas phye ma'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'bebs par 'gyur te/ de la khrus byed pa
gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras dang / phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ri dwags mgo/ de ltar na/ rgyu skar rnams ni/ 'gyur ba/ g.yo ba/ mi brtan pa yin te/ srog kyang
g.yo ba/ mi brtan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ri dwags mgo mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas dgra
bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ri dwags rnams ni nags khrod brten/ /'dab chags
rnams ni mkha' la brten/ /rnam par sgom pa chos la brten/ /dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la brten/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing
gshegs te/ mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs po zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos
dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas ri
dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ga ma la cang mi gsung bas
gnang ngo / /zhes bya ba nas nor bu'i chu snod bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshod gsol ba dus tshod gsol du bcug go /ji tsam na/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma
de sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas sgo gseb nas bltas na/ dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni/
bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab bo/ /snyam nas/ de rings pa'i ngas par 'ongs te smras pa/ jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig /'phags pa
rnams ni/ bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lags so/ /sa ga mas bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ gdugs
tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ gnas med cing skabs med do/ /gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong sgren mo rnams mthong ngo / /snyam nas/ des dus tshod gsol
pa skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/ des/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te/ glo bur pa la stsal pa dang / mchi bar chas pa la stsal pa dang / bro 'tshal ba la stsal pa dang / bro g.yog la stsal
ba dang / stsang gnas kyi 'jams nar ma dang / sman nar ma dang / dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ sa ga ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na/ glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni/ spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang / lam srang mi
mkhas pa lags pas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na/ spyod yul la mkhas pa dang / lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de thugs su chud de/ legs so/ legs
so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ dge slong mchi bar chas pa bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ mgron po rnams dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshogs
dang bral na phongs par 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyod na/ tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don
gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ nyon mongs pa'am 'gum par yang 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod
snyoms la longs spyad na/ bro nad las ldang ba dang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig
mthong na/ nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ bro 'tshal ba'i bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod
snyoms la longs spyod na 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang mchis/ drod che ba yang mchis te/ de la re zhig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams ni/ nas
thug 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/ drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni/ nyams skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang
ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la bro nad mang ba dang / bro nad nyung ba mchis te/ de la bro nad mang po gang lags pa
de rnams la ni/ re zhig 'tshal ches/ bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na/ lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang
thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin/ btsun pa/ de ring kho na bdag gi bu mo mngag gzhug
bgyid pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus bgyid pa mthong nas de slar mchis te bdag la/ 'phags pa rnams ni/ bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal
phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab po/ /zhes mchi bas de rnams dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyis bkab par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs
so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras sbyin/ btsun pa/ dus 'di gcig na khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dag /dge slong ma rab tu mang po rnams
chu bo gnas ldan la sgren mor khrus bgyid pa las/ khyim pa mo de rnams kyis bgad cing bgad nas mdzub ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi 'dom nye bar ston te/ de dag gis nye bar
bstan pa rnams/ pag khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus ras kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis bsod
nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing / 'di dag ni/ rdzas las byung
ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo/ /zhes tshad gzung
bar mi nus kyi/ 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus so/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol
pa re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur
ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa thos te/ de mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar yang mchi bar 'gyur la/ des bdag gi glo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge
slong mas khrus ras longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo/ dge slong 'di ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir 'ong bar
'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan gcig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar mchi la/ des bdag
