gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge
ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo/ dge slong 'di ni/ tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir
mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar mchi la/ des bdag gi glo bur pa'i zas zhes bya ba nas
dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob
par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya
ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang mchi la/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi
gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur
lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/
yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing
gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' bsham thabs mnams/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga'
ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skem pa dang / 'ding bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal
mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skem pa dang / 'ding bar byed pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags
pa dang / sha dang / khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do/ /snyam du dgongs nas
yangs pa can du bsod snyoms spyad de zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing / lhung bzed dang / na bza' chos gos mkhos su phabs nas zhabs bsil te/
nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'dir snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skem pa dang /
'ding bar byed par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod
nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do/ /dge slong dag /dad pas byin pa la bag yod par spyod pa dang / dus su spyod pa dang / skabs
skabs su spyod pa dang / brtags te spyod pa dang / cung zad spyod pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyad par bya ba'i bsngags pa
gsungs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /gnas mal mi gtsang bas
gos na/ de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya ste/ gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams
nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab
nag por gyur pa zhig ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha bi mthong ngam/
btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ mi pha bi ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas
mal la/ ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding ba dang / shur bu dang / rgya cang dang / lcug gu'i gding bas bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe
rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to/ /da dung yang 'di rgyab nag por gyur to/ /zhes rig par mdzad nas/ yangs pa can du bsad snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas nang du yang
dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de ring nga snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/
de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las/ de nas des dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam
gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis deng phan chad ming
tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis
longs spyad par bya ste/ stug na ni/ rim gcig gis so/ /seng ba zhig na ni /rim gnyis kyis so/ /dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa
bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po'am/ 'dam kha'am/
kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gris dras pa bcang bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas/ de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag
gis reg nas dri mi zhim pa sbrang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar
byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ g.yan
pa dgab pa bcang bar bya ste/ zhag lnga'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o/ /gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mdze nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang /
khyams dang / rdzing dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chag sa rnams dang / shing drung gi gnas rnams ni dri mi zhim pa dang / sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyod par
byed pa de dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/
dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang / ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab
khungs sa dang / snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya zhing / dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim gro bya'o/ /dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/ kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar
bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mon
dar gyi chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ ci dgar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal
dang sha na'i ras la yang rung ngo / /sdom la/ gso ma skra yi chos gos dang / /gcer bu skra 'bal lo ma'i gos/ /mthang gos bcas dang g.yang gzhi dang / /gso ras seng ras pa char sngo/ /gleng
gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcangs
na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skra'i
chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du
'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod
gcer bu byed/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o/ /byas na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par
gyur to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'di/ gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams
spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med
pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lo/ /zhes yul phyogs sna
tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur to/ /so so nas bsam pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /des rma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di ni/
bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro/ /de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyim thab tu 'dam mo/ /zhes smras pa dang / so so nas des mjug ma bsgrengs nas gar byed par brtsams pa dang /
yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so/ /des smras pa/ ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi
ldan pas/ 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no/ /zhes pa rma bya des thos nas/ yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang / /
'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ /nor bu bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra gyur na/ /ci slad khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi stsal/ /yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes
pa dang / /'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ /nor bu bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra gyur kyang / /'dzem med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas bya'i tshogs
kyi nang nas byung ngo / /da lta'i yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo / /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'breg par rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir
khyod skra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ skra 'bal ba 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o/ /'bal
na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong
ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gi
bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o/ /'tsho bar byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //yang dge slong zhig gis bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag g.yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rgyal
mtshan yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa| bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ pa char 'di ni/ khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ khyim pa 'chang bar byed do/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad ser ba'am/ thams cad dmar ba'am/ dkar ba ni/ rung ba ma yin pa nyid do/ /sdom la/ kha tshar
ring dang gdengs ka dang / /ral ga gtsug tor thod dang ni/ /ra bal gos dang rda bal klam/ /mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin
no| |zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa| bdag kha tshar gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /
zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ral
ga 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong
zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag thod 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i
rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
bdag ra bal gyi gos bcang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can
du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag rnga bal
gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
ro| |zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can/ dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/
de phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas
sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing / snam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /song na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo mchin nad can na ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang / de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos bla gos su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni/ lnga ste/ dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa
dang / char bab pa'am char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o/ /bar sdom
gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi /'byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/ /rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang / /dge 'dun rnyed dang de de yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dong ba dang / de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o/ /ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams
phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /blangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcol ba'i dge
slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mngon par bya'o/ /dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag rnyed pa chung du dag 'gyed par byed pa na/ rnyed pa chung du yin no/ /
snyam nas dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis ma bcol
bar dong ba dang / de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par
mi bya'o/ /rnyed pa chung du gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/
de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcol bas rnyed pa chung du ma blangs na/ ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni/ nges par bda' bar bya'o/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag
khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na/ ras yug brgya 'bul lo/ /de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo/ /zhes bya ba'i bar
du'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las/ khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas/
phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na'i 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na longs shig /des
smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs/ de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la
de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o/ /gos rnams sus srung / gang gzhon pas so/ /de ltar mi nus kyi/ gang
gzhon pa ni/ 'gro'o/ /gang rgan pa des ni/ gos rnams srung ngo / /de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams 'bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo / /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu

spyod pa ni/ drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo res mos res mos kyis mi stongs par byed pa yin pas/ nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'dug pa des/ rgyang ring po
kho na nas mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsam pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gi /de bsur 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ gnas brtan/ byon
pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni/ rgan zhugs shig yin no/ /
snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so/ /ci/ de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do/ /ci/ de gtsug lag
gang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro/ /
gal te de lta na/ nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ /slob dpon/ legs so/ /nye dgas bsam pa/ gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na/ skye bo'i
tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyi/ legs par bsrung bar bya'o/ /snyam nas des de ngal bsor bcug ste dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas/ ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis
nam sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do/ /de nas nye dga' gsang
'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das bar byas so/ /de nas de nang par sngar langs te rgan zhugs khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri bor du
phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs gcig shos des/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes kun dga' bar 'gyur pa'i tshig smras nas/ de gnyis ngal
sros pa dang / khong gsum can/ yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig /gnas brtan/ bgo'o/ /nye dgas rgan zhugs gcig la smras
pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis bgos shig /gnas brtan/ bdag mi bgod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo / /gcig shos la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod
kyis bgos shig /des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyod ni/ nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni/ spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar
'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsam pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis bsdongs kyi/ dbyen bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song
ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang dag tu rtag tu chag chag btag/ phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/ /rgan
zhugs/ gal te chag chag dang / phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dgas gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang / phyag dar bya'o/ /'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa
de ni/ rgan zhugs/ gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des
na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyi/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o/ /des de gnad la bab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras
pa| rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan/ bdag gis 'di ru dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so/ /rgan zhugs/ gal te chos bsgrags
pas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dgas 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bas dus thams cad du chos bshad do/ /rnyed pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni/ rgan zhugs gcig
shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod
de| lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
gsog par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de lta bas na/ gtsug lag khang phyag dar byas pas
yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to/ /de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/
'khang bar mi bya'o/ /de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol
ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o/ /de gnyis kyis sngar smra phab pas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas
nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni/ rang nyid 'dug go /de gnyis kyi bar du ni/ cha gcig bzhag nas gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyed nyon cig /khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/
'di gnyis dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /de nas cha gnyis ni/ bdag nyid kyis blangs so/ /cha gcig ni/ de gnyis la byin pa dang / de gnyis kyis
smras pa/ gnas brtan/ 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyi/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig /des bgo bar brtsams nas/ de nas ras yug gcig kha khyer du 'dug
pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo / /de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'/ khyod kyis su zhig shi ba
mthong / des ji ltar gyur ba rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so/ /skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las
gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/ /thob rgyal byas na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/
the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ 'bab

chu'i ngogs shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad
kyang mi rnyed do/ /de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni/ chu'i nang du 'gro'o/ /gcig shos kyis ni/ skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ spyir bya'o/ /de na gcig
ni/ chur song ngo / /gcig shos ni/ skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams dkrogs te skam la bton nas/ de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do/ /chu la gnas pa ni/
chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so/ /ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis bgos shig /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi bgod do/ /ci'i
phyir/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo / /des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no/ /de gnyis sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin
rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa/ tsha bo dag /ci ste khong du chud cing 'dug /zhang po/ bdag cag ni/ nya rnyed pas so/ /ci ste mi bgod/ zhang po/ nyes pas 'jigs
so/ /khyod ni/ nyes pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni/ rkang pas spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bsdongs kyi/ dbye
bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po/ bdag chur zhugs
te bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams dkrogs te skam la thon pa dang / 'dis bsad do/ /tsha bo/ gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o/ /skam la
'gro ba de ni/ sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher ma'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa dang / mi'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do/ /gzhan yang / gal te
des ma bsad na/ khyod kyis dkrogs kyang ci phan/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni/ de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o/ /des de gnad
la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po/ bdag gis skam la
song ste bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do/ /tsha bo/ gal te skam la song nas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o/ /chur 'gro ba de ni/ dba' klong gi 'jigs
pa dang / rus sbal gyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do/ /gzhan yang / gal te des ma dkrogs
na| khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni/ de'i mthu yin pas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o/ /des de gnad la phab pas skyengs
nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag /'di la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do/ /de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ zhang
po| ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig /bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/ nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig
tu byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o/ /bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ /de ni chos la gnas pas bkur/ /bzhin rgyas kyis

bsam pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no/ /snyam nas des nya chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer te ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/
bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ /mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i/ /nya po che zhig thogs nas ni/ /shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs/ /des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing / /chos
dang chos min mi shes pas/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar/ /des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pas blta na sdug pa khyod/ /pha rol mnan
pa shin tu legs/ /de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la/ /khyed kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di
nyid yin no/ /sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la/ da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so/ /gleng gzhi ni/
mnyan yod na'o/ /ri por zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ ras
yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong
gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bsam pa/ gal te de las ras yug cig ma grub
na| bdag nye dga'am yin no/ /snyam nas de mgron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo / /khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas ras rnams 'brim pa na/ nye dgas
ras gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo / /ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te
'tshal te mchis na/ 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /de ltar su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye
dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag /bdag gis spyan ma drangs so/ /des ras de khyer nas song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal
byed pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/ /thob rgyal byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams
the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa
la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye dgas mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob
rgyal byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri bor zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang bsgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum du mgron du bos te zan byin nas
de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no/ /snyam mo/ /de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bram ze rgan po zhig gnas pa des thos nas/ de rgan po'i mthar 'dug
ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo / /bram zes ras rnams 'brim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag
gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na/ bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs bar ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod
kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis mgron du ma bos so/ /des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo / /bram ze des smad par brtsams so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems
de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron du ma bos so/ /da lta na yang ngo / /gleng gzhi
ni| mnyan yod na'o/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de ldang ba phun
sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed do/ /gtsug lag khang de ni/ sa phyogs dben zhing bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing
sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par
byas pa yin no/ /ji tsam na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig /gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes
pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas de nang par sngar langs te song ngo / /dge slong de/ 'dzem
bag can zhig pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyi yin no/ /zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis ba'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang der gal te bram ze dang / khyim
bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu'am/ phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par
mi bya'o/ /sdom la/ bye ba rnams la skal ba ni/ /sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/ /dge 'dun dang ni chos gos kyi/ /rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na/ rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin no/ /kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge
slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na/ rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin no/ /kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/
gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na/ rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin
no| |kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ /gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ yo byad thams
cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las/ gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des zas byin nas ras
yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo / /ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis
ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las/ ri bor de nyid du phyin nas khyim bdag des de gnyis la'ang zan byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed
kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de la ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyi/ de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis smras
pa| mkhan po ni/ bsod nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do/ /de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i
rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis rnyed pa dang / dge 'dun gyir brtags pa dang / dge slong gir brtags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor bstan pa'o/ /
mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug
mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no/ /de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dam bcas na/ de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug
lag khang de nyid du sbyin no/ /gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyung mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di ni/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /khrims
kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba/ khyed kyi ni/ khyim che ge mo zhig go/ kho bo cag gi ni/ khyim che ge mo zhig go /lam po che
dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni/ spyi'i yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams
kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang
bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam
bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed par phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa kho na'o// //'dul ba gzhi
bam po re lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa
nyid la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan
byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam
bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas
pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams
la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/
rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams la kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa
rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur
zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar
chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas
zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o/ /gal te bram ze dang / khyim
bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams
la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang /
sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang
dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam
ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams
su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur
zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa
phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /
dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong
'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu
drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams
zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo
rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid du chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/
gnyi ga'o/ /ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni/ khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /rten gyis rnyed
pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ de kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni/ rten gyis thob
pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyir brtags
pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i 'o/ /yang thog pa'i 'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o/ /
zhes brtags pa ni/ de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni/ dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas
pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma
phye ba ste/ 'di ni/ mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltams pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan
las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal te mchod rten chen po bzhir 'khyer mi nus na/ mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul gyi/ gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni/ so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa
zhes bya'o/ /sdom la/ gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang / bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang / /gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / /dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod
na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'di ltar/ gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po
mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ gnas nas phyung ba ni/ gnyis
mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni/ rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na/ de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o/ /gnas nas
phyung ba ni/ rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni/ nyung ba las/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams
kho na'o/ /btsun pa/ 'di ltar/ gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags
na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/ /gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa
zhig gum lags na/ gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig shos so/ /gnas nas phyung ba ni/ rab tu mang la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni/ gcig
mchis pa gum na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o/ /dam bcas pa
rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi dge tshul shi yi/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed longs shig ces
pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres
nas bged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su
dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ /zhes smra ba las/ de yang ma byung bar shi nas dam bcas pa rnams kyis
dam ma bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi dge tshul shi yi/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed longs shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par
bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs
bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis
dam ma bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yi/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos
pa| nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no//
phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan
pa dag/ bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ /zhes zer ba las/ de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par
spyod pa shi yi/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa
rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres nas 'ged par byas na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam
bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi dge tshul shi yi/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par
bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs
bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan
pa dag/ bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o/ /zhes zer ba las/ de yang ma byung bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi dge tshul shi
yi| de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged
par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed
na| legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par
spyod pa shi yi/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams
'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/
legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o//
zhes smras pa las/ de yang ma byung bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yi/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho
nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres
te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /sdom ni/ nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brlabs//
bar ma sbyin dang blang bya dang / /bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / /spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /nye dga'i spyi bor phol mig cig byung
nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzang / kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas bsam pa/ gal te de ring
kho na 'thungs nas de ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyi/ re zhig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar bya'o/ /snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams
chen po dang ldan pa des/ lhan cig gnas pa rnams kun du mngags pa dang de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yogs pa'i gos phal mo che bslangs so/ /phyi de nyin par sman
pas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod snyun gdangs sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzang / ma 'thungs so/ /'phags pa/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyi/ deng nyis 'gyur du gsol
cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po/ /thos pa lags so/ /kho bo'i nad 'di ni/ cher skyes par gyur te/ mar
dang rma g.yogs pa'i gos mang du dgos kyi/ slongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che bslangs so/ /de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas/ nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs
pas/ de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to/ /ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzang / ma 'thungs so/ /'phags pa/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis
so| |des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / de ring ni/ sum 'gyur du btung ngo / /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par zhugs kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so//
des smras pa/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul pa rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman pa des/ 'jal to/ /zhes byas nas khros te song ngo / /de nas nye dgas
mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las/ ma zhu nas shi'o/ /de la gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni/ chos gos las so/ /cha gnyis pa ni/ nad kyi rkyen sman las so/ /cha gsum pa ni/
brdung du byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum khri byung ngo / /zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las/ de la gser mang du byung
ste| gser srang sum khri mchis kyi/ de la bka' stsal ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na dengs la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob cig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu dong
ngo| |de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo/ /dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong
nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ khyod song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces/ rgyal po chen po/ gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe khyod kyis
dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang
gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na ba la rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyis so/ /zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po/
khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur
bas gtogs 'dod thongs shig ces smros shig/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyis
te/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol ba bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste bsgyur nas bgos so/ /gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams
kyis nye dga' shi nas de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis bgos so/ /zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun
pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so/ /yangs pa can pa dang / wA

ra NA si pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so/ /dge slong
rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni/ lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gaN+Di dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni/ gsol ba'o/ /shi ba'i gaN+Di brdungs pa na 'ongs pa
gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'brim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no//
dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te/ bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun
thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug pa la gsol ba
bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun
gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo
byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /dge slong dag/ 'di ni/ shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ gsol ba'o/ /gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin
pa de la ni/ rnyed pa mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gang na ba dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis
pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor/ thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig/ dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
gsol ba'am/ thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod
pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da
ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os pa'i chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du
bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pa de srog dang phral lo/ /ji tsam na ma stes te/ chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri bor zhig bcom nas

phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo / /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ sha 'di rnyed kyi/ nyis brgya lnga bcus glang po che'i sha
bcad la btso'o/ /nyis brgya lnga bcus ni/ chu blang ngo / /de na glang po che'i sha gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams/ 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag/
bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyi/ de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dug gis gdab po/ /de dag gis sha dug
can zos pa dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro/ /zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas/ lhag ma dug gis btab bo/ /gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du
dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas/ lhag mar dug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la/ gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad
shi bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsam pa/
bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyi/ rim bzhin du bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste/ gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' bar brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog
mas rkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to/ /lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ bsag par yang ni bya ba ste/ /lhag par bsag par mi bya'o/ /gsog la chags pa'i wa long ba/ /gzhu yis
bsad par gyur la ltos/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par 'di chags pas shi'o/ /da ltar yang 'di lhag par
chags pas shi bar gyur to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ dge slong gis rim gro byas na/ 'on kyang shi
bar gyur nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to/ /de nas gos 'ged pas

rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis rgyud ngan pa byas te chos gos ma bkrus kyi/ khrus shig/ des smras pa/ yo byad ni/ khyod 'ged na/ kho bos bkru'am/ khyod nyid kyis khrus shig/ skabs
de| dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la/ lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o/ /gal te nad
g.yog mang bar gyur na/ thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong bshes gnyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi na/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul
gyi yo byad dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /zhes des 'dam zhing
'dam zhing bzang po rnams blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma dag las sbyin par bya'o/ /nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o/ /de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas
skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas/ dge slong zhig
la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni/ kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las/ ji tsam
na dge slong de shi'o/ /de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyi/ phul cig/ des smras pa/ des kho bo la ci bder byed du bcug go/ zhes pa'i
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / de gson po'i tshe nyid na ma byin na/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos
kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni/ med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug
bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas/ de'i lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags te rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyi/ bdag gi ched du mchod
pa gyis shig/ des khas blangs pa las/ de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim
gro byed pa la ji skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol ba dang / dge slong dag/ dge slong de log par ltung ngo / /gal te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog
gsum la mchod pa byas par gyur dang / dad pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba nam yang yal bar mi gzhag ste/ nad g.yog
sbyin par bya'o/ /des de la dris te/ gal te de la sman med na/ yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o/ /gal te grub na de lta na legs/ ci ste ma grub na/ dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no/ /ci ste yang ma grub na/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang gang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing / rim gro byed pas bsgyur nas
rim gro dang / ston pa mchod par bya'o/ /sos par gyur na de la/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yin te/ khyod kyi yo byad du spyad do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te de la 'byor pa
yod na/ des 'bad de bsab par bya'o/ /gal te med na/ de'i spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod
na'o/ /dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba/ tshor bas nyen pa zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la
smras pa/ kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang / de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa shi nas/ de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so/ /dge slong
rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas/ bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so/ /gos 'gyed pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed bzhag pa'i snod ma dbye zhing / de bzhin
gshegs pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phye ba dang / sbrul zhig
mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi sgras bslangs nas bka' stsal pa/ mi gti mug can/ lhung bzed 'di spongs la songs shig/ dge
slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro/ /de 'khrugs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ nags stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/ des de khros pa'i me sbar bas nags de rab tu 'bar te/
de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ srid pa thams
cad la skrag par gyis shig/ srid pa'i yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig gi lus de/ gnas gsum po nags stug por khros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i me
dang / dur khrod du me phal pas sreg par gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing / gang la skye ba de
yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /ma spangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad slong na/ rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar sbyin par bya'o/ /ma byin
na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /gos 'ged pas lhung
bzed dang chos gos bgo'o/ /zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras
pa| re zhig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/ de dngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re zhig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas phyi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong
zhig shi nas/ dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas gtsug lag khang du lhags te gos 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o/ /zhes de'i gnas khang du
zhugs pa dang / de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas/ dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/ re zhig kho bo'i ro la mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged par
byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i ro la mchod pa byas la/
de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang / nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong
rnams kyis dur khrod du khyar te ro la mchod pa byas bsregs nas/ de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las/ des dbyug pa blangs te langs
nas re zhig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang / /dngos po'i skyin pa
lag gi bla/ /mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang / /pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs
tshod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ lhags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed
pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni/ nad pa la
gzigs pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal
bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang
nas gtsug lag khang dang / spyil po nas spyil po dang / 'chags nas 'chags rnams su 'chag cing gshegs pa na gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der phyin pa dang / de na dge slong
nad tshabs che ba/ shes pa chung ba/ rang gi gcin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /bde bar
gshegs pa/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung
na| ci'i phyir de skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /zhes ngu skad 'don/ btsun pa/ bdag la tshangs pa
mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa'am/ lta ba ma mchis so/ /dge slong / khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun
pa| ma mchis lags so/ /de bas na/ khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te
'ong zhing ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig /ces 'jig rten ba'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs
bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen
po ma dros pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/
'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no/ /gzhan yang / khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la/ lha rnams ni/ gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug cig /ngas 'di'i rim gro bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba can/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad
pas dge slong de bzung ste/ gcin dang ngan skyugs nas phyung nas mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/ smyug gi tshal pas bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril phyis byas te bkrus
so| |de nas skyil mo krung 'char bcug nas de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te phyogs de yang pa'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do/ /de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang
po brgya byin la nad pa la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /chos nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer te 'ong
ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong / ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas
sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci/ dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod
bas legs par tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa/ de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyis lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms

kyi phyed bzhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la
zos nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do/ /zhes gyis shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so// //'dul ba gzhi/
bam po re drug pa/ de nas dge slong de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad de/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gi/ bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas
le los dus 'das par byed pa ni/ bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/ ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nam gyi cha

stod dang / cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom par gyur to/ /dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang
bral pa/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur
cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye ba'i dbang po dang
bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
nad pa 'di dag la ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/ pha med/ rtsa lag gzhan med do/ /de lta bas na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis
phan tshun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni/ lhan cig gnas pa'i 'o/ /lhan cig gnas pas ni/ mkhan po'i 'o/ /slob dpon gyis ni/ nye gnas kyi'o/ /nye gnas kyis ni/ slob dpon gyi'o/ /
mkhan po gcig pas ni/ mkhan po gcig pa'i 'o/ /slob dpon gcig pas ni/ slob dpon gcig pa'i'o/ /gtam 'dres pas ni/ gtam 'dres pa'i'o/ /phebs par smras pas ni/ phebs
par smra ba'i'o/ /smos 'drin gyis smos 'drin gyi'o/ /'khor dang bral ba/ shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro pa gcig gam/
gnyis sam/ mang po sbyin te/ mthar na dge 'dun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas/ des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig
tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas de mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras
bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/ /des slob ma'i rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas

des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni/ dge
slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byas so/ /da ltar yang byas so/ /gzhan yang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das lhag par nad pa
rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa rnams
la byams par byed pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ yul shi bi pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba

dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med de/ nad pa rnams la ni/ khyad par du byed do/ /ji tsam
na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dpyad byos shig /
de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di'i sman ni/ dkon lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lha/ gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang
khro ma myong ba de'i khrag las nas thug bgyis te zla ba drug tu stsal na/ de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi/ gzhan gyis ni/ ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de'i sman dkon pa ni/
bden no/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na/ bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtags par dka' bar gyur nas/ des ma ma la dris par brtsams pa/ ma ma/ nga dus 'di srid
kyi bar du sngon lan 'ga' yang khros pa yod dam/ gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi par du byon pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su la lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa/ yum/ bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon su la yang 'ga' yang khros pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag
kyang sngon su la yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos/ des bsam pa/ sman rnyed de/ /snyam du rig nas sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /ngas rang la brtags na/ nga sngon su
la yang khro ma myong bas/ nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtor cig /lha/ bdag cag ni/ mi phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bzo'i gnas
dang / las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar te/ khrag de zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la nas thug blud pas sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji
snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan yang shi bi'i rgyal po'i
bu gzhogs phyed bskams par gyur nas/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu'i dpyad kyis shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol
cig /lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad bsags na/ 'di'i yang shang shang te'u'i sha ma rnyed do/ /sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dang / me long dang bya gag khyer te/
rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dengs la/ der rnyi tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long zhog cig dang / bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin no/ /snyam
ste| skad phyung ba dang shang shang te'us bya gag gi skad thos nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de gzung ba'i thabs ni/ 'di yin no/ /de rnams kyis de bzhin du
byas pa las/ ji tsam na/ las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs nas de rnams kyis de khyer te song ngo / /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ 'jig rten gnas pa chags
nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra shes pas srog chags shang shang te'u sa smras pa/ bdag gar bkri/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ thong zhig/
