sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang / rin po che rnams smra'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ re zhig khyod kyis sman de dag ci 'dra bar blta'i/ ston cig /des smras pa/ bdag gis khrus
byas pa'i chu ni/ sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyi/ de khyer la dengs shig /rin po che ni/ 'di dag yin no/ /de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor te shang shang te'u de nyid khyer
te dong pa las/ rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de rnams kyis srog chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang
smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos shang shang te'u la dris pa dang smras pa/ lha/ bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du bgyid pa lags so/ /rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos bkang bar
bzhag go /ji tsam na de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos pa de srid du khrus byas nas/ de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang mod la 'phur te khang pa'i steng du 'dug nas/ 'jigs pa dang bag
tsha ba dang bral te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ re zhig thog ma bdag blun te/ /phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go /de nas rgyal po sman pa ste/ /blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs/ /zhes smras
nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag /shang shang te'us khrus byas pa'i chu de/ sha'i mthu yod par byed pa de bden nam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
lha/ mad lags kyi/ mar dang sgrol cig /de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos te rgyal po'i bu la blud par zhugs so/ /ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya
gnas pa las/ de na gcig gzhogs phyed bskams par gyur to/ /de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ljongs su song la sman pa la smos te sman ston cig dang sos
par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang bo mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad
kyi thun mong gi chos 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/ bdag nad dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir grong khyer gyi mthar 'gro/ de rnams kyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po gsog go/ ji tsam du bsod nams
mang po bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris rnams su yun ring du dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs su babs te/ rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal
po'i pho brang du phyin to/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyi/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags
pa| khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos pa mchis kyi/ bzhud la slongs shig dang / gal te
skal pa'i khyad par gyis bcud de thob na/ des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sgo gar bsdad do/ /rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ slong ba po'i skye bo sbron
du gzhug pa'i phyir sgor rgyun du dril 'dogs te/ gang gi tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol bar byed do/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril de dkrol to/ /de nas
rgyal po'i bus pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum/ slong ba po zhig mchis kyi/ ci zhig slong smros shig /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu/ bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsags te
btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re zhig 'thungs shig dang / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba rma'o/ /de ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas
mar 'thung bar 'dod na/ slong ba po'i skye bo'i re bas lus kyi gnad du phog nas mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/ yab yum/ re zhig slong ba po nang du bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal
pos sgo ba la bsgo ba/ slong ba po nang du thongs shig /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang / sems dang ba dang / spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas/ des
smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci zhig bzhed/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bcud ni/ khyod kho na la 'os kyi/ bdag la ma lags kyi/ dbul gyi/ bzhes shig /des
lhung bzed bzed pa dang / rgyal po'i bu bsam pa drag pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i
sems bskyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni/ 'grub par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag
ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon nu gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta
smos kyang ci dgos/ btsun pa/ rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gnyi ga mnyam du bros thebs la/ mnyam du sos par gyur lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs bsags pa/ rkyen yongs su sgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar
gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/
dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi
khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dag ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las
rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong
khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la bu gnyis yod pa las/ nu bo shos gang yin pa de/ rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to/ /mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las/
nu bo shos gang yin pa de/ mdun na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni/ khams kyi sgo nas shed 'phrod pa yin pas/ de nas phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal
bus smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na/ des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni/ thabs mchis kyi/ snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o/ /
des smras pa/ de ltar bya ste/ gzhug gi /smros shig /des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang / khyod rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /des rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas rgyal
bu phu bo shos/ des sman ma yin pa byin nas zha bor gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis/ de ni/ zha bor gyur to/ /snyam nas/ nu bo shos rgyal por dbang
bskur to/ /des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de/ mdun na 'don du bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing
'dug pa las/ rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo / /des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zha bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas
so| |lha/ bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyi/ gal te lha dgyes na/ 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ gnang gi /byos shig /des
de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to/ /de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la byar byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag gis yon gnas dam pa
'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas/ phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing / zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pa
yang nyams su mi myong bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu gang
yin pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no/ /de gnyis kyis gros byas nas rgyal po gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na/ mnyam du zha bor gyur to/ /yang 'gyod
par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na/ /mnyam du sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag ba rnams kyi rnam
par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dres ma rnams kyi 'dres ma ste/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig
tu nag pa rnams dang / 'dres ma rnams ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag / khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// //
gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod na/ khyim bdag tshong dbon zhes bya ba/ phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi
bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang / chu lha dang /
lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi
mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun pa'i lha dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba
'debs so/ /'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las/ bu pho dang / bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod do/ /de ni/ de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur du
zin na/ re re la yang / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las/ bu
pho dang / bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan
pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho
dang bu mo med pa de'i tshe/ lha thams cad spangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to/ /ji tsam na dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa/ legs par gsungs
pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /bzhin bzang / de bzhin du gyis shig/ ces des de rim gyis skra bregs nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams
pa las/ rims chen pos thebs nas rab tu byung ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ re zhig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing / de'i rim gro bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sus
bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams dang / sman pas so/ /sman pa rnams nyin par sman byas na/ mtshan mo nad la bab par gyur to/ /de rnams
kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di'i dpyad bdag cag gis gdugs la bgyis na/ mtshan mo bro la bab par gyur gyi/ gal te 'di khyim du bskyal na/ bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad
bgyi'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim du skyol la der yang de'i rim gro byed par sbyin par bya'o/ /
de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas/ skra ring por ring por skyes nas/ khyim bdag de/ khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya bar grags so/ /de gang gi tshe rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog
dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las slar la na bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ des bdag ni/ 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang gis cha chod nas/ de na des 'chi kha'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad
glegs bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro/ /de ni/ shi'o/ /blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha/ khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis par gum ste/
de la dbyig dang / gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / go cha la sogs te/ phal mo che zhig mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa nye dga' dbang ba/ glegs bu la ma bris pa yang ma thob na/ glegs bu la bris pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de longs shig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de la ci dag yod/ bar sdom la/ gzhi dang gnas mal gos dang ni/ /lcags nag lcags dang lham mkhan dang / /rdza mkhan 'breg mkhan shing mkhan
sogs/ /tshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang / /rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang / /zas dang btung ba sman dang ni/ /bran dang gdang ba dbang rgya dag /ci rigs par ni bgo bar bya/ /
dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang / /gzhan yang brdungs byas brdungs ma byas/ /dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo 'o zhes/ /drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to/ /dge slong rnams kyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci rigs par bgo bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang / tshong khang gi gzhi dang / gnas mal dang / lcags nag
gi mgar ba'i lag spyad dang / lcags mgar gyi lag spyad dang / rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / bran pho dang / bran
mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / 'bru rnams ni/ mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag par bya'o/ /ras yug
dang / ras yug chen dang / ko sgro dang / mchil lham dang / 'bru mar gyi snod dang / ril ba dang / bya ma bum rnams ni/ dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o/ /mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de
dag ni/ 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o/ /thung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'khar gsil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o/ /khye'u dang bu mo
ni/ dge 'dun gyis mi bsgyur te/ ci rigs pa zhig blangs nas ci bde bar gtang bar bya'o/ /rkang bzhi pa rnams las/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / dre'u rnams ni/ rgyal po
la dbul bar bya'o/ /ba lang dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug rnams ni/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag ste/ mi bgo'o/ /'thab stan dang / go cha dang / gzhan yang / rgyal
po la 'os pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni/ rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o/ /mtshon cha rnams ni/ gzhag la/ de rnams gri'u dang / khab dang / 'khar gsil du brdungs te dge 'dun la brim par
bya'o/ /tshon rnams las/ tshon rtsi chen po gang kus dang / mtshal dang / mthing shing la sogs pa de dag ni/ sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dri gtsang khang du gzhag par bya'o/ /thod le kor dang / btsag
dang / rams ni/ dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /chang ni/ yongs blugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/ tshar gyur na longs spyad par bya'o/ /tshar ma gyur na dor bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /nga
ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyi chang mi sbyin zhing / tha na rtswa mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo / /sman rnams ni/ nad khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing / de nas dge
slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya'o/ /rin po che rnams las mu tig ma gtogs par nor bu dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba la sogs pa ni/ cha gnyis su byas te/ gcig
ni/ chos la'o/ /gcig shos ni/ dge 'dun la'o/ /chos kyi gang yin pa des ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni/ dge
slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /glegs bam rnams las sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi glegs bam rnams ni/ mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod
du bzhugs par bya'o/ /phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos kyi glegs bam rnams ni/ btsongs la bgo bar bya'o/ /chags rgya ni/ myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzas 'ged pa'i
tshe dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhag par bya'o/ /gser dang / dbyig dang / gzhan
yang rdungs su byas pa dang / rdungs su ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ cha gsum du byas te/ gcig ni/ sangs rgyas la'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ chos la'o/ /gsum pa ni/ dge 'dun la'o/ /sangs

rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni/ dri gtsang khang dang / dbu skra sen mo'i mchod rten rnams kyi ral pa dang / 'drums pa slar bcos par bya'o/ /chos kyi gang yin pa des ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri par bya'o//
seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyam yod na'o/ /gang gi tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal gyis chu bzang gi dus ston btsugs pa de'i tshe/ de na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dge slong khrums stod dge
slong mas bkur ba yin pas chu bzang gi dus ston btsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ chu bzang gi dus ston la spyan
'dren gyi/ gshegs so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la bcol/ dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig/
bdag cag gis gzhag par bgyi'o/ /des de rnams la gzhag pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /chen mos kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'o/ /tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang zhig tu bzhag go /de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod chu bzang gi dus ston la 'ongs pa dang / de na dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa
yin pas/ gcig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ deng bdag gis zhal tshus bgyi'o/ /gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang g.yar tshus la bos so/ /gzhan zhig gis smras
pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol cig /de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras so/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi dus ma lags pa'i btung ba
gsol cig /de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras nas/ des de rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir g.yar tshus rnams las cung zad cung zad blangs/ des de bzhin du dro yang
zos/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang / de dag tseg tseg pa yor langs nas de yang lam gyis dub pa des mang por zos nas ma zhu bar gyur te/ bsung de shi'o/ /de
dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /gos 'ged pas nad g.yog la smras pa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos
gos 'on cig /des smras pa/ des bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lag tu bzhag go/ /de rnams la dris pa dang / smras pa/ bdag gis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lag tu bzhag go/ de nas skye
rgu'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go
zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shi ba'i yo byad kyi skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab
par bya'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gaN+DI brdungs la dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/ /'di ltar bya ste/
gnas mal bshams pa byas la/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis
gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong khrums stod gum na/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin dang bcas pa/
kun dga' bo'i sug ba na mchis kyi/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stod gum pa'i
yo byad lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong yang gzhan du gum/ lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/ dngos po'i skyin pa'ang gzhan na mchis na/
de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor/ dngos po'i skyin ba'i dge slong ngam/ khyim pa gang na yod pa'o/ /
gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o/ /dge slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la
dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad bsogs la/ ci 'dres sam ma 'dres par gyur pa de/ brtag par bya'o/ /gal te
'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni/ mchod rten gyir byas la/ mchod rten ni/ dge 'dun gyir gyur na/ de lta bu chos dang mi mthun pa yin pas/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin
dang bcas pa cha gsum du byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun no/ /dge 'dun gyi ni/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang dri
gtsang khang dang / mchod rten gyi lag gi bla'i sar spyad par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya/ seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /gal te 'dres par ma gyur na/
thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing

dong ba las/ rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong zhig shi'o/ /de rnams kyis bsam pa/ gtsug lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs
par spyod pa rnams kyang skal pa 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gi/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dang / rtswa
thun dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing / de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'ged par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i
tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o/ /snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar
brtsams pa dang / dge bskos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur ba smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na
zhes des 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi nang la mtshams
kyi nang du shes te shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams
na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gi 'du shes kyis 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos
pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis
kyis 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/ dge slong des/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad
pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong des yid gcugs par bya ba
ma yin pa la yid gcugs par bskyed de/ 'di ltar/ des gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs par spyad do/ /'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos/
gos dag bskur ba na/ gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ legs par spyad pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /dge
slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed na/ gang la bskur ba de ni/ shi la/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur
ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/ gang gis bskur
ba de ni/ shi la/ gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar
byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ legs par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ nyes
par spyad pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur ba na/ gang la bskur ba de ni/ shi la/ gang la bskur ba de'i shi pa'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/
legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos
gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de yang shi nas gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyod na/ nyes
par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur
par byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de shi la/ gang gis bskur bar byed pa de'ang shi na/ de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs

pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so// //sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/ gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang / /rdol pa dang ni blangs pa dang / /dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi/ /nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang / /bgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis
te| |gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa/ /ston pa blta bar 'dod pa na'ang / /'dam rdzab kyis ni ngal gyur pa/ /de la der ni chos gos gnang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par
dang bcas te/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar
gyur cing / rdul gyis lus g.yogs bzhin du mnyan yod gang na bder rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos
dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
tu 'dug go /chos nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar
mdzad de/ dge slong dag /khyed da gzod gnas 'ongs/ gnas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/ btsun pa/ bdag cag ni/ gnas bcas nas da gzod mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas
bcas na dbyar mchis mchis lags so/ /dge slong dag /khyed cag gnas su ji gang zhes la reg par dbyar gnas sam/ bsod snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa/ mad
par gsol to/ /bdag cag gnas bcas na bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing / bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags so/ /'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos
thogs te rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / rdul gyis lus g.yogs pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi ba na/ tshegs chen pos 'dir
mchis lags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re bdun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ kye ma/ nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug bo
dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / lus rdul gyis g.yogs pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni/ nyon mongs kyi/ ma la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dge slong rnams la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar/ sra brkyang bting na/ phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu las thal na
ma yin pa dang / zla ba las thal na ma yin pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang / blo gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji
tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang / phan yon lnga yod de/ tshogs shing za na ma yin pa dang / yang yang za na ma yin pa dang / khyim rnams su mgron du ma bos par 'gro na
ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring bo nas dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no/ /snyam du dgongs zhes

dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ ngas rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod

par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /'di ltar/ sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu thal na ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting ba
rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar bya'o/ /gding ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ re zhig thog mar mthun
pa'i go ba bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /de nas
phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis
gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sra
brkyang bgyid nas sra brkyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas ba la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang
lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sras brkyang du mdzad de/ chos
gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding ngo / /des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'dir ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnam gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang
sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis ra brkyang 'ding ngo / /des na sras brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la
chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/ gang dag chos gos 'di sras brkyang du bgyi zhing / chos gos 'dis
dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar
bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shing / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis chos gos sras brkyang du mdzad nas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sras brkyang 'ding ste/
des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas 'di

ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni/ sra brkyang 'ding par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi

bya zhing / bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o/ /

gzhan yang / chos lnga dang ldan na/ bsko bar mi bya ste/ spo ba pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o/ /gzhan yang / chos lnga

dang ldan na/ bsko bar mi bya ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sras brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba mi shes pa'o/ /yang / /chos

lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni/ sras brkyang 'ding par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya zhing / bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug
gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o/ /bsko ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas dge
'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spro'am
gal te spro na/ des spro'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong
ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyis sras brkyang 'ding par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang par mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis
dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar
bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding par spro na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/
sra brkyang 'ding par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/ gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'ding
par bsko bar bzo pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge

'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas gsol bas sras brkyang 'ding pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni/ sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'ding par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab
cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /ngas dge slong

sra brkyang 'ding ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sras brkyang 'ding pas sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ bkru'o/ /brkyang ngo / /dra'o/ /drub bo/ /kha sgyur ro/ /chung ngu na
khab kyis srub gnyis sam/ gsum yang btsem par bya'o/ /lan gnyis sam gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
dag /sang kho bos sra brkyang 'ding gi /khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung zhig /de nas sra brkyang 'ding pa'i dge slong gis/ sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis gtor zhing / dri zhim po'i bdug pas
bdugs nas gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+Di brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur
pa dang rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni/ sra brkyang du mdzad
la| bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang / sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ sra brkyang 'ding pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur ro/ /gding
ngo| |bting ngo / /de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces/ /gnas brtan dgongs su gsol
chos gos 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyis sras brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang / sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting
lags so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des/ legs par bting ngo / /shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gi yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya zhing / de bzhin
du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo / /shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gi yin

no| |zhes brjod par bya'o/ /sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te/ chab khung sar ma yin/ snam phyi sar ma yin te/ tshang bang du 'jug par mi bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o
gal te song na/ der gnas par mi bya'o/ /sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tsha bas can du 'gyur ro/ /

de nas sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong gis dpyid zla ra ba zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la yang go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyi/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin gyis

rlobs shig /de la rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ du zhig gi sra brkyang ma bting
lags/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'ding ba

na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o/ /gzhan yang / 'di lnga'i ma bting ba yin te/ spo ba pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i'o/ /

btsun pa/ du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la/ phan yon ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par bcas
pa dang / sra brkyang de 'ding ba na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o/ /gzhan yang / lnga po 'di dag gi ste/ spo ba pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar
bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i'o/ /btsun pa/ du zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis la/ phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga'i ste/ ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /
phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun dbye na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i'o/ /dge
slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag /'ongs pa
legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /ji ga bde bar spyad dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bde bar spyad pa ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig /bdag cag ni/ chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/
bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra brkyang phyung na/ khyed la chos gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o/ /dbyung ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas
mal bshams la gaN+Di brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/
dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/ gal te dge 'dun
gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol
ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom
nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las/ gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa
rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong
chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad de/ gang gi slad du cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de/ bgo bar bya ste/
bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal pa las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya'o/ /sdom la/ rdol pa dang ni sril zos dang /
mtha' skor lhan rlo lhan ring dang / /gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang / /rnying dang spangs dang dengs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun
pa| chos gos rdol pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal pa dang / chos gos cha ga btab pa dang / chos gos
lhan pa rlo bos btab pa dang / chos gos lhan ring can dang / gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos dang / chos gos zegs pa dang / chos gos rnying pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos
dengs pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /sdom la/ blings dang dus ma yin pa dang / /gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ /mi rung ba dang ma dras dang / /
khru lngar ma chog mi bya dang / /blo mthun min dang mi gding dang / /mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/
blings pa'i chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang /
mthang gos dang / mi rung ba'i chos gos dang / ma dras pa dang / khru lnga ma mchis pa dang / blo mthun par ma bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'ding ba ma bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi slad
rol du blo mthun par bgyis pa'i chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'ding bas/ sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /sdom
la| dus kyi dang ni zla ba gsum/ /gsar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid/ /phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ras/ /gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ /btsun pa/ dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang
gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dgung zla gsum 'das nas dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des/ sra brkyangs gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/
rung ngo / /chos gos gsar pa rung ngo / /gsar pa brtags pa rung ngo / /phongs pa'i chos gos rung ngo / /gso ma'i seng ras snam sbyar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang
gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo / /bla gos dang mthang gos kyang de bzhin no/ /sdom la/ gang zag gi dang khyim pa dang / khru lnga pa dang khru
lnga'i lhag /blo mthun byas pa'i gding ba dang / /mtshams kyi nang nyid skye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ gang zag gi chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo / /gal te dge 'dun la
phul bar gyur na'o/ /khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo / /gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo / /khru lnga pas rung ngo / /khru lnga las lhag pas rung ngo / /blo mthun
par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos dang sra brkyang 'ding bas rung ngo / /mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis rung ngo / /mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang
'ding pa bskos pas rung ngo / /ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ song ba dang / rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang / mtshams
'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni/ sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams
pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni/ sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no/ /song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung
ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol
tu song ba de'i ni/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos
gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o//

snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i
ni| nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam nas/
des de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge
slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra
brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas
pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
byas/ chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ong ngam mi 'od snyam pa las/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni/ mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang
phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam
pa las/ de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de/ thams cad kyi thams cad du chad pa de'i ni/ re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang phyung ba nyams
su myong ba de'i ni/ brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid yin no/ /sdom la/ ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang / /brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang / /re ba yod pa nyi shu dang / /re ba med pa nyi shu yin/ /
'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam
du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /
snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu
song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra
brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung
la| des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra
brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong
zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing / 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/
de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting
ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa
de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song
nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs

par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing / 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/

rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas de slar 'ong zhing chos

gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta
ste| dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ des de rtsom zhing
de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi
rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos
nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra
brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam
du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos
gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams
kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag

pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/
thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems

la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /
'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin du mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba

las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i
ni| nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong
zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /

zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang
bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas zhes bya ba thams cad brjod par bya'o/ /'on kyang snga ma'i nyi shu la ni chos gos ma byas/ chos gos
ma zin par zhes bya'o/ /'dir ni/ chos gos ma zin par zhes bya ba bor te/ chos gos brtsams pa zhes bya ba bcug ste/ rnam pa 'dis nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting
ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa'i re ba yod pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on

kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dge
slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa'i re ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/

slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis/ snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/ /sdom la/ bya
ba dag ni bcu gnyis dang / /btsal ba dang ni de bzhin gzhan/ /yul la lngar ni bya ba ste/ /gnas mal yang ni lnga yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos

gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs

pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos

gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting

ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams

ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos
gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /

shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma
zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam
pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /der song nas zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams
pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig gi ched la mtshams kyi phyi
rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha'
can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /sems la the tshom za bas rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa'i ji lta bar nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha'
can yang de bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par brtsal ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/
slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
phyung ba yin no/ /btsal ba'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du bcu gnyis pa gzhan no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
gos ma zin par slar mi 'ong bar yul bltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni/ song ba'i mtha' can kyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i
gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par yul bltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba las/ de 'di
snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i
mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no/ /yul lta ba'i lnga ji lta bar gnas lta ba'i lnga yang de bzhin no/ /sra brkyang gi gzhi rdzogs so// //
'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re brgyad pa/ bam po drug bcu brgyad pa/ko'u sham+b+hi'i gzhi'i sdom ni/ ko'u sham+b+hir ni 'thab krol gyi/ dge slong rtsod pa sna tshogs dang / /khye'u dang

rtsod par byed pa dang / /ring po len gyi spyod pa dang / /ngan spong lan cha khang pa dang / /bsrungs dang tshal stug glang chen dang / /ma 'gag pas ni de byas dang / /mnyan yod du ni zhi bar byas/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hi'i dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/
ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no/ /yangs pa can na/ yangs
pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon
pa| mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong dus gzhan zhig na/ ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / ko'u sham+b+hir phyin te/ de lam gyis
dub pa ngal sos nas/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gi drung du song ste son ba dang / phan tshun so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa rnams gtan
la dbab par brtsams te/ de na gcig gis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni/ 'di skad du gdon par bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin no/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni/ de skad du gdon

par mi bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni/ 'di ma yin no/ /kho bo'i ni/ rigs so/ /khyod kyi ni/ mi rigs so/ /kho bo'i ni/ 'brel ba yin no/ /khyod kyi ni/ 'brel ba ma yin no/ /zhes de gnyis phan tshun du ma
mthun par gyur nas/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gis yangs pa can gyi dge slong la klan ka tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go/ dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba byas te/ gang gis khrus kyi

bum pa chu 'grib pa dang / nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong ba des chus bkang ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba'am/ dge bskos la khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go/ zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /gal
te bdag nyid kyis ma bkang ngam/ dge bskos la ma bsgo bar gyur na/ de ni/ ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chag su gzhug go zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam
na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /de na dge slong kha cig ni/ zas la dong ngo / /kha cig ni/ 'gro bar chas so/ /yangs pa can
gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blangs nas snam phyi sar zhugs pa dang / de'i lhan cig gnas pas rings rings ltar 'ongs nas sgra phyung ba/ mkhan po/ dge slong kha cig ni/ zas la dong lags so/ /
kha cig ni/ 'dong bar chas kyi/ tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /de de dang lhan cig khrus kyi bum pa gnas gcig tu bzhag ste chas so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong de yang phyogs
de nyid du phyin pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong des khrus kyi bum pa blangs te/ gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/ mkhan po gar bzhud/ des
smras pa/ bu/ kho bo la ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'di klan ka chog pas khrus kyi bum pa 'gangs su 'gro'o/ /ci/ 'di thams cad kyi thams cad du stong ngam/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong pa
ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu 'dis chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so/ /mkhan po/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong par ma gyur pas 'tshal te/ bdag cag ni/ mkhan po'i phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs
bgyid pa lags kyi/ tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /des de nyid du bzhag nas de dang lhan cig tu dong ngo / /ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gis mthong nas/ khrus kyi bum pa de la mnams so/ /de nas mi bzod pa
skyes te/ 'jal to zhes byas nas khrus kyi bum pa bkang ste chu'i bya ba byas nas song ngo / /de nas zan zos nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsgrags

pa| tshe dang ldan pa dag/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong des/ dge 'dun gyi nang khrims dral to/ /de nas rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas nas rim gyis de'i drung du son pa dang smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa skabs phye zhig/ ltung ba ris lnga la skabs phye'o/ /khyod la de ring ltung ba byung gi/ ltung ba yang slar chos bzhin du gyis shig/ ltung ba ma mthong ngo / /dge 'dun gyis khrims su bca' ba
gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'grib pa dang / chu nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong na/ bdag nyid kyis chus bkang ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba'am/ dge bskos la tshe dang ldan pa/
khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang la dge bskos la yang ma bsgo na/ de ni/ ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed
kyi ltung ba 'chags su gzhug go/ zhes bcas pa ma yin nam/ des smras pa/ de ha cang stong pa ma yin no/ /stong par ma gyur kyang rung ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so/ /de cang mi smra bar
'dug go/ ko'u sham+bi'i dge slong ni/ ko'u sham+b+hi na gnyug ma pa dang / 'khor mang po yin pas/ des de la nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams
'khrugs par gyur nas/ de na ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams dang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/
ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no/ /zhes gang yang ltung ba byung ba dang / ltung ba med pa dang / gnas nas dbyung ba dang /
gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin pa la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas phyung ngo zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /
gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang /
rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bden nam/ btsun pa
mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /gzhan yang / ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu
spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas nas phyung bas 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 'di ni/ gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo
sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin
pa yin te/ gal te bdag gis ltung ba chos bzhin slar ma byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag
gis ltung ba phyir chos bzhin du bya'o/ /gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
ro| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su
phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang
rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di
lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed
cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /gzhan yang / ngas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i
dge slong gis 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong 'di ni/ gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa
dang / ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ 'di'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin gyi/ gal te bdag gis de
la mi 'dod pa gleng ngam dran par byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di la mi
'dod pa gleng bar mi bya/ dran par mi bya'o/ /gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung
bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas
bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed la ngas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas
shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma
'gyed cig /dge slong dag /khyed cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing gnas nas/ las su bya ba gang dag yin pa gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye
dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas pa rnams ma byas pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing / dge slong dag /khyed dang dge slong de rnams su de rnams
dang khyed du tha dad du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /gnyis po 'di dag ni/ tha dad par gnas pa yin te/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i
gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong / dge slong
rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na ched du bsam ste/ chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs
su 'gro ba ste/ de lta bu ni/ bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no/ /dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun
gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi byed pa dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor bar gnas nas dbyung ba ste/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin no/ /dge
slong dag /gnyis po 'di dag ni/ mthun par gnas pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis
chos kyis bzhag pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong / dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa
dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na/ ched du bsam ste/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs nas chos kyi phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni/ bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid
mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no/ /dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa dang / phyir mi byed pa
dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa ni/ dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas nas phyung ba'i
dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas gnas nas 'byin pa'i
dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to/ /dge slong dag /ngas de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong
ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa
dang | 'gyed pa byung bas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi
dge 'dun ni/ dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs te/ bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas rdzas
kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas skabs 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar
bzhed nas/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de na rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong

rnams zas kyi phyir khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo / /
zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de ni/ phan tshun rdeg pa la zhugs so/ /de nas dge slong bsod snyoms nod pas bsod snyoms khyer nas bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bsod snyoms mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug go /chos nyid kyis/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong
ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod pa'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas sam/ zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang
dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong / ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa med
par dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas bsod pas tshim par bgyis na/ 'on kyang rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams sdum pa'i nang du 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa
dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ni/ phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs lags so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ nang du yang dag par 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kha zas la khyim du zhugs pa na 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung
ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas de ni phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru
zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /gzhan yang / ngas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ rgol ba dang /
phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas gang du lus kyi kun du spyod par rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs mi 'byung bar stan par chad yod par
'dug par bya'o/ /rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs na/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas
gnas pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'thab krol ma
byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /dge slong dag /khyed cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas nas
rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di med do/ /dge slong dag /khyed cag 'thab krol
med pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / 'gyed pa med par gyur cing gnas na rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang /
zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di yod do/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po ring po len gnyis phan
tshun rtsod par gyur te/ rgyas par ni/ lung bar ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i le'u las ring po len gyi mdo 'byung ba bzhin no/ /de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
'di skad ces/ tshangs sbyin rga ba sdug bsngal te/ /nor rnams yongs su gtugs pa dang / /gnyen rnams kyang ni ma mthong dang / yul gzhan shi ba sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
zhig kyang mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshig mi mthun la phyogs mnyam yang / /'di gtso min zhes sems byed pa/ /dge 'dun
dbye bar gyur na ko/ mthu chung cung zad cis mi bsam/ /srog chags rus pa gcog pa dang / /rta dang ba lang nor 'phrog dang / /yul 'khor phung bar byas rnams kyang / /'dum par
'gyur ba nyid yod na/ /chos 'di rnam par shes gyur pa/ /khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur/ spyod yul ston par byed pa'i gsung / /chags las ldog pa lhur len pa/ /brtags
na mkhas par snang ba ni/ /gang la rtsod pa de ma shes/ /gzhan dag bdag cag 'di la ni/ /brtson zhes bya bar mi shes kyi/ /gang dag gis ni 'di shes pa/ /de la gzu bo mi
dgos so/ /bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang / /bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/ /de la gang dag 'khon 'dzin pa/ /de dag sha 'khon zhi mi 'gyur//
bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang / /bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/ /de la gang dag 'khon mi 'dzin/ /de dag sha 'khon zhi bar 'gyur/ /'khon du 'dzin pas sha 'khon dag/
'dir ni gzhan yang zhi mi 'gyur/ /bzod pas sha 'khon zhi 'gyur ba/ /'di ni g.yung drung chos yin no/ /'khon du 'dzin pas sha 'khon nam yang zhi mi 'gyur/ /'khon du 'dzin
med rnams kyi sha 'khon zhi bar 'gyur/ /'khon la chags pa lus can rnams la phan mi 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa 'khon du 'dzin mi byed/ gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan
cig spyod pa dang / /legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par gyur na ni/ /zag par 'gyur ba thams cad zil gyis mnan byas nas/ /de dang yid dga' dran dang ldan zhing spyad par bya//
gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang / /legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par ma gyur na/ /rgyal pos yul 'khor rgya chen spangs par gyur ba bzhin/ /gcig pur
'dug par bya zhing sdig pa rnams mi bya/ /gal te btsal te bdag 'dra ba'am/ /lhag par rnyed par ma gyur na/ /byis pa stongs mor 'gyur med pas/ /gcig pur spyad pa brtan
par spyad/ /gcig pu spyod pa legs 'gyur gyi/ /byis pa bstangs pa legs min pas/ /ma tang dgon pa'i glang chen ltar/ /sems las bsnyungs te gcig pus spyad/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ chos kyi rje lags/ /bde bar gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi rje
lags na/ 'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang / mi snyan pa mchi na/ bdag cag gis de rnams la ci'i slad du bzod par bgyi lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong de rnams kyi spyod tshul dang log par sgrub pa des/ thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab pas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu
zhing gshegs/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams dang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'di lta bu'i spyod lam du gyur te/ snga dro ni/ zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la 'jug/
zas kyi 'og tu ni/ sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des lo bcu gnyis 'das so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi'i bram ze
dang khyim bdag rnams 'dun khang du 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la na bza' chos gos
dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dbul bar shin tu dad na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod yul 'di lo bcu
gnyis kyi bar du spangs te/ da dung yang ma byon no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs par ga la 'gyur/ 'di na da ltar ko'u sham+b+hi'i
dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa 'di lta bur byed de/ snga dro zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la zhugs la/ zas kyi 'og tu sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed
do| |kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ de rnams la nyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang bdag cag gis lan te/ bdag cag gis de rnams la bsod snyoms byin
