kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po yongs su gtang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag/ khyod
gal te 'gyod pa skyes na/ gser dang dbyig khyer cig /kun dga' ra ba ni/ nga nyid kyi yin no/ /gzhon nu/ bdag ni/ 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'di sems shing / yud tsam zhig
cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'dir bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin
snyam mo/ /de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/ chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la
da ltar khyim bdag 'di/ kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po chen po yongs su gtong ngo / /snyam du bsam nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag/
ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byin cig/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin
nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang rtsig tu bcug go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig par brtsams pa
dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas bslangs pa'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis dge
sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsigs shig /ci'i phyir/ kho bo cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i ni/ rgyal po'i khab yin no/ kho bo cag ni/ mnyan yod yin no//
des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas/ bdag gang la mngon par dga' ba'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go /de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang / de la
yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi rtol can/ mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod 'dod rgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u
ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig /des smras pa/ rung gi/ re zhig 'phags

pa shA ri'i bu kho na la brtag go /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal
nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ mu stegs can
rnams 'di skad ces/ khyim bdag khyod 'dod rgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug
lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ ci/ 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsam pa las/
yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na/ bdag kho na la rag las par mthong ngo / /yang bsam pa/ ci/ 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar
'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las/ yod de/ dus ji srid cig na tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/ zhag bdun lon nas so/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ khyim
bdag/ de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'i/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / mu
stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag/ shA ri'i bu na re/ rung gi/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de rnams bsam pa/ 'di
la ni/ rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang na ni/ de 'bros 'dod do/ /yang na ni/ de phyogs tshal 'dod do/ /de ma yin na/ dus der gdab ci dgos/ bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo/ /zhes de
rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas de rnams kyi de la smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
yin gyi/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gi brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na/ de phyogs tshol gyi/ khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig /dus ji tsam zhig na/ 'di nas
zhag bdun pa'i nyin par ro/ /rung gi/ /de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus pa byung ba de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig /mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang / sems khral skyes nas nyin re
zhing phyogs tshol ba dang nyi ma bgrang bar byed do/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng+ge'i khri bshams so/ /yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyang 'dus so/ /mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /
de'i nyen kor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni/ ngo mtshar skyes/ kha cig ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas dran pa sngon du btang ste spyod lam zhi
bas seng+ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug pa dang / 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ mu stegs can rnams
la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /re zhig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis bya'i/ /khyod kyis bshig cig /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ gal
te bdag gis byas na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'jig mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsam nas kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /khyod kyis byos shig /ngas gzhig go /de mig 'phrul la byang ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus

rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun rnam par gtor te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to/ /de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus

glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas des de kun tu brnal nas ming gi lhag ma zhig bzhag go /des sprul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te/ des de
blangs so/ /des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur bas btab pa las/ nyes par sbyar ba'i ro langs ni/ bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de nyid bsnyegs
pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag /phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas 'phags pa/ skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ yongs su

bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur ba phyung ba dang ro langs de zhi bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/ 'phags
pa shA ri'i bu/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par
spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin pa dang / des brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/
nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang

dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang /
mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni/ smra ba'i khyu
mchog chen po tshar bcad do/ /snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams
dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas so/ /de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha
cig ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/ /kha cig /
gis ni/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig
gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la
'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di bdag cag gis shags kyis tshar gcad par mi nus kyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du
gla mi'i las byas la de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o/ /snyam nas thams cad 'dus te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song nas son pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag / khyod
kyis bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas

pas yul bor na mi rung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag par bya'o/ /zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin
pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ mu stegs can rnams kyis mchid nas/ bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas na snying brtse bar
gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo / /zhes mchi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
ri'i bus ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsam pa la zhugs na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag las snyam na/ bdag kho na la'o/ /snyam nas/ des
bsam ste smras pa/ khyim bdag /de la 'gal pa ci yod kyi/ de bzhin du gyis shig /de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla mi'i las bya bar brtsams pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag
thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shI ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag
cing 'dug pa las/ de rnams kyis de mthong nas de rnams kyis bsam pa/ dben pa na 'dug pas 'di gsad pa'i dus ni/ 'di yin no/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong nas bskor te
'dug go /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa dang / 'di rnams sems ci 'dra ba zhig gis bdag gi drung du lhags snyam na/ ji tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par mthong nas/ des
lcag thogs de rbad nas/ des de rnams las bos dang zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus bskyab tu gsol/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ re
zhig song la ngal bsor chug cig /de rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni/ 'di gsad par bsam na/ 'di ni/ bdag cag la byams par sems
so/ /snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so

sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ste smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams
ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis/ brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa/ g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa
dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par
gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dang
ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur

sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bus/ gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum par brtsams
so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par
'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur
to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te de lta na/ de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang pa dang lhag par sems mngon par
dad par bgyi'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ yang thig skud de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas
te/ dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis/ gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang
phran drug cu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras pa/
'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na bshul tshad ji tsam du 'byon par 'gyur/ /khyim bdag/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad tsam mo/ /'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grangs bcu'i lam du 'gro'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med
zas sbyin gyis/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsigs nas zha sa dag byed du bcug /sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag rtsig tu
bcug /dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis brgyan/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab /shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag nye bar
bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug /dus dang thun tshod kyis sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go /de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje/ tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ /bskyod pa yang ngam/
'tsho'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la/ 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / snyun dpyad kyis rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi bskur sti bgyid do/ /zhes kyang
gsol cig /jo bo/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas/ /rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa
dang / de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi des bcom ldan
'das la gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o/ /kye/ mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ /bcom ldan
'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la zhes bya ba nas bkur sti bgyid do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi des
bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhig ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor

'dod chags dang bral ba/ dang ba 'khor dang ba/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i glang po che'i phug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / seng+ge'i mche ba can gyi
tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / ngang ba'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / bram ze slob ma'i
tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor
ba lta bu dang / ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / tshong dpon skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /
'khor los bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang / yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis
bskor ba lta bu dang / 'phags skyes bo grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis
bskor ba lta bu dang / thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs
kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu dang / sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu dang / glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod
lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan cing / dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i
'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs chen
po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs
'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs
g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub
phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'
bar gyur nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung zhing / nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas ni/ steng
nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang / ta
ma la'i lo ma dang / lha'i me tog mnad ra ba rnams 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ya mtshan 'di lta bu
dag byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang / dog pa rnams ni/ yangs par gyur to/ /dma' mo rnams ni/ mthon por gyur to/ /mthon po rnams mnyam par gyur to/ /glang po che yang
skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin te/ khang pa na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/ /long ba rnams kyis ni/ mig thob bo/ /
'on pa rnams kyis ni/ rna bas thos so/ /lkugs pa rnams kyis ni/ smra shes par gyur to/ /dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni/ dbang po rnams tshang bar thob bo/ /chang gis myos pa rnams ni/ myos
pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa rnams ni/ dug zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni/ byams pa thob par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni/ bde bar btsas par gyur
to/ /btson du bcings pa rnams ni/ bcings pa las thar to/ /nor med pa rnams ni/ nor rnyed de/ 'di dag dang / gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo
mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid
la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de
'dzag tu ma btub nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsam pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas pa med de/ 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyi/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig /des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug ste sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag
lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal rjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal rjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsam pa/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ dge slong dag /'di ni/ rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no/ /zhes der ming thog ma smos pa mdzad do/ /gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der/
bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin
po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go /de bzhin du sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang / mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes gdags par byas so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di sngon nam phul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sngon byung
ba/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir
gshegs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags drug gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul te de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo zhig
de bsten pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la shin tu dad pa skyes nas/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten rtsig
tu bcug ste/ des bsam pa/ gang gis na/ bdag gis 'di nyid mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam pa dang / de la brten pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na 'dug pa zhig
gis nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skyes su bskur nas/ des de mchod rten la brtags pa dang / de'i mthus des dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten de nyid mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo / /de nas
dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar sa phyogs 'di bdag gi zhang pos rgyal bu gzhon nu las gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
gzigs/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang sa phyogs 'di/ gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i spyan sngar bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon
sum du byas par gyur cig /ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin
no/ /de tshun chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa la ston pa gtsug tor can zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor
dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum nor bu gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu
las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de
gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa de nyid la ston pa
thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe
khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di rgyang grags gnyis su mu tig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med
zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de
'khor dge slong bzhi khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di ba lang gis bkang bas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta

ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo sum khri thub pa na/ ston pa gser thub ces bya ba
nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong sum khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba
byung ste/ des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong
dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid

yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo

zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong nyid khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag chu stod ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags phyed gser gyis
bkram pas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag chu stod ces bya bar
gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /dge slong dag /da ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
ston pa/ ston pa nga yang 'jig rten du byung nas nga 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na/ da ltar yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ rmon pa dor bcu drug gis smos pa'i

khyon bye ba gshibs pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las nyos te nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/

ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang / ther 'bum chen po phrag drug phyogs 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/
des phyogs 'di dpag tshad gsum gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung

ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam
na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid/ khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag bo dang
bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas/ kun tu khyim bdag mgon med
zas sbyin gyis/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye

ba na yod pa mthong ngo / /zhes grags so/ /de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod ba pa dang / kun tu rgyu sna tshogs rtog khang du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams/ 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi
gtam dag gleng bar byed/ shes ldan dag/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu

na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u phyugs sten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur
nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod cig dang / kho bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na/ gter bdag po dang bcas
pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba brtags la khyed la smra bar
bya'o/ /zhes de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro ba dang 'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len cing / rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ngo / /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin/ chu bo a dzi ra ba tir khrus byas nas byung ba la/ des de'i rgyab tu thal mos brgyab pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go /des smras pa/
khyim bdag /khyod ni/ mkhas pa yin zhing / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang ldan pa yin pa des na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang /
gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo / /des mu stegs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang / mu stegs can kha ngom can rnams kyis kyang kun tu smras pas/
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ bzod pa dang / des pa dang ldan pas/ des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag
rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo / /zhes kun tu sgra grags pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mu stegs can brgya stong phrag bye bas kyang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan na/ gter mthong bar 'gyur ba shes par sla ba ma
yin no/ /'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra ba dang / dbyig gi skad yod de/ des na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag med pa
dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo // //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po
don drug pa/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci
zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags
pas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi
rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas
shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs

dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ ri bor zhig na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing

rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ des sos ka'i dus la bab pa'i tshe me tog gi shing rnams 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang /

rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi gzhir nang mi dang lhan cig dong ngo / /sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ rang sangs
rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig

ljongs rgyu zhing song na ri bor der phyin nas/ de skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/ skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis khyim bdag de la smras pa/ dpon po/ phyogs 'di na rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i
bdag nyid can zhig bzhugs so/ /des thos nas/ de yid dga' bar gyur cing dad pa skyes te/ bdag gi skyed mos tshal na 'di 'dra ba'i rab tu byung ba gnas pa ni/ bdag skal ba can yin no snyam
mo/ /bdag nyid chen po de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas khyim bdag des mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang /
gnyen dang / nang mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bkur sti chen po byas nas bsregs te/ me de'o mas bsad nas rus pa de rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du rin po
che dang bsres te blugs pa dang / rus pa de rnams 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de nas des drung du gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin po che dang bsres
nas shin tu 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing / dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig /ces byas so/ /dge
slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa
gang yin pa de dang / khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bor gyur pa na des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang
yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam
par smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag 'di
ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gnag pa dang 'dren ma gang yin pa rnams ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//

bar gyi sdom ni/ rgyal dang rgyas pa chu dang ni/ /srid sbyin dang ni phur bu dang / /chu stod dang ni zas sbyin dang / /phyi ma pa ni nor bzang yin/ /dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang ni/ /gsum pa nor bu mu
tig yin/ /ba dang nas dang gos dang ni/ /bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba'i gshibs pas gshibs nas/ gzhan nu rgyal byed las
nyos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe/ yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags na/ de rnams las
kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas/ smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi slad du/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gzhi cung zad rtsig go/ dge slong rnams
kyis smras pa/ rin gyis sa nyos la rtsigs shig/ 'phags pa/ rin ji tsam stsal lags/ dbyig 'di snyed do/ /'phags pa/ re zhig 'di snyed kyi 'byor pa bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/
de lta mod kyi/ gal te phyogs 'di thob na brtsig go/ zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la
rtogs la gal te/ byin na rtsigs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brtags pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te bdag la brten te bram
ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge 'dun gyi phyir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na stsal to/ /gang zag gi phyir bgyid na mi stsal to/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ni/ brtsig par bya'o/ /gang zag gi phyir ni/ yon
bdag la brtags te/ gal te byin na/ brtsig par bya'o/ /ma byin na/ brtsig par mi bya'o/ /glo bur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na/ de rnams
smos 'drin ji lta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du dong ba dang / gzhan dag la smos 'drin med pa de dag phongs par gyur nas/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo
bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ ji tsam na ri bor
der dbyar gyi nor legs su 'jigs pa byung nas/ de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas dgag dbye ma byas par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams dge slong rnams kyis lam
gyis dub pa ngal bsor bcug ste/ lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag cag la gnas mal skos shig/ de rnams kyis dbyar gyi nang logs yin
no/ /snyam nas ma bskos pa dang / glo bur ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed da ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs pa bzhin du bstan
pa nub par byed dam ci/ gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal byin cig /de rnams 'on kyang ma bskos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam
bca' bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing dbyar zla tha chung la dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bca' bar
bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam na 'jigs pas ral pa'i
dge slong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas
'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' ba bcas kyi/ gsum pa ni/ ma yin no/ /'jigs pas ral pa'i dge
slong rnams kyang / smos 'drin ji lta ba bzhin du ngal bsor gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su sko bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams
las su bsko bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis de rnams la rnyed pa byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis kha
zas kyi rnyed pa yang ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la kha zas kyi rnyed pa ni/ sbyin gyi/ gos kyi rnyed pa ni/ ma yin no/ /dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug
lag khang mang du brtsigs pa las/ mnyan yod na dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de rnams stong par 'dug pas sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i
bsod nams med cing nal phrug rnams kyi gnas su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad bgo bar bya ste/ re res kyang so sor gnyis sam/ gsum mam/
bzhi ci ran par thams cad la longs spyad par bya ste/ la lar ni/ snga dro 'dug par bya'o/ /la lar ni/ nyi ma'i gung la'o/ /la lar ni/ phyi dro'o/ /la lar ni/ nub mo gnas par
bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las ma byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te grub na/ de lta na
legs/ gal te ma grub par gyur na/ dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o/ /gal te mi nus par gyur na/ ci tsam nus pa de tsam bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni/ btang snyoms su gzhag par
bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams gnas khang gis phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyis bgo bar bya ste/ chu snod gzhag pa dang / 'dag chal dang / sman dang / so shing gzhag pa dang / phan tshun gyi them skas ma gtogs par
chung ngu na 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams cad kyis 'dra bar bgo bar bya ste/ nye 'khor ni/ spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag/ dgon pa
dang / shing drung dang / khang stong dang / ri sul dang / brag phug dang / rtswa'i stan dang / bla gab med pa dang / dur khrod dang / nags mtha' dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su
bsam gtan gyis shig/ /phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig/ ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe/ dge slong kha cig dgon pa bar
dam bcas nas dgon pa na gnas pa las/ de rnams de na chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to/ /gtogs nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim rnams
su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / gdon pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang / dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang
chos gos bzhag nas sgo bcad de lde mig blangs nas song ba dang / dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gsal bar
dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /nye dgas khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas/ de ni/ de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs
pa de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni/ bdag nyid kyis khyer ro/ /ji tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa dang / des gtsug lag khang de stong par mthong nas/ des dris
pa/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge slong nye dga'i yin no/ /de de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang / des smras pa/ gtsug lag 'dir 'dug la/ rnyed pa
gang yin pa de ni/ kho bo'i yin no/ /de der gnas te/ des gtsug lag khang de lan 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byas/ ba'i lci ba gsar ba'i byug bsam byugs so/ /de ji tsam zhig na gtsug lag
khang de nas song ngo / /dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs te/ des kyang nye dga' las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang / gtsug lag khang de phyag dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas/ des de

phyags nas phyag dar bor te/ phyags ma 'dzin bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod phyags
ma lag pa na thogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/ phyags ma de mi gzhag gam/ des smras pa/ 'di na lag pa srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas gnas pa lta ste/ des phyags ma'i rjes kyang med
do/ /des smras pa/ 'di na dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig gnas gnas so/ /ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so/ /des smras pa/ rnyed pa ni/ nye
dgas khyer la/ de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya'am zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ rnyed pa su khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang /
dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na/ khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/ des de yon bsngo ba thos nas de de'i drung du song ste smras
pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug lag khang brtsigs na/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam/ des smras pa/ rtsigs shig dang legs par bsngo'o/ /ji
tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig tu bcug nas/ des der ci yang ma bzhag go /des stong pa nyid du 'dug pa ji tsam na khyim bdag des mthong nas des gtsug lag khang
du 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na/ de na su yang mi bzhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang mi
snum pas so/ /khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ tshwa rgo can/ dgon dung la brtsigs pa la ga la snum par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de la bsam nas kho bo smra ba ma yin te/
'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de ni/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug chen bskon no/ /nye dgas rnyed pa 'thob bo/ /snyam
nas gral rim gyis bab pa na rang gi skal bar blangs nas de ni gzhan nyid na gnas te/ de ni stong par 'dug go/ ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du
'ongs pa des/ gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas/ des dge slong dag la dris pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yin mod kyi/
dge slong nye dga'i skal par dbang ngo / /de nye dga'i drung du song nas/ khyod kyi skal pa'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go /des smras pa/ de bzhin byos shig /de de na gnas pa na bsod
snyoms pa de/ mkhas pa snyoms las mi byed pa zhig yin pas/ des de nyi ma re rer byug pa dang phyag dar byas so/ /phyag dar byed pa la ni/ phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid
sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dang par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang / lus zhig nas bde
'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang / phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa/
des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na/ gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes
te/ des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen bskon pa nye dgas thos nas de rings par rings par song ste smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di
kho bos skal ba yin gyi/ ras yug chen kho bo la byin cig /bsod snyoms pas bsam pa/ chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'on kyang mthus khyer nas
bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa ni/ de kho na'i yin no/ /dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni/ nye dga'i yin no/ /'jig rten pa ni/ yon tan la
dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang / bu dang / chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la mgron du 'bod par byed do/ /dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la khyim rnams su dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang
nas brkus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bcad la lde mig blangs la 'dong bar bya'o/ /ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang lde mig byas te
brkus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ma'i dge slong bzhag la 'dong bar bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par bya'o/ /ma byin pa len pa rnams kyis dge
slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/ des sgo phye zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam rims med ces brda bya'o/ /gal te rims dang bcas so/ /
zhes zer na/ mi dbye'o/ /'on te rims med ces smra na/ dbye bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang / dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag/ lo ma ltar mnyen pa ni/ khyi yin te/ de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dgon pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang /
gtsug lag khang sder mos brud cing / bshad ba dang gci bas ma rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas dge slong khyi bsrel ba'i kun
tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi bsrel bas nang par sngar langs la mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang byul bar bya ste/ sder brud pa gang yin pa de
bsnyam par bya'o/ /bshang ba dang gci ba yang phyag dar bya'o/ /dge slong khyi bsrel bas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug
par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang / ji tsam na der dge 'dun gyi gnas
brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas nye dgas bsam pa/ bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las/ gnas brtan gnyis par bya ba'am/ bdag gtsug lag
khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam du bsam pa las/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa
de/ de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brgan gyi yin nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la/ bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na/ spogs med par dge 'dun
gyi gnas brtan gyis ci zhig bya zhes/ de slar rings pa rings par gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal phyed bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des
smras pa/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to/ /zhes de ma bskos pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa dag/ ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ ci/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig/ ces pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song song ba zhig yin na/ de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko
bar bya'o/ /gzhan gyi ni/ gar bab pa bzhin du'o/ /nye dga' lhag par chags pas gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su
dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ des dbyar gnas nas rnyed pa mnos pa dang gcig nas kyang ma thob/ gcig shos nas kyang ma thob nas gnas mal 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams la kha zer
ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la rnyed pa byin cig/
dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gcig nas byin pa
dang / dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na/ ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin zhes pa'i
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyed
phyed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o/ /dam bca' bar byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag cig
gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/ gcig ni/ dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no/ /gcig shos ni/ grong mtha' pa rnams kyi lan no/ /khyim bdag de'i kun tu
spyod pa ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas/ de ras yug chen rnams khyer te/ dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug
lag khang du song ba dang / nye dgas dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul lo/ /zhes thos nas des dga' bo la sling pa/ gal te 'dir rnyed pa 'bul na/ skal ba
nos shig ces smras nas/ de rings pa rings par dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsam pa/ 'o ni/ gom stangs dang sbyar
na/ dgon pa ba'i gtsug lag khang der song gi/ da ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las/ re zhig grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la/ phyis 'dir dbul lo/ /snyam
nas/ de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/ dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang / khyim bdag des ras yug po che gcig byin no/ /yang bzed pa dang / khyim bdag
gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod la ras yug po che phul lags na/ ci/ yang bzhed dam/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye dgas dbyar gnas pas de'i
skal pa nod do/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa mdzad pas/ rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo/ /de skyengs
nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ nye dgas bsam pa/ khyim bdag de ring zhig thogs na grong gi mthar ma song grang snyam du bsam nas/ grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo
la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag gi ras yug po che mnos sam/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa ba'i gtsug lag khang du song ste ras
yug po che brims nas song ngo / /nye dgas yang slar dgon pa ba'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na/ ji tsam na ras yug po che rnams brims zin pa dang / de gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa
la lhag par chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams nas/ mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nye dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag par chags pas zas chad par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung
ba| 'bab chu'i ngos gnyis na gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod de/ gcig na ni/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o/ /gcig shos na ni/ bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o/ /ji tsam na khyi
gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa zhig yod de/ de gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yod pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin pa dang / des
de zos nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ der yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos nas dga' mgur 'gro'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams
la glo bur gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas de rnams kyis sngar gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / khyi des gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/ chu brgal bar brtsams te des dbus su phyin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi
rnyed pa can gyi gtsug lag khang gi gaN+DI yang brdungs nas de spro ba med nas slar log par brtsams pa las/ de chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to//
dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur
to| |da ltar yang lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lhag par chags par mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can
du 'gyur ro/ /sdom la/ 'thab dang nad pa rdzogs pa dang / /nub mo'i dus dang ka shi dang / /shing dang gsing ma 'dug gnas dang / /cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par
bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing / de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas mtho 'tsham pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/ dran par bgyid do/ /zhes thos na/ de rnams
kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo / /zhes thos na gnas mal bsko ba
gsum dang gnas mal gzung ba drug bya'o/ /gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o/ /gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug
lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun
dga'i ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag skos shig /ces zer na/ 'di bskos zin to/ /zhes brjod par bya zhing /
gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di
yang bskos zin to/ /kun dga'i ra ba skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /zhes brjod par bya'o//
de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na/ gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/ de nas bsngo ba rnams med/ phyir rgol ba rnams med/ mi mdza' ba rnams med nas/ de'i 'og tu rgan
rim ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig
cig yod pa de bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/ de ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas khang gzhan ni/
ma thob bo/ /dge slong des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ gnas khang 'di kho bo'i yin par bskos kyi byung zhig /des smras pa/ bdag bro 'tshal bas nam sos pa na'o/ /dge slong de gtum po
zhig pas des phyung nas/ gang dgar bzhag go /ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis/ dge slong de mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/
'phags pa dag /ci/ dge slong 'di gum lags sam/ bzhin bzang dag /'di shi ba ni/ ma yin no/ /'o na ci'i phyir 'dir bzhag /'di bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/
'di'i gnas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang / des 'di phyung nas 'dir bzhag go /'phags pa dag /bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir khyim nas mi 'byin na/
khyed cag rab tu byung la/ ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/ de ji ltar nad pa phyir 'byin par byed ces de rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge
slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas 'jal to/ /zhes byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /ji tsam na
zhag drug gam/ bdun na gnas mal 'gyed par 'gyur ba na/ rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas te gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang / gnas khang 'gyed pa'i dge
slong rnams kyis nad pa yin no/ /snyam nas de'i gnas mal bskos so/ /de gnas mal bskos zin nas rma'i g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go /nad pa lta ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la
dris pa/ ci/ gnas brtan zhabs snyun sos sam/ de smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa'o/ /zhes bka' ma stsal tam/ ci/ kho bo'i nad rtag
par gyur tam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan myur du sos par gyur pa/ na bar sgyu ni/ ma btab grang / des smras pa/ kho bo gnas khang sgo drung du gzhag par 'dod dam ci/
dge slong don nyung ba rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ de ltar dge slong dag mi na bzhin du gnas khang spang pa rang gis byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces pa'i
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad
pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par mi bya zhing / des rang gir yang mi bya'o/ /rang gir byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /lnga tshan rnams kyis bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mdun du
bdar dang rang khrims dang / /ma chags pa dang de bzhin du/ /snang ba skyes dang byung ba dang / /bar du gcod dang de bzhin du/ /phyi mar byas pa ltung ba ste/ /bsdus pa'i sdom du bsdus pa yin/ /
bar sdom ni/ mdun du bya dang gzhan dang yang / /nad dang gzhan rnams dag dang ni/ /sems can mang po phan bya ba/ /lnga tshan dag ni dang po yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams
la mdo sde dang ma mo bzhag go /klu rnams la ni/ mdo sde'o/ /'dul ba ni/ zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ dgongs pa mang ba/ 'jig
rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa yin na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang / dgongs pa mang ba nyid dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa nyid yin pas/ 'don par mi spro'o/ /
'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bstan pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs su nyams pa de'i bsngags pa lhag par rjod par mdzad pa yin pas/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'khor bzhis mdun du bdar ba
yin| gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi
mdzod srung ba yin/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams kyi spyi bo la 'dug pa yin/ dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo
mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar zhugs pa yin no/ /bar sdom ni/ bdag nyid khrims ldan mngon par bsu/ /'gyod pa dang ni bag tsha med/ /chos dang mthun pas byed pa
ste| |lnga tshan gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /gzhan yang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di'i rang gi tshul khrims kyi phung bos legs par
bsrungs shing legs par sbas pa yin/ 'khor bzhis mngon sum du bsu bar bya ba yin/ gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang na bag tsha ba med
pas gnas pa yin/ chos dang mthun pas phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa yin no/ /bar sdom ni/ ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang / /bslab pa yi ni gzhi dag dang / /snang ba dag ni gnyis
po nyid/ /lnga tshan dag ni gsum pa yin/ /gzhan yang / gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ don ma 'dres par bsrel ba yin/ don rnam par
gtan la dbab par bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par bzung ba yin/ sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/ skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi
snang ba byed pa yin/ sdom ni/ snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni/ /sems las chung dang mi stong pa'o/ /gzhan yang / gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ phyogs
gang na gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs de ngas snang ba skyes pa dang / gsal ba skyes pa dang / 'od skyes par mthong / phyogs der nga thugs khral chung ngur gnas/ phyogs de
ngas stong pa ma yin par mthong ngo / /sdom ni/ byung dang de nas bcas pa dang / /rjes su bcas dang de bzhin du/ /bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni/ /lnga tshan lnga par byas pa'o/ /gzhan yang /
gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rjes su bcas pa shes/ bkag pa shes/ rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no/ /
sdom ni/ bar chad bar chad ma yin dang / /gdams ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang / /slob ma'i mthu ni yod pa ste/ lnga tshan drug pa dag tu bshad/ /gzhan yang / gang zag 'dul ba
'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bar du gcod pa rnams shes/ bar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/ 'doms par byed/ rjes su ston par byed/ lhan cig gnas
pa dang nye gnas rnams kyi gnas 'char 'jug nus so/ /sdom ni/ ltung ba dang ni ltung ba min/ /lci dang yang dang de bzhin du/ /so sor thar pa rgyas par yang / /gdon pa dag ni lnga
tshan yin/ /gzhan yang / gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ ltung ba byung ba shes/ ltung ba ma byung ba shes/ lci ba shes/
yang ba shes shing / de so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan
rnams/ spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur nas dge slong
gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam ste/ gus pas bstan par brtsams pas/ de lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam
chung ba dang / na bas nyam dmas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi/ mi mkhyen par mi rmed/
dus su rmed kyi/ dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan par rmed kyi/ don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ don dang ldan pa ma
yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan par rmed pa la dus mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das kyis che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir dge slong nye bar 'khor lus skya bo seng seng bor gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyam
dmas par gyur/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis de thos nas spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon
par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gus pas bstan par brtsams te/ des na de
lus skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur lags so/ /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
ngas lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam bzhir lung dbog par bya ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug
pa dang / nyal ba na'o/ /lung nod pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/ gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong 'chag sar lung nod pa'i dge slong 'ongs la/ gsar
bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas lus btud de sems drang po gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung nod par bya'o/ /ci ste ches rgan pa zhig yin na/
des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas lus btud de sems drad pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung nod par bya'o/ /ci ste 'greng ba na 'ongs la gsar
bu zhig yin na/ des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas stan ches dma' ba la tsog tsog por 'dug la/ sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung nod par bya'o/ /ci ste rgan pa
zhig yin na/ des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la lus btud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung nod par bya'o/ /'greng ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / nyal ba la yang
sbyar bar bya'o/ /lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis shin tu goms pa dang / legs par byang ba dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung dbog par bya'o/ /lung nod pas kyang shin tu byang ba
dang | shin tu zin pa dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung nod par bya'o/ /lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang / lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang
dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nub mo phyin nas/ de rnams
'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis ngal bsor bcug pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ 'dug ste ci byed/ gnas mal bsko ba bos shig/ de dag
gis smras pa/ ci dgos/ gnas mal bskor gzhug mod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas mal yod kyi/ bde bar nyol cig dang nam nangs nas bgo'o/ /de rnams kyis kun nas
dkris pas smras pa/ ci/ khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal skos shig /de rnams
kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal bsko ba bred nas gnas mal bskos pa dang / drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rim bzhin du gnas mal mnos te nyal lo/ /ji tsam gzhon rim gyi bar du
bsko ba de'i bar du nam nangs so/ /drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ gnas mal sdus shig /'dod do/ /dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa dag /khyed kyis nub gcig gi phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo mtho 'tsham mam/ kye ma'o/ /khyed cag 'di nyid du 'dug cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga'
bo nye dga' mnyan yod du 'dong ngo / /'di dag ni/ rlung nad can yin no/ /zhes byas nas dong ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di
la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ nub mo gnas mal bsko bar mi bya'o/ /gal te nub mo lhags na/ 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du so sor
ngal bsor gzhug par bya'o/ /yul zhig nas dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs na/ de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par
sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs
so/ /de bsod snyoms spyod pa dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du ra ba zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byed par brtsams so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal
zhing lam de nas song ba las/ des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ kun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin na/ mi rigs pa mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa/ dro la bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam/ 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/ des smras pa/ khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi byon/ khyod kyi ming ci/ mgon med zas sbyin no/ /
kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi/ khyod kyang mi shes la khyim yang mi shes so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
gyis bsam pa/ dge slong 'di ni/ lam ring po nas 'ongs la rgyus mi shes ba zhig yin te/ gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la/ bdag gi khyim yang mi shes kyi/ 'di
lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong glo bur ba spyod yul ma 'tshal ba zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ dro yol tu nye nas rab zhig gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de/ ma
dad pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams la smod par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar
bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/ gang zhig gang du dro la bab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de lta bas na
rjes su gnang gi rtsigs shig /des gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas dag brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der zas kyi bya ba byed
do/ /dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis der khron pa brkos nas tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta bkang ste btab pas/ chu de
ro phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /zhes 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags pa/ dge slong rnams kyis bkag pa dang / mnyan
yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed cag la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ chab 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyed 'gog
par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgag par mi bya'o/ /bud med dge
slong rnams la chu slong pa na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni/ kun nas zhags pa
ste/ bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas/ dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed pa na chags par gyur to/ /ji tsam na bud med byad bzhin dang lang tshos rgyags
pa zhig dge slong gzhon nu zhig la shin tu chags pas de la chu bslangs pa dang / de yang de la chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis slar bzlog kyang rgyun ma bcad par blugs te/ de
yang de la rtog bzhin 'thungs pa las/ chu de glor song nas shi'o/ /don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med gang zhig chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis dge slong la chu slong ba
de la rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing / snyim pa khong la 'thungs shig ces bsgo la/ skabs skabs su bcad cing blugs par bya'o/ /gzhan
du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po don bdun pa/ de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba de rnams
kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas su dong ste 'dug nas bsod snyoms kyi thog ma khyer te 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rmas te gal te 'o thugs yin
na ni/ lhung bzed zed par byed de/ ci ste chu thug yin na ni/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang / mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o/ /de bzhin du hwags kyi bca' ba la
sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste/ don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o/ /kha brngam byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du
dong ste/ de rnams der phyin pa na dro la bab kyang 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ ched du bsam ste 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /ma bsam par 'ongs pa las gal te dro la bab par gyur na/ longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /phongs pa
dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las/ de na dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pas longs ma spyad
pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang snga mar de rnangs la de yang gal
te tshad med pa zhig tu 'brim na blang bar bya'o/ /ci ste dge slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yin na/ blang bar mi bya'o/ /len na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so/ /de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis kyis bcom
ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing / 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bsam pa/ ston pa'i
spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed/ dran par byed par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag
khang chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba yang drug bya'o/ /gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun
gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o/ /gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams
cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras
pa dang 'di bskos zin to/ /zhes brjod par bya zhing / khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /
khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /kun dga' ra ba skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin to/ /kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang
bskos zin to/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na/ ngo tsha med pa/ 'dzem pa med pas bdag cag la gleng bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam
nas/ de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug byas so/ /ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs pa na/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das
kyi gtsug lag khang ni/ snga nas bsdogs zin to/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gnas mal dang / gtsug lag khang skos shig /de gnyis kyis smras
pa/ gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin to/ /khang phran skos shig /de yang bskos zin to/ /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig/ de yang bskos zin to/ /khang phran gyi nye
'khor skos shig /de yang bskos zin to/ /kun dga' ra ba skos shig/ de yang bskos zin to/ /kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig/ de yang bskos zin to/ /gang gi
phyir de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang / de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po byung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen
bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi/ mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi/ dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan par rmed kyi/ don dang mi
ldan par mi rmed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang
ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo/ kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i
sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen por grags pa 'di ci zhig yin/ des gsol pa/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba
drug bgyis nas dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/ des na/ kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po 'di grags lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /ngas 'thab krol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs nas gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyi/ rang
bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal
gzung ba drug mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
