na grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab bo/ /drug sde rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas/ shing bzang po gzhan
ni| rang rang gis bzung ngo / /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni/ shing khong stong dag thob bo/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ dpung gi tshogs
yan lag bzhi dang chas te bsu nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags na/ ji tsam na drug
sde rnams ni/ shing bzang po dag gi drung na gnas la/ gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi ni/ shing khong stong rnams mthong nas des 'jal to zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gtso bo lags te/ yul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che
rnams las thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos po gang lags pa de ni/ bdag gi lags la/ lhag ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du mchis brang dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po
dang | khrom gyi ru ba rnams kyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 'phags pa ko'u di n+ya dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od
srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams ni/ zhugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drung na mchis la/ drug sde rnams kyi ni/ zhugs shing bzang ches lags
kyi| kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs shing la yang rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin gyi bca' ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo / /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / de lta bas na/ shing rnams dang / sgang bu dang / gsing ma
rnams kyang rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shing dang / sgang bu dang / gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang /
dge slong rnams rang nyid sgo bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang sko ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis phal pa las bskos nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gtsug lag khang 'god par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar
bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa
mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni/ gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/ /yang / chos lnga dang ldan pa ni/ gtsug
lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi
'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni/ gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni/ bsko
bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /bsko ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te gaN+DI brdungs la/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag
par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar
spro'am/ de gal te spro bar gyur na/ des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug
lag khang sko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig
dang | 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko ba mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
du gsol/ gtsug lag khang sko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro nas/ 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba
'di/ gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /
gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos te/
'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gtsug lag khang 'god pa ji lta ba bzhin du zas la sko ba dang / thug pa 'brim pa dang / bag tshos 'brim pa dang / phran
tshegs 'brim pa dang / snod spyad 'drub pa dang / gos sbed pa dang / ges 'ged pa dang / dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang / dbyar gyi ras chen 'ged pa dang /
mngag gzhug pa dang / mdzes 'chos pa yang de bzhin te/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/
'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge
slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /yang / chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar
bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /
mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /gtsug lag
khang dang zas 'ged dang / /thug pa 'brim dang bag tshos dang / /phran tshegs snod spyad sbed pa dang / /chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du/ /dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang / /'ged
pa dag dang mngag gzhug dang / /de bzhin du ni mdzes 'chos te/ /gang zag bcu gnyis yin par bshad/ /gnas mal gyi gzhi rdzogs so// //rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom

la| 'thab dang 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / /rtsa ba gang dang dge ba gang / /'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang / /'gyed pa dus ni zhi ba dang / /'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba dang / /tshul shing dag ni blangs
pa yis/ /gdams ngag med pa mngon sum dang / /dran dang ma myos 'dul 'os dang / /de yi ngo bo tshol gzhug dang / /rtswa bkram lta bur 'os pa yis/ /dge 'dun dag ni mthun pa yis/ /de
bzhin bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ /nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes/ /drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/ de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'dong bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de
rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chad par mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'gro bar
byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dwangs ma lta bu'i chos bshad pa ni/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po
rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan par byed do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen
po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste des chos mnyan nas song ngo / /de nas shAkya ming chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan te dad pa skyes nas rang gi khyim du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni/ bdag 'bras bu dang bcas
pa yin no/ /ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de ci lags/ des smras pa/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa
mdzad de/ de thos pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po rtogs so/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni/ bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/ /zhes
gsungs pa gang lags pa de mad de/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni/ khyed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas lags kyi/ bdag cag la ni/ ma lags so/ /ci'i phyir/ 'di ltar/ bcom
ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba ni/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir lags kyi/ bud med rnams kyi phyir ni/ ma lags so/ /des smras pa/ bzang mo/ de skad ma smra zhig/ bcom
ldan 'das ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / thugs brtse ba yin gyi/ song zhig dang / khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/
lha shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du bzhud la/ lha'i mdun du mngon sum du bdag gis chos mnyan pa g.yar tsha lags so/ /'di ltar/ gal
te lha snga dro bzhud na/ bdag gis kyang slad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan par bgyi'o/ /shAkya ming chen gyis bsam pa/ lha la gsol gyi/ 'gro'o/ /snyam pa las yang bsam
pa| rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol pa byed ni/ mi phod kyi/ lha ni/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la bkur sti mang du byed de/ de'i tshig nyan par gyur bas/ de la don 'di rig
par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen po go'u ta mi la don de smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bka' bzhin
'tshal/ lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma rnams la smras pa dang / de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma dang / gzhan dag gi chung
ma rnams skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces smras so/ /go'u ta mi mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag cag
gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dwangs ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams
mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to/ /zhes thos nas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos de thos par 'tshal gyi/ bdag cag gi phyir lha la ci
nas kyang lha ni/ snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhud la/ bdag cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol ba mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ phu nu mo dag/ khyod kyis sems bskyed
pa legs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang la brtag gi /skad cig sdod cig /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas
gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi
dwangs ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to/ /zhes thos/ shAkya'i mchis brang rnams
kyis kyang de skad thos nas de rnams chos nyan par 'tshal na/ lha ni/ snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so/ /bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis brang rnams
ded de bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar slad dro mchi bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ snga dro ni/ de rnams sdum pa'i bgyi bdag bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i skabs

ma mchis so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis tshig smras pa de'i tshe lus kyi spu zing zhes byed nas langs te/ re zhig skye rgu'i bdag mo
chen mo'i tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi 'dug pa yin pas/ des mgo bos btud nas smras pa/ go'u ta mi/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi shAkya'i

chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /ji tsam na shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
nas de dang lhan cig song ste gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas/ 'dod chags dang ma bral ba dag chags pa skye bar zhugs pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
mthong nas smras pa/ sring mo/ re zhig khyod kyis rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang bzang mo bstan sdug pa mdzes pa yin na/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyod rgyan
gyis brgyan te 'dir 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni/ thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yang ma yin no/ /zhes de la de skad
ces smras pa dang / ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas spyi bo smad nas mtha' gcig tu song ste rgyan rnams bkrol nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ de'i mngag
gzhug ma bu mo skyed ma zhes bya ba dang / de lhan cig chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pas des de la bos te smras pa/ skyed ma/ song la rgyan 'di dag khyim du zhog la shog cig /de rings
par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar 'ongs so/ /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig
tu 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /chos bshad pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ ji tsam na shAkya'i bu mo zhig mgul ba na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur
bar lta zhing lag pas nom par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsams so/ /'on kyang des chos la mi gtod kyi/ mu tig gi do
shal kho na la rtog par byed do/ /ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas/ shAkya'i bu mo mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ nyon mongs 'di/ 'du byed rnams 'di ltar mi rtag bar bshad na/ mu tig gi do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bar brtag tu ci yod/
gal te bdag gi mu tig gi phreng ba mthong na/ 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo skyed ma la smras pa/ skyed ma/ song
la kho mo'i mu tig gi do shal myur du khyer te shog cig /de chos nyan pa la sems bsdus pas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na/ bdag rje mos mngags
pas chos kyi bar chad byung bar gyur te/ mdor na bran gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni/ re sdug snyam du bsam nas sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde bas gdungs pas tshigs su bcad pas smras
pa| gang yang sdig pas de ring rgyal zhal blta ba dang / /bde gshegs zhal nas dri med chos mnyan mi 'thob pa/ /bran dngos gzhan dbang sdug bsngal mang po tha chad de/ /bdag gi
'tsho ba sngon byas las kyis thob pa ngan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bu mo skyed ma 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyi/ tshe
cung zhig yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i btson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis gro ga la/ dge ma skye ba byung na ni/ /'jig pa yin par bsam nas su/ /ngas
gsungs pa yi dge ba la/ /brtson 'grus bskyed nas mnyan par bya/ /zhes bris nas byin no/ /de nas bu mo skyed ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes
nas tshigs su bcad pa smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang / las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs
dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /ces bya ba yin pas/ tshe cung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed de/ ba drus ma zhig gis bsad do/ /de
sangs rgyas la sems mngon par dad par byas te shi bas/ sing+ga la'i gling du sing+ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam ba'i mngal du skyes par gyur te/ gang gi nyi ma la nying mtshams sbyar ba de
kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi char pa bab bo/ /rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhums
su zhugs pa de'i mthu lags so/ /ji tsam na mngal gyi smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grag cing / grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo
byad dang / sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang lan tshwa can ma yin pa dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang
rtsub pa ma yin pa dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / rtsub pa dang / bska ba rnams spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen
bkur byed cing / do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri nas khri dang / khri'u nas khri'ur 'gro zhing / 'og gi sa la 'bab par mi byed do/ /de zla
ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang mu tig gi char babs nas rgyal pos bsam pa/
'di ji ltar bu mo'i mthus mu tig gi char babs pa ni/ de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes des de nyid la byin no/ /de nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu des btsas ston rgya cher byas
nas| bu mo'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'di'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pas/ de bas na/ bu mo'i ming mu tig can
zhes gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te/ bu mo mu tig can ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis
dang | dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan
yang | yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/ /de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa'i tshe
rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang gnas pas/ rgyal po nang mi dang bcas pas lhag par bkur sti byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ mnyan yod kyi
tshong pa rnams kyis nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / de rnams gru bo che phan phun med par rlung gi shugs kyis sing+ga la'i gling du
phyin to/ /de nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste rgyal po'i pho brang dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu brang btab bo/ /de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol
'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / thub pa'i
tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde rnams rgyas par 'don pa la zhugs pa/ mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung nas thos nas/ de nas des rgyal po la
smras pa/ lha/ yul dbus kyi tshong pa dag mchis nas tshig snyan par len to/ /rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ glu mkhan rnams khug cig/ de rnams bkug
pa dang mu tig can gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /yul dbus kyi rol mo ci 'dra ba kho mos mnyan gyi/ longs shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo/ bdag cag ni/ rol
mo mkhan ma lags te/ bdag cag ni/ mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlung gi shugs kyis 'dir mchis pa lags te/ bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung bton to/ /mu
tig can gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas snying dga' bas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas dris pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de rnams
kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid rgyas par smra bar brtsams te/ lha mo/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu/ gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba/ chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser
skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ste/ de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba
'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che'o//
de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing / de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus
pa gnod par bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par
'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan te/ de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /mu tig can gyis smras pa/ gang
gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ sbran par bgyi'o/ /ji tsam na de rnams yul du 'dong ba'i dus la bab
nas/ de rnams kyis mu tig can la sbran pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsol pa/ lha dang lha min mi yis phyag bgyis pa/ /skye dang snyun dang bsnyengs las nges byung zhing //
gtso bo grags pa rgya cher rab grags pa/ /drang srong bdud rtsi'i cha las thugs rjes gnong / /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yi ge de tshong pa de rnams kyis khyer nas rim gyis mnyan yod du
phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ sing+ga la'i gling na sing+ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des/ mchid
yi ge gsol ba 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mu tig can 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas nyid kyis blangs te bklags so/ /bklags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag slar 'dong
par gyur pa de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo / /de nas zong bsgyur
te bsgyur ba'i zong thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag mchi na/ bdag cag gis mu tig can la ji skad bgyi bka' stsal par
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa'i ras dang / ri mo mkhan dag khug cig /de rnams kyis ras dang ri mo mkhan dag bkug nas phul
ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris shig /ri mo mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar
brtsams pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma
nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ston cig dang 'od gtang ngo / /de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ba la
ri mo mkhan rnams kyis tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga
rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so/ /gong
du ni/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bris nas sing+ga la'i
rgyal po la bka' yig spring pa/ ras la ri mo bris pa/ ngas mu tig can la skyes su bskur ba yin gyi/ khyod kyis de la sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar sing+ga la'i gling na gnas ba'i
skye bo'i tshogs bsdus la bkur sti chen pos ras 'di khroms shig /tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mu tig can 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das
de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di dag ni/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs
dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/ /'di ni/ bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no/ /
zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ spro bar bya ba yin te/ gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs
dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de/ bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin
no| |zhes brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas dge mtshan

dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su gyur ba dag byas te zong khyer nas sing+ga la'i gling du song ste/ rim gyis sing+ga la'i gling du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos te rgyal po'i drung du song nas
rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ge byin no/ /rgyal pos yi ge blangs te bklags nas grong khyer de/ rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ rgyal
mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang bo btags/ shin tu dri zhim po'i bog por nye bar bzhag /me tog sna tshogs bkram ste sing+ga la'i gling na gnas
pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsags nas de nas bkur sti chen po byas te grong khyer gyi dbus su rin po che sna bzhi las byas ba'i seng+ge'i khri bshams te/ ras phye ba dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos/
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsang bstod de smras so/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can dad pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gis ba spu zing zhes
byed cing / mig mchi mas gang pas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te tshong pa rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis smra bar brtsams pa/ 'di ni/ bcom
ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lags so/ /'og ma 'di dag ci yin/ 'di ni/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang mthun pa dang /
lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba/ 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/ /'di ni/ bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags
so/ /gong ma 'di ci yin/ spro bar bgyi ba lags te/ gang zhig skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten
cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de/ bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur pa lags so/ /de nas
mu tig can gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa bsam par brtsams te/ ji srid lan gsum du ma bzlas pa de'i bar
du des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/
ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas/ /gang la 'di 'dra'i gsos mnga' ba/ /sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis/ /lta ba'i ri bo drungs phyung ste/ /lta ba'i zug rngu sel mdzad pa/ /sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras nas tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes
ldan dag /khyed cag nam 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig /de nas tshong pa rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zong rnams khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung du song ste/ lha mo/ bdag
cag ni/ mchi na/ bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal par gsol/ des smras pa/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal la/ gnod pa
chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus
la 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bgyi ba gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad de/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten
nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams las ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams su ni/ bzhag /'khor ba las ni/ rgyang bsrings/ khrag dang mchi ma'i
rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni/ phye/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs
la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho pa ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so//
bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te
skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /zhes gsol la/ mu tig bre gsum po 'di khyer la cha gcig ni/ sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni/ chos la/ cha gcig ni/ dge 'dun
la phul cig /de nas tshong pa de rnams kyis zong dang skyes bskur pa yang khyer te dong nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
song ste zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas ji skad spring pa bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /btsun pa/ skyes su phul ba'i mu tig bre gsum po 'di lags te/
mu tig cha gcig ni/ sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni/ chos la/ cha gcig ni/ dge 'dun la phul lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ skyes
'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis shAkya ming chen gyi mngag gzhug ma skyed ma zhes bya ba/ nga las chos mnyan nas song ba las/ lam
kar ba drus mas bsad pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /des nga la sems dang pa bskyed de shi bas/ sing+ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can zhes bya bar gyur te bden pa mthong nas
des skyes bskur ba 'di yin no/ /'di las sangs rgyas kyi skal ba gang yin pa des dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal byos shig /chos kyi gang yin pa de ni/ chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o/ /
dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgos shig /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa/ mu tig can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na bran mor gyur lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing bden pa
mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar
gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag /gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar
'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi
khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur
te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/
bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing
zad pa'i me bzhin du wA ra NA sir phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po kri kris de'i sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis spungs
te/ spungs nas bkur sti chen pos bsregs te/ me de 'o mas bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gser gyi bum par blugs te lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra
khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsigs nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so/ /wA ra NA si na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs
su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bul nor gyis 'gran ba zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/
dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang de la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la
gtad nas bdag gi khyim du nor phal po che bsags kyang bdag la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med pas/ bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bu med do zhes byas te/ rgyal pos dbang byed
par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de la dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / ltas mkhan rnams
kyis smras pa/ lha mnyes par byos shig dang khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /de bu med de/ bu mngon par 'dod pas/ zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
la sogs pa gzhan yang lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor
ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'di ltar/ gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyus bu pho dang /
bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'jig rten na de skad du grags pa yod de/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur na ni/ re re la yang dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin
du bu steng yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur te/ gnas gsum gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing lhan cig
'dus pa dang / ma mngal rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas de gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin
na/ des bu yod pa'i las ma byas pas/ des na de la bu pho dang bu mo med do/ /ji tsam na de nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang /
'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang / de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur to/ /de nas de'i chung mas bsam pa/ bdag gi khyim na nor phal mo che bsags pa ni/ bdag la bu pho yang med/
bu mo yang med la/ bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur gyi/ da ni/ gal te 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags ma blangs na/ nor zas 'di thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes byas
nas rgyal pos dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de'i mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba mgul na thogs pa des/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten de la dri dang
byug pas byugs nas mchod pa byas te btags nas dad pa drag pos drung du gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba dang / sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/
bdag phyug po'i rigs su skye zhing yon tan 'di lta bu yang thob cing / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par ma gyur cig /ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/
de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ mu tig can 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas smon lam
btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing btsas pa na mu tig gi char bab bo/ /nga'i bstan pa la yang dad pa skyes pas 'jig
tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /gzhan yang / tshong dpon nor mang du bsags pa de'i chung mar
gyur pa na/ de na 'dis dbang phyug gi dregs pas rgyags nas spyod yul na gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes smras pas/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs
mang por bran mor gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin zhing / gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig
tu dkar la/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /de bas na/ dge slong dag /gcig tu nag pa'i las rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni/ spangs la/ gcig tu dkar ba'i
las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi cha gang yin pa de ni/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams kyi yin
no/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / de la mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pas kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas/
rnyed pa 'di ni/ kho bo cag dbang ngo / /'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nang gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pas kho bo cag chos
'dzin pa yin pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ kho bo cag dbang ngo / /ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni/ mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas kho bo
cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ kho bo cag dbang ngo zhes de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab
mo dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ma 'thab cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /'thab mo ma byed cig /ma
'gyed cig /dge slong dag /bzhi po 'di dag ni/ rtsod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod
pa'o/ /'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi 'phrod par smra ba/ mi mthun pa/ kun tu mi dga' ba/ rgyud gcig tu ma gyur pa gang
yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod ba zhes bya'o/ /gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge
'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab

mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o/ /ltung ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ ltung ba lnga ni/ ltung ba'i phung po lnga zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pha ma
pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa
gang yin pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de
la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bya ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag /'gyed pa ni/ ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing /
'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ ci yin zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug dang / 'gyed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi ste/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar/ 'di na la la khro ba yin
zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa yin te/ khro zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do/ /ston pa la
bkur sti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo / /chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta'o/ /dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta na/ dge 'dun la
'di lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa 'byin par byed do/ /'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye bo mang po la
phan pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no/ /dge slong
dag /gal te khyod kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi'am/ phyi rol gyi yang rung / ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa
med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi ldog pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ji tsam 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spangs kyi

bar du brtson par bya'o/ /de ltar na/ khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung / phyi'i yang rung / legs
par spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas/ 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba
dang / sgrim pa dang / mi ldog pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang rtsod pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyir yang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na/
khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par bsal bas phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po don brgyad pa/ khro zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa ji lta ba bzhin
du/ 'chab cing 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog byed cing ser sna can dang / g.yo byed cing sgyu can dang / ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /gzhan yang / 'di na la la rang gi lta ba
mchog tu 'dzin pa yin zhing 'chab pa'i 'dzin pa dang / smras pa la dang na then byed pa yin te/ rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa/ 'chab pa 'dzin pa/ smras pa la dang na 'then byed pa gang
yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do/ /de ston pa la bkur sti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par
ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo / /chos mi mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta'o/ /dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta na/ dge 'dun la de lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab
mo dang / 'gyed pa 'byin par byed do/ /'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la
gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba
de lta bu nang gi yang rung / phyi'i yang rung / ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson

'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi ldog pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ji tsam 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spong pa'i bar du brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na/ khyod
kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu/ nang gi yang rung / phyi'i yang rung / legs par spangs par yang dag par
mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi ldog
pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na/ khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs
par bsal pas/ phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug ces bya'o/ /'gyed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos so/ /zhe 'am/
chos ma yin no/ /zhe'am/ 'dul ba'o/ /zhe'am/ 'dul ba ma yin no/ /zhe'am/ ltung ba'o/ /zhe'am/ ltung ba ma yin pa'o/ /zhe'am/ lci ba'am/ yang ba'am/
lhag ma dang bcas pa'am/ lhag ma med pa'am/ bshags par bya ba'am/ bsdam par bya ba'am/ nyes bar bshad par gtogs pa'am/ legs par bshad par gtogs pa
ste| 'di dag ni/ 'gyed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag /'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni/ de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ de yin no/ /dge
slong dag /gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni/ ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ ci yin zhe na/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang /
gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag/
gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni/ de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ de yin no/ /dge slong dag /ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni/ ci zhig gi rtsa ba
can yin zhing / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ ci yin zhe na/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga ni/ ltung ba'i rigs dang / ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa
dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas so/ /gzhan yang / lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa yang
yod/ ngag gi yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa'ang yod/ lus kyi dang sems kyi yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa yang yod/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi yin pa yang yod
do| |lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong / khyim pa'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ma byung bar khyim pa'am/ bsnyen
par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir byung ngo / /snyam nas nyal bar byed pa na/ de gnyid log pa dang / bud med nyal ba'am/ gnyid log nas khri stan chen po'i steng du bzhag pa ste/ 'di ni/ lus kyi ltung
ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin no/ /ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong bud med la chos tshig lnga 'chad
pa las ched du ma bsam par tshig drug tu thal ba'am/ tshig drug 'chad pa na tshig bdun thal ba ste/ 'di ni/ ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin no/ /lus
dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched du bsam ste dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral nas 'di skad ces/ ji
ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog chags srog dang dbral bar bya ste/ de ltar bsad pa ni/ de legs par bsad pa yin no/ /zhes mi smra zhing / ma byin par
len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba 'thung la/ 'di skad ces/ ji ltar bdag gis 'thungs pa de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya ste/ de ltar
'thungs pa ni/ legs par 'thungs pa yin no/ /zhes mi smra ba ste/ 'di ni/ lus dang / sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin no/ /lus dang ngag dang sems kyi ltung ba gang
zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched du bsam ste/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral la/ 'di skad ces/ ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog
chags srog dang dbral bar bya ste/ de ltar bsad pa ni/ legs par bsad pa yin no/ /zhes smra zhing / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / myos par
'gyur ba'i chang 'thungs la/ 'di skad ces/ ji ltar bdag gis 'thungs pa de bzhin myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya ste/ de ltar myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pa ni/ legs par
'thungs pa yin no/ /zhes smra ba ste/ 'di ni/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi ltung ba yin te/ dge slong dag /ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni/ de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa
ba ni/ de yin no/ /dge slong dag /bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ ci yin zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gang yin pa gsol ba dang / gsol ba
dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag /bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni/ de yin no/ /dge slong dag /'gyed pa'i
rtsod pa ni/ dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don
sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i don sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa
gang yin pa 'di ni/ dge ba yin/ mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing dge ba mi sems pa'i don sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar
smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi dge ba yin no/ /lung du ma bstan pa gang
zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa
yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i don sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal
bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa yin no/ /
gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni/ dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing
don sems la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa
dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ dge ba yin no/ /mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/ dge ba'i don
mi sgrub cing / dge ba mi sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba
dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ mi dge ba yin no/ /lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin
zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma
yin| mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang /
'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa yin no/ /ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ mi dge ba gang zhe
na| sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang / dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las/ ched du bsam ste 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ mi dge ba yin no/ /lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/
sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang / dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las/ ched du ma bsam par 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa yin no/ /bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ dge
ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge
ba sems pa'i gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa
'di ni/ dge ba yin no/ /mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing / dge ba mi sems pa'i gsol ba dang / gsol
ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ mi dge ba yin no/ /lung du ma
bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i
don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma yin la/ mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab
mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa yin no/ /'gyed pa gang yin pa de/ rtsod pa lags la/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de/ 'gyed pa lags sam/ bka' stsal
pa/ 'gyed pa yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la/ 'gyed pa ma yin pa yang yod/ 'gyed pa yang yin/ rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/ 'gyed pa yang ma yin
rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do/ /re zhig 'gyed pa yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa'o/ /
rtsod pa yin la/ 'gyed pa ma yin pa ni/ rtsod pa gsum po/ gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'o/ /rtsod pa yang yin la 'gyed pa yang yin pa ni/
dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi 'phrod par smra ba/ mi mthun pa/ kun tu mi dga' ba/ rgyud gcig tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang
'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa'o/ /'gyed pa yang ma yin/ rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /gdams ngag ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/
rtsod pa lags la/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de/ gdams ngag ma mchis pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gdams ngag med pa yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la/
gdams ngag med pa ma yin pa yang yod/ gdams ngag med pa yang yin la/ rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/ gdams ngag med pa yang ma yin la/ rtsod pa yin pa yang yod do/ /re zhig
gdams ngag med pa yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa'o/ /rtsod pa yin la/
gdams ngag med pa ma yin pa ni/ rtsod pa gsum po 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o/ /gdams ngag med pa yang yin la/ rtsod pa yang yin pa ni/ dge
'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de la brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang /
'gyed pa gang yin pa'o/ /gdams ngag med pa yang ma yin la/ rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /ltung ba gang lags pa de/ rtsod pa lags la/ rtsod pa gang
lags pa de/ ltung ba lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ ltung ba yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la/ ltung ba ma yin pa yang yod/ ltung ba yang yin la/ rtsod
pa yang yin pa yang yod/ ltung ba yang ma yin la/ rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do/ /re zhig ltung ba yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga ni/ ltung ba'i rigs
dang / ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas yin no/ /rtsod pa yin la/ ltung ba
ma yin pa ni/ rtsod pa gsum po/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o/ /ltung ba yang yin la/ rtsod pa yang yin pa ni/ ltung ba'i rigs
lnga po ni/ ltung ba'i rigs dang / ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas gang
yin pa de la brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa'o/ /ltung ba yang ma yin la/ rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/
bya ba gang lags pa de/ rtsod pa lags la/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de yang bya ba lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ bya ba yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la/ bya ba ma yin
pa yang yod/ bya ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/ bya ba yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do/ /re zhig bya ba yin la/ rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ dge 'dun gyi gsol
ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa'o/ /rtsod pa yin la/ bya ba ma yin pa ni/ rtsod pa gsum po/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / gdams ngag med pa'i
rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'o/ /bya ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa ni/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de la
brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa'o/ /bya ba yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /dge slong dag

'gyed pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos du zhig gis 'dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya zhe na/ bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyis te/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / gang yang tshul shing mang
po blangs pas so/ /mngon sum du 'dul ba ni/ ji ltar rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul
bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra bar dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs shig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de rnams dbyar gyi nang logs su 'thab pa dang /
mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa byung nas de rnams kyis rtsod pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu la gtad pa dang / de gnyis kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul
bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs su dbyar gnas pa'i dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das pa dang / chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan

nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang pos lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos
su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /chos nyid
kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ glo bur ba'i dge slong rnams la so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa'i 'dis so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas dge slong rab tu mang po la/ kye dge slong dag /khyed cag gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ gang du khyed cag dbyar gnas/ btsun pa/ bdag
cag ni/ ljongs shig nas gnas 'dir mchis te/ ljongs shig na bdag cag dbyar gnas gnas lags so/ /dge slong dag /khyed cag ji ga ljongs su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas sam/
khyed bsod snyoms kyis phongs par ma gyur tam/ btsun pa med par bdag cag ljongs su bde ba la reg par gnas pas dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang phongs par ma gyur to/ /de
lta lags mod kyi/ bdag cag dbyar gyi nang logs su 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa byung nas bdag cag gis rtsod pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal
gyi bu la gtad pa dang / de gnyis kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye ma'o/ /nga'i nyan thos skam la gnas pa dag
gis ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar nus so/ /snyam nas/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa
chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis skam la gnas pa du yin pa ma yin pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang
dag dge 'dun la mi ltos par rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar nus pa'o/ /de yang gsum ste/ skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing ngag gis kyang ma yin pa yang yod/ lus
kyis bsdams la/ ngag gis ma yin pa yang yod/ lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa yang yod do/ /lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing ngag gis kyang ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
skam la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par gyur/ mtshang 'dru bar gyur/ 'thab mo byung / /'gyed par gyur nas phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyi drung du bdag nyid song nas 'di
skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/ /rtsod pa 'di ni/ legs par bzung ba yin gyi/ nyes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs par sbyar ba yin gyi/ nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs
par brtags pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas/ 'di dang 'di ni/ smros shig /'di dang 'di ni/ ma smra zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa pha rol po dag choms shig /pha rol po dag
gis choms sa re/ bdag ni/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs byed pa yin no/ /zhes smra zhing / phyogs gcig shos kyi drung du yang bdag nyid song nas 'di skad
ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/ /rtsod pa 'di ni/ legs par bzung ba yin gyi/ nyes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs par sbyar ba yin gyi/ nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtags
pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas 'di dang 'di ni/ smros shig /'di dang 'di ni/ ma smra zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis pha rol po dag choms shig /pha rol po dag gis choms sa
re/ bdag ni/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs yin no/ /zhes smra ste/ 'di ni/ skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing / ngag gis kyang ma yin pa'o/ /
skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams la/ ngag gis ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skam la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par gyur/ mtshang 'dru bar gyur/ 'thab mo byung / 'gyed par gyur
nas gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyi phyogs gcig tu bdag nyid mi 'gro mod kyi/ pho nya btang nas tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/ /rtsod pa 'di ni/ legs par bzung
ba yin gyi/ nyes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs par sbyar ba yin gyi/ nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtags pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas 'di dang 'di ni/ smros
shig /'di dang 'di ni/ ma smra zhig /tshe dang ldan pa dag gis pha rol po dag choms shig /pha rol po dag gis choms sa re/ bdag ni tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang / dpung dang /
grogs yin no/ /phyogs gcig shos su yang bdag nyid mi 'gro mod kyi/ pho nya btang nas tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/ /rtsod pa 'di ni/ legs par bzung ba yin gyi/ /
nyes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs par sbyar ba yin gyi/ nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtags pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas 'di dang 'di ni/ smros shig /'di
dang 'di ni/ ma smra zhig /tshe dang ldan pa dag gis pha rol po dag choms shig /pha rol po dag gis choms sa re/ bdag ni/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs
yin no/ /zhes zer ba ste/ 'di ni/ skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams la/ ngag gis ma yin pa yin no/ /skam la gnas pa lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skam
la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par gyur/ mtshang 'dru bar gyur/ 'thab mo byung / 'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing / phyogs dang phyogs gzhan na gnas pa rnams kyi phyogs gcig tu bdag
nyid mi 'gro zhing / pho nya yang gtong bar mi byed la/ phyogs gcig shos su yang bdag nyid mi 'gro zhing / tshig gi pho nya gtong bar mi byed pa'o/ /de la skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams
pa ma yin zhing / ngag gis kyang ma yin pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa yang / ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta
bu'i skam la gnas pa la brten nas dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni/ 'byung la/ byung ba rnams ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la skam la gnas
pa lus kyis bsdams la ngag gis ma yin pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa yang / ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta
bu'i skam la gnas pa la brten nas kyang dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni/ 'byung la/ byung ba rnams ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la
skam la gnas pa lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bu'i skam
la gnas pa la brten nas dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni/ mi 'byung la/ byung ba rnams ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bu'i
skam la gnas pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin gyi/ gzhan dag ni/ ma yin no/ /de lta bu skam la gnas pa rnams kyis rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya ste/ de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa
rnams kyis rtsod pa zhi bar byas pa ni/ mngon sum dag pa yin no/ /de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/ mngon sum ni/ gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo/ /gang
zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang / gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur cing mngon sum du gyur pa
ste| 'di ni/ gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang / chos gang dang / 'dul ba gang dang gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i
bstan pa de dang / chos de dang / 'dul ba des/ rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni/ chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gal te dge slong skam la gnas pa dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ de
de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya zhing / dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod
pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas pa'o/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no/ /de la mngon sum ji lta bu yin zhe na/ mngon sum ni/ gsum ste/ dge 'dun
mngon sum dang / gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo/ /dge 'dun mngon sum gang zhe na/ mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing
mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 'dun pa blang bar 'os pa rnams las 'dun pa blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur kyang mi btub cing gshe ba gang dag gis gshe bar
'os pa rnams mi btub pa med cing mi gshe la/ las dag byed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang / gang
dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni/ gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang / chos gang
dang / 'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang / chos de dang / 'dul ba des/ rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar byed pa 'di ni/ chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gal
te dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya mi nus na/ de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba bcu'am/ bcu gnyis bsko bar bya'o/ /bsko ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams
nas gaN+DI brdungs la dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas
skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde/ khyed gsal ba yin na/ mtshams kyi phyi logs su dong nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bya bar spro'am/ gal te spro bar gyur na/ de rnams kyis
spro'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun
sde 'di rnams gsal ba lags te/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/
dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/ sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin
dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
gsan du gsol/ sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde 'di rnams gsal ba lags te/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar spro
nas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde rnams gsal ba rnams bskos te/ sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba
rnams mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/
sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang
dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba de rnams mtshams kyi slad rol tu
mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar
bya'o/ /gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no/ /de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe
na| mngon sum ni/ gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo/ /gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang / gang dag gis rtsod pa de dag zhi
bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni/ gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang / chos gang dang / 'dul ba gang
gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang / chos de dang / 'dul ba des/ rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni/ chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gal te dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis
rtsod pa de zhi bar mi nus na/ de rnams kyis dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba brgyad dam dgu bsko bar bya ste/ gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul
bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/ /gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya'o/ /gal te dge slong
gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis/ rtsod pa de zhi bar bya mi nus na/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o/ /de nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa de sbed pa bsko bar bya'o/ /
chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug
gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / rtsod pa sbed pa dang ma sbed pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/
dbyung bar bya'o/ /chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis
mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / rtsod pa sbed pa dang ma sbed pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni/
bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing

mthun par gyur pa dang / re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyod dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro'am/ gal te spro na/ des spro'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong
gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis
dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes
bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/

dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro nas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed
par bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa de sbed par bskos te/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par bgyid par
bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/
dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa sbed par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ngas rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca'
bar bya ste/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis/ rtsod pa de gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad par bya zhing / rgan rabs ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya ste/
dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di ni/ gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas dus 'di srid cig lon te/ rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis
zhi bar bgyi ba rdo ma thogs nas de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas de gsal ba'i dge slong rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis rngo ma
thogs nas de rnams kyis dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba de rnams kyis kyang rngo ma thogs nas de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad
pa dang / dge 'dun gyis kyang bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ rtsod pa sbed par bskos nas bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor
thar pa dang / bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul gyi/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis 'di nas bzung ste rtsod pa 'di zla ba drug gi mtha'i bar gyis zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ gnas brtan dang bcas/
so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/ /gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun des/ ston pa'i bstan pa
chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no/ /de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/ mngon sum ni/ gsum ste/ dge 'dun
mngon sum dang / gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo/ /dge 'dun mngon sum gang zhe na/ mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon
sum du gyur pa dang / 'dun pa blang bar 'os pa rnams la 'dun pa blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur kyang mi btub cing gshe ba gang dag gis gshe ba 'os pa rnams mi
btub pa med cing mi gshe la/ las dag byed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang / gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi
bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa 'di ni/ gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang / chos gang dang / 'dul ba gang gis
rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa dang / chos de dang / 'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni/ chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gal te gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor
thar pa dang cas pa'i dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ des rtsod pa de rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong nyid la gtad par bya'o/ /rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis
mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad par bya zhing / rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin brjod par bya ste/ shes ldan mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i
dge slong rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di ni/ gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas dus 'di srid cig lon te/ rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed ma
nus nas de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/ des kyang dge slong gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de
rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dge 'dun la gtad pa
dang / dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor
thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ma spyod nas bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la
gtad de/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad kyi/ shes ldan mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang /
ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis 'di nas bzung ste rtsod pa'i lo gcig gi mtha'i bar gyis zhi bar mdzod cig /mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis ston pa'i
bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/ /mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/ mngon
sum dag pa yin no/ /de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/ mngon sum gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo/ /gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar
byed pa dang / gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa 'di ni/ gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /
chos gang dang / 'dul ba gang gis rtsed pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang / chos de dang / 'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa de ni/ chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /gal te mdo sde
dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis/ rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong nyid la gtad par bya'o/ /rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis/
gnas gang na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba'am/ shes nyen can shes nyen can gang yang rung ba'am/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa de la
gtad par bya zhing / rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin la brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan dag gson cig /rtsod pa 'di ni/ gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas dus 'di srid cig lon te/
rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtang ba dang / dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/ des kyang dge slong gsal ba rnams
bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams
kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtang pa las/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming
'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun
gyis zhi bar ma spyod nas/ des kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang /
'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad pa dang / mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa
ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan la 'bul na/ gnas brtan gyis 'di nas bzung ste rtsod pa 'di ji tsam gyis
mthar phyin gyi bar du zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ngas dge slong gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas brtan gyis rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i
dge slong rnams so shing stob na/ bdag gir mi bya ste/ ba'i lci ba stob na/ ma yin/ 'dag chal stob na/ ma yin zhing / gdon pa dang 'dri ba yang byed du mi gzhug ste/ gzhan du na/ mdun
nam rgyab tu 'dug nas tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'thab cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /'thab mo ma byed cig /ma 'gyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /rtsod pa
la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi/ 'on kyang gcig rgyal/ gcig pham par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi/ 'on kyang gcig rgyal/ gcig pham par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya
zhing / dge slong gnas brtan gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/ /dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod
par bya'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum
du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di
na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung ste/ gnas

brtan gyi bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ rtsod pa de rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong de nyid la gtad par bya'o/ /des kyang rtsod pa de dge 'dun

la gtad par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bas zhi bar bya'o/ /rgyud lnga gang tshul shing mang po len pa'i rtsod pa zhi ba ni/ rtsub pa dang / gdug pa
dang / dam po dang / dbye ba'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur pa can yin no/ /rtsub pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsub po rab tu bzung ba yin
te| de ltar na/ rtsub po can yin no/ /gdug pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams gdug pa dang rnam par gnon pa yin te/ de ltar na/ gdug pa can yin no/ /
dam po ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis dam po rab tu bzung ba yin te/ de ltar na/ dam po can yin no/ /dbye ba'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi
bcu bzhi las 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ba yin te/ de ltar na/ dbye ba'i bsam pa can yin no/ /sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can ji lta bu
