zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/ de ltar na/ sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin te/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pas na/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i zhi
ba ni/ rtsub pa dang / gdug pa dang / dam po dang / dbye ba'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no/ /des na tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang
ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti
mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / tshul shing brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim ma bskos pa ni/ bsko
bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang
zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / tshul shing brims pa dang / ma brims
pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /tshul shing brims pa ni/ bzhi ste/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ sba ba dang / mngon pa dang / rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa dang / dge 'dun thams cad pa'o/ /sba ba'i tshul shing brims pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'brim pa'i
dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni/ chos ma yin pa smra la/ dge slong gsar bu nyung zad cig ni/ chos smra bas/ gal
te bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brims nas dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi rjes su byed pa rnams chos ma yin par tshul shing rab tu mang po len par 'gyur ba'i gnas
gang yin pa de yod kyi/ ma la bdag gis tshul shing sbas te brim mo snyam nas/ de tshul shing sbas nas 'brim pa ste/ 'di ni/ sba ba'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/ /mngon pa'i tshul shing
'brim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni/ chos smra la/ dge slong gsar bu nyung
zad cig ni/ chos ma yin pa smra bas/ gal te bdag gis tshul shing sbas te brims na/ dge slong gsar bu rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyi/ ma
la bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brim mo/ /bdag gis tshul shing gsal bar brims na/ dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi rjes su byed pa rnams chos kyi tshul shing rab tu mang po
len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ de tshul shing mngon par 'brim pa ste/ 'di ni/ mngon pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/ /rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing
'brim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong gis rna drung du gtugs te bshubs la/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi mkhan pos chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyi/ khyod kyis kyang
chos kyi tshul shing longs shig /khyod kyi slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba dang / smos 'drin dang / 'grogs bshes

kyis chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyi/ khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing longs shig ces smra ba ste/ 'di ni/ rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun thams cad
pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong nad pa rab tu mang bas/ gal te bdag gis dge 'dun ma 'tshogs
shing ma 'dus par tshul shing brims na/ dge slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyi/ ma la bdag gis
dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang / tshul shing brim par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing 'brim pa ste/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun
thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/ /chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu dang / chos kyi bcu'o/ /chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos ma yin pas
tshul shing len pa dang / mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa dang / chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa dang / 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur
pas tshul shing len pa dang / rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi bstun pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye yang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing
blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing
len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po dag chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po don
dgu pa/ chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'dul ba dang mthun pa ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /mi mthun pas
tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge 'dun mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu
zhe na/ bsdom par bya ba dang / bshags par bya ba yin no/ /snyam nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul
shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las/ dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ba de lta bu ni/ dge 'dun dbye ba'i bsam pas/
tshul shing len pa yin no/ /sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ skam la gnas pa ma yin pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyis ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lta
bu'i sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi bstun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma
mo 'dzin par gyur pa gang dag ni/ chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang / kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/ de rnams la ma brtags par tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi
bstun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas
dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de snyam du bsam nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas/ dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa
yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma

yin pa blangs nas 'jug par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas
tshul shing len pa yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar shes pa bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar shes
bzhin de ltar bsam nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge
slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes pa bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par
'gyur bar shes shing / de ltar bsam nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ste/
'di dag ni/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu yin no/ /chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos kyis tshul shing len pa dang / mthun pas tshul shing len pa dang / chung ba bas
kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa dang / mi dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa dang / rten kha lo sgyur ba dang bstun pas tshul
shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin par smra bar ma
gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang
po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /chos kyis tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'dul ba dang mthun pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ chos kyis
tshul shing len pa yin no/ /mthun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge 'dun mthun pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /chung ba bas
kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ bsdam par bya ba ma yin pa dang / bshags par bya ba ma yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de
lta bu ni/ chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /mi dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las/ dbye bar byed pa'i
gzhi gang yang rung ba legs par shin tu rab tu ma bzung ba ste/ de lta bu ni/ mi dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/
skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/ de lta bu ni/ sbyor ba gzhan du gyur bas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /rten kha lo sgyur ba dang bstun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta
bu zhe na/ dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/ de rnams la brtags
nas tshul shing len pa de lta bu ni/ rten kha lo sgyur ba dang bstun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len
pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar ma

gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul

shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs te 'jug par ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma
yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs
pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar mi shes shing de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa

yin no/ /tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa
blangs nas spyod par mi shes shing de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul
shing len pa ste/ 'di ni/ chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu yin no/ /ngas dge slong tshul shing 'brim pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong tshul shing 'brim pas/ tshul shing
rnam pa gnyis bsham par bya ste/ chos kyi tshul shing dang / chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo / /chos kyi tshul shing rnams ni/ ya yo med pa/ kyag kyog med pa/ kyar
kyor med pa/ kha dog bzang ba/ reg na bde bar bya'o/ /chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams ni/ ya yo dang / kyag kyog dang / kyar kyor dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / reg na mi bde bar bya'o/ /de
nas dge slong tshul shing 'brim pas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi tshul shing rnams blangs la/ g.yon pas chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams blangs nas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun
du 'dug ste/ chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan/ 'di dag ni/ chos kyi tshul shing
lags te/ ya yo ma mchis pa/ kyag kyog ma mchis pa/ kyar kyor ma mchis pa/ kha dog bzang ba/ reg na bde ba lags kyi/ bzhes shig /'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing
lags te/ ya yo dang / kyag kyog dang / kyar kyor dang / kha dog ngan pa/ reg na mi bde ba lags na/ bzhes shig /gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de logs su lag pa zed
na| tshig dang po la yang sbyin par mi bya/ gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya/ gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba
bshags par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar gyi mdun du 'dug nas chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod
par bya ste/ 'di dag ni/ chos kyi tshul shing lags te/ ya yo ma mchis pa/ kyag kyog ma mchis pa/ kyar kyor ma mchis pa/ kha dog bzang ba/ reg na bde ba lags kyi/ bzhes shig /'di
dag ni/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lags te/ ya yo dang / kyag kyog dang / kyar kyor dang / kha dog ngan pa/ reg na mi bde ba lags na/ bzhes shig /gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul
shing gang na ba de logs su lag pa zed na/ tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya/ gnyis pa la sbyin par mi bya/ gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/ de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bus 'dul ba dang 'gal
ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/ /gal te chos kyi tshul shing nyung bar gyur na/ kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i tshul shing blang bar bya'o/ /gal te chos kyi tshul shing gcig gis lhag par
gyur na yang / de ltar na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la gal te 'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed na/ ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang / de ltar na/ 'di lta ste/ chos ma yin pas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa yin no/ /de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la
'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod

pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /'gyed pa'i rtsod pa las/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa
gnyis kyis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / gang tshul shing mang po blang bas so/ /dge slong dag /gdams ngag med
pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos gsum gyis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ mngon sum du 'dul ba dang / dran pas 'dul ba dang / ma myos
pas 'dul ba'o/ /dge slong dag /ji ltar na mngon sum gyis 'dul ba ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul ba'i
rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge slong dag/ de ltar mngon
sum du 'dul ba ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ dul ba dang / zhi ba

dang | nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /ji ltar na/ dran pas 'dul ba ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul ba'i rtsod pa rnams

zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ dper na/ tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pa de la dge slong rnams gleng bar byed
de| gzhi des gleng ba na/ ngo tsha'o/ /zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis gyad
bu nor dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung pa la dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa byin cig /sbyin pa ni/ 'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i
tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / gyad bu nor gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin
du 'dud pa byas la/ rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ tshig 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos
mi bden pas skur pa btab pas bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa
thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o//
de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas 'di la/
dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/
dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun
pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ 'di la gzhi des
gleng bar bgyid pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /gyad
bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /'di ni/ las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du
las brjod pa gnyis pa dang / gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi
gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum dang / chos kyi gsum mo/ /chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba de la/ dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de la dge 'dun
gyis dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ bsnyil bar 'os pa'i phyir ro/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma
dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byes kyi ltung ba byung ba de la/ dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas
'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ bshags par 'os pa'i phyir ro/ /
'di lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyes/ smyos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyen te sgren mor byung nas/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad smras/ brtsal nas
kha chu zags/ /mig bgrad bzhin gyur te gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go /snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so/ /snyam du shes so/ /
dus gzhan zhig na/ des rang gi sems slar sor chud pa dang / de la gzhi des dge slong rnams gleng bar byed cing de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba
gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i phyir ro/ /
'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhi ldan dge 'dun gyis nang du ltung ba nyid shes pa las brjed nas phyis dran te shes pa las yang brjed pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin
pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i phyir te/ 'di dag ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas
'dul ba sbyin pa gsum yin no/ /chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pa de la/ dge slong
rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos kyi dran
pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong zhig la ltung ba gzhan kho na zhig byung bar gyur ba de la/ dge slong rnams kyis gzhi gzhan gyis gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng
bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong zhig ltung ba
byung bar gyur la/ des de dge slong gi mdun du bshags pa'am/ byin gyis brlabs par gyur ba de la/ dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge
'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ gsum po 'di dag ni/ chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin
pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul bar
'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /ji ltar na/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na
'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyes
smyos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad smras/ brtsal nas kha chu zags
mig gyur/ bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go /snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so/ /snyam du shes so/ /dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems
sor chud pa dang / de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed de/ de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis dge slong bye ma skyes dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la ma
myos pas 'dul ba byin cig /sbyin pa ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams
cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong bye ma skyes kyis bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ rgan pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la/ rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug
ste thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong bye ma skyes myos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/
dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad smras/ brtsal nas kha chu zags/ mig gyur/ bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go /snyam du 'tshal/
pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so/ /snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus gzhan zhig na bdag sems sor chud pa dang / bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing / bdag la gzhi des gleng
bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsal
du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes 'di
smyos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa/ mang du spyad smras/ brtsal nas kha chu zags/ mig gyur/
bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go /snyam du 'tshal/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so/ /snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chud pa
dang / 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing / 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod
na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/
las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes 'di myos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes
su mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad smras/ brtsal nas kha chu zags/ mig gyur bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go /snyam du 'tshal/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras
so/ /snyam du 'tshal ba las dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chud pa dang / 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing / 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun
la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis/ dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos
pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /'di ni/ las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las
brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/ 'di
ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /chos ma yin pa'i ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa gcig dang / chos kyi gcig go /chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
dge slong ma smyos par bdag ni/ smyos so/ /sems ma 'khrugs par sems 'khrugs so/ /snyam du shes pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin
pa'i ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa yin te/ 'di ni/ chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no/ /chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyes myos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor
bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad smras pa/ brtsal nas kha chu zags/ mig gyur/ bzhin gyur te/ de gnyid kyis ma log
par gnyid kyis log go/ snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so/ /snyam du shes pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang / de la dge slong rnams gzhi des
gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni/ chos kyi ma
myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di ni/ chos kyi gcig yin no/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/
'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa la/ rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos 'di
gsum gyis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa dang / ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pas
so/ /dge slong dag /ltung ba'i rtsod pa la/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ khas blang par 'os pa dang / mngon
sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang / rdza bkram pa lta bur 'os pas so/ /dge slong dag /ji ltar na/ khas blang bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar
byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gis rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ khas blang par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge
slong ltung ba byung bar gyur pa de la gzhi des gleng yang rung ma gleng yang rung / dran par byas kyang rung / dran par ma byas kyang rung / dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces/ tshe
dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu zhig byung ba de/ bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o/ /bdag
gis mthol zhing bshags na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma mthol ma bshags na ni ma lags so/ /des ltung ba mthong ngam zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des kyang ltung ba mthong ngo / /
zhes brjod par bya'o/ /snga ma shos kyis phyis sdom par byed dam zhes brjod par bya'o/ /phyi ma shos kyis bgyid do/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni/ khas blang ba'o/ /chos ma yin pa'i khas blang

ba sbyin pa bcu dang / chos kyi bcu'o/ /chos ma yin pa'i khas blang pa sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba la/ bdag la ma byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de
la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i khas len ba sbyin pa yin no/ /dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung
ba la/ bdag la ma byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i khas len du sbyin pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma
byung ba la/ bdag la ma byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/ /dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed
dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung ba ma/ bdag la byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa
sbyin pa ste/ 'di dag ni/ chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin no/ /chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung
ba byung ba la/ bdag la byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyi khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/ /dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor
bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba la/ bdag la byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong
phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung ba la/ bdag la ma byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/ /dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed
dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung ba la/ bdag la ma byung ngo / /snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa ste/
'di dag ni/ chos kyi khas len pa'i sbyin pa bcu yin no/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ khas blang bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig rtsod pa rnams
'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun

dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na 'dug go /de la brten nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi
rnams/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bsam pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po 'di/ gzhan nyid du btsas la/

gzhan du chen por gyur pa ste/ mnyan yod du skyes pa de la/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams lhag par byed kyi/ de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ste/ des na/ de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams
ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas de la glags tshol bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro gang gi khrus pa spyan drangs pa dang /
dge slong rnams kyis gzar thag la chos gos rnams bkal te khrus bya bar brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag pos kyang / shes bzhin gyis mtha' gcig tu chos gos bzhag nas
khrus bya bar brtsams so/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis kyang phyogs de nyid du chos gos bzhag go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag pos khrus byas nas 'di nyid bdag gis chos gos yin
no/ /snyam nas dge slong de'i chos gos bgos te song ngo / /ji tsam na dge slong de langs na/ rang gi chos gos de mi snang nas/ des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /kho bo'i chos
gos sus brkus/ ji tsam na/ phyogs de na tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug ba des thos nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/
mkhan pos phyogs 'dir chos gos bzhag na/ des nor te khyer bar ma gyur grang / re zhig kho bos song la mkhan po la dri'o/ /zhes de mkhan po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po/ khyod kyis
su zhig gi chos gos blangs/ des smras pa/ bu/ kho bo'i'o/ /mkhan po/ dge slong che ge mo zhig gi chos gos phyogs de nyid du bzhag pa de kho na mchis lags so/ /bu gal te de lta na/ chos gos de dag
khyer te shog cig blta'o/ /des de khyer te 'ongs nas mkhan po/ chos gos 'di ngo mkhyen par mdzod cig /des ngo shes nas bu/ ngas nor bar khyer te 'ongs kyi/ dge slong de'i 'di dag yin
gyi/ skyol cig /des khyer te dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ chos gos 'di dag mkhan pos nor te khyer ro/ /des smras pa/ des rku sems kyis blangs pas/ phas pham
pa'i ltung ba byung ngo / /de nas glags tshol ba'i dge slong de rnams kyis de la gleng ba ma byas/ dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin
gyi bu nag pos bsam pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dad pa bskyed par ni/ dka' la/ ma dad pa skye bar ni/ sla bas/ gal te 'dug par gyur na gdon mi za bar yangs pa can gyi li tsa
byi rnams ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur gyi/ mdor na mnyan yod kho nar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la ma bltas par/ des lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas mnyan yod

gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dag dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nag po 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs
so/ /khyod mthong ba ni/ kho bo cag dga' na/ 'ongs pa ni/ ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir/ 'di ltar/ khyod la brten nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang dge
'dun la mngon par dad pas/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed do/ /des smras pa/ de ni/ mad mod kyi/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bdag la gleng bar ma
byas/ dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong 'dug cig /khyod ngas chos kyis bslang bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyis bslang ngo / /yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams/ bdag cag gis dge slong nag
po skyon med pa/ gnod pa ma byas pa la mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa gang yin pa ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas/ de rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs
te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ba las/ de rnams kyis lam gar dge slong zhig mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod gang nas 'ongs/ mnyan yod nas so/ /
khyod kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po mthong ngam/ mthong ngo / /de ci bya/ kho bo cag gis de skyon med pa/ gnod pa ma byas pa la gleng ba ma byas/ dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung
ba'i las byas so/ /bslang zin to/ /sus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so/ /de na kha cig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bslang ba ni/ ma yin gyi/ thag bsring bar bslang ba yin te/ 'di ltar
de bdag cag gis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas la/ bdag cag gi mngon sum du ma gyur par de bslang ba ni/ rigs pa ma yin no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das
chos kyi rje/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes bslang na/ legs par bslang ba yin no/ /de rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas
rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig
tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag bus pa/ blun pa/ mi gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa rnams kyis/
ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po skyon ma mchis pa/ gnod pa ma bgyis pa la gleng ba ma bgyis/ dran pa ma bgyis par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis pa/ bdag cag 'gyod pa skyes nas
ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po la bzod pa gsol du 'dir mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rtsod pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lta ste/ chos
kyis bslang zin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gis bshul kar dge slong zhig las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa de/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyis bslang lags so/ /zhes thos te/ de lta lags
mod kyi/ bdag cag gi nang na kha cig gi mchid nas 'di skad ces/ bslang ba ma lags kyi/ thag bsring bar bslang ba lags te/ 'di ltar/ der bdag cag mngon sum du ma gyur to/ /zhes
mchi'o/ /gzhan dag ni/ gal te bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes bslang ba ni/ legs par bslang ba lags so/ /zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa/ kye ma'o/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams ni/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas/ rtsod pa skye zhing byung ba zhi bar bya bar 'dod do/ /snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ji ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du
'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ dge slong dag/ 'di la chos 'dul bas gang zag gis gang zag la mig bzhi
mngon sum du gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas gnyis kyis mang po dang / dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas gang zag gnyis kyis gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du
gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas gang zag gnyis kyis gnyis dang mang po dang / dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gang zag la mig bzhi mngon
sum du gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gnyis dang mang po dang / dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas dge 'dun gyis gang zag la mig bzhi
mngon sum du gleng ba dang / chos 'dul bas dge 'dun gyis gnyis dang mang po dang / dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba'o/ /chos ma yin pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa
bcu drug dang / chos kyi bcu drug go /chos ma yin pa'i bcu drug gang zhe na/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pas gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang
zag chos dang mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang / dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang / gang zag
chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/
gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/ dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa
dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang po dang / gang zag chos dang
mi mthun pa mang pos/ dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa dang / dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang / dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun
pa gnyis dang / dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang po dang / dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/ dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa ste/ 'di dag ni/ chos ma yin
pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin no/ /chos kyi mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ gang zag chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun
pa dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang / gang zag chos dang mthun
pas dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis/
gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis/ dge 'dun
chos dang mi mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /
gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos/ dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang / dge 'dun chos dang
mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang / dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang / dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi
mthun pa mang po dang / dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas/ dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa ste/ 'di dag ni/ chos kyi mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin no/ /dge slong
dag/ de ltar na/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i

rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag/ ji ltar na/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha

cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong me bzhi dge 'dun gyi
nang du ltung ba brjed pa las brjed pa slar dran te shes pa las/ yang brjed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge

slong dag/ khyod kyis dge slong me bzhi dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin cig/ sbyin pa ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham
la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong me bzhis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
te/ rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol ba bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag/ dge slong me
bzhi dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung bar bskyud pa las/ bskyud pa slar dran te 'tshal ba las/ yang bskyud nas dge 'dun la bdag de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/ dge 'dun
btsun pa thugs brtse ba can/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsal du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis
lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung
ba bskyud pa las/ bskyud pa slar dran te 'tshal ba dang / yang bskyud nas dge slong me bzhi 'di/ dge 'dun la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis
dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzad do/ /
'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyud pa las/ bskyud pa slar
dran te 'tshal ba dang / yang bskyud nas 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag/ dge
slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig/ gang zag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig/ 'di ni/ las brjod
pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa

stsal lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ngas de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du
gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/ gnas mi sbyin/ dge tshul gzhag par mi bya/ 'dis las mi bya/ las byed par bsko bar mi bya/
'dis dge slong ma la gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya/ dge slong ma'i gdams ngag ston par bsko bar mi bya/ sngon bskos na yang dge slong ma la gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya/ 'dis dge slong la tshul khrims
nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya/ dran par mi bya ste/ 'dis gdams ngag dbog par mi bya/ gso sbyong la ma yin/ dgag dbye la
ma yin/ gsol ba la ma yin/ gsol ba dang gnyis la ma yin/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la ma yin zhing / gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzhan yod na/ dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dul ba gdon par
yang mi bya'o/ /de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
ro/ /chos ma yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa chos ma yin pa'i gcig dang / chos kyi gcig go /chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran te/ shes pa las brjed pa de brjed nas yang dran pa de la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i de'i
ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di ni/ chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no/ /chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyis nang du ltung ba brjed
pa las/ brjed pa slar dran te shes pa dang / yang brjed pa de la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa byin pa ni/ chos kyi de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os
pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di ni/ chos kyi gcig yin no/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar na/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha
cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag/ ji ltar na/ rtswa bkram
pa lta bur 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa/ dul ba dang / zhi ba dang /
nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing / phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du rnam par gnas
na/ phyogs gcig na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/ shes nyen can shes nyen can gang yang rung ba/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba/ yod pa gang yin pa des rang gi phyogs
kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed

par gyur pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyod kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma

tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang khyod kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /
gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang smras pa ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/ de nas dge slong des phyogs gcig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
te rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la tsog tsog por 'dug ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ kho bo cag legs par gsungs ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab bar
gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo

dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi
drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /phyogs gcig shos na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/ shes nyen can shes nyen can gang
yang rung ba/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des kyang rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed
pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyed kyi ltung ba phyung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang
khyed kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang smras pa
ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/ de nas dge slong de/ phyogs gcig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la tsog tsog por 'dug ste tshig 'di
skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ kho bo cag

gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas
pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi 'chab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe phyogs gcig
gis gcig shos la'am/ gcig shos kyis gcig shos la spus la ltung ba lta bur byed/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston par mdzad kyi/ phan tshun du ltung ba sgrog pas
gleng bar mi byed na/ de ltar na/ rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas zhi ba yin te/ dge slong dag/ de ltar na/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin

zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ rtsa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /ltung ba'i rtsod
pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po 'dis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa dang / mngon sum du 'dul
bar 'os pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang / rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas so/ /dge slong dag /bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ dge 'dun mthun pas zhi bar bya'o/ /dge slong
dag /gnas gang na dge slong gcig gnas pa de na 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do/ /gang na gnyis yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru
ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do/ /gang na gsum yod pa de na yang / 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do/ /gang na dge slong bzhi'am/ lhag pa
gnas pa de na ni/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa yod do/ /dge slong dag/ tshangs pa ji bzhin gcig de bzhin/ /brgya byin ji bzhin gnyis de bzhin/ /
rgyal po ji bzhin gsum de bzhin/ /de las lhag pa 'khrug par 'gyur/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la yang /
chos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya zhing / des kyang longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni/ mi bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i bzhi rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad cu pa/
dge 'dun dbyen gyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mang pos bkur dang lhag yos dang / /ba gam rnying dang bzang po dang / /'khor dang ko'u din rdzu 'phrul dang / /ko'u shi kas zos dang ba dang / /mnar med lhag
gyur phyi ma'o/ /sdom ni/ mang pos bkur dang seng ge'i 'gram/ /legs par rab sad de bzhin du/ dga' ldan 'dod pa'i rigs dang ni/ /'dun pas 'dug dang gzhong pa dang / /srin bu go cha
bzang len dang / /lhag bcas pa dang de bcu'o/ /yangs pa can du bstan pa dang / /rab sbyin dang ni grags 'dzin dang / /dang ba dang ni mkhas ma dang / /sa 'tsho ma ni bstan pa dang / /'dzam bu ri
dwags nang skyes dang / rigs bdun ngan spong bu dang ni/ /rgyal po'i khab dang dka' thub dang / /ring 'phur dka' spyod dga' bo dang / /nag po bkra shis de bzhin du/ /bdud gzhom pa ni byas pa
dang / /'khor ni mdo ru bsdus pa'o/ /gru 'dzin du dgra 'dul dang brgya tham pa'o/ /dmag gis mi tshugs su ma rgyal ba las rgyal dang lnga khri bzhi stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir bzod dka' dang drug khri

sum stong ngo / /kim pi lar tshangs sbyin dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /glang po che'i grong du glang pos sbyin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo / /rdo 'jog tu bal bu can dang lnga stong ngo / /brang gis nyal du tshan

po che 'dul dang sum khri nyis stong ngo / /ma rgyal ba las rgyal du byin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo / /kA na kub dzar rgyal sde dang khri nyis stong ngo / /tsam par klu'i lha dang khri brgyad stong ngo / /ta la'i
phreng du mi'i lha dang nyis khri lnga stong ngo / /tam lir rgya mtsho'i lha dang khri nyis stong ngo / /ba so'i grong du blo gros bzang po dang khri brgyad stong ngo / /rgyal po'i khab tu mun sel

dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir dbang phyug chen po'i sde dang brgya tham pa'o/ /rtswa can du rgya mtsho'i sde dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /gru 'dzin du dka' thub spyod dang stong ngo / /rtswa can du sa'i gdong

dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir sa'i bdag po dang 'bum mo/ /dmag gis mi tshugs par sa 'dzin dang 'bum mo/ /mi thi lar lha chen po dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /yang mi thi lar lha

chen po nas bzung ste mu khyud nas shing rta sra ba'i bar brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /kun tu snang bar nam mkha'i bdag po dang klu mnyam skyong dang bdun khri bdun stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir kri kri dang legs

skyes dang brgya tham pa'o/ /gru 'dzin du rna ba can dang bu ram shing pa dang brgya tham pa'o/ /gru 'dzin du 'phags skyes po dang bu ram shing pa la sogs pas khyim gyi bar brgya tham pa'o/ /ser skya'i
gzhir shing rta bcu pa nas bzung ste lnga khri lnga stong byung ba la seng ge'i 'gram las bzhi ste/ bzhi po de rnams las gnyis gnyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi
n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed
de| shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig
'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin zhes de
skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni/ gang yin
pa yang mi shes na/ ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dug nas bar skabs bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang
las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga'
zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
rgyud ni/ gang yin zhes de skad 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin pa yang mi shes na/ ji skad lung bstan/ tshur/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di
nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /snyam nas/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di
nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes lags/ thog ma ni/ gang lags/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig lags/ shAkya rnams sngon gyi rigs
rgyud ni/ gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam gleng na/ /
mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ ci 'dod pa de lta bu ston pas bdag nyid la bstod par byed do/ /zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas
'di yod pas/ nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ nga rgyab bsnyung bas re
zhig de bsal gyi/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu
chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud
nas snam sbyar bltab ste sngas phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / ldang ba'i 'du
shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya
rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud
gang yin pa mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/
shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
rgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
ting nge 'dzin de las langs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams
la smras pa/ go'u ta ma dag/ 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing / 'jig rten zhig na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i
gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang bos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam
mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing / mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa chen po
'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /dper na/ 'o ma bskol ba grang bar gyur ba'i steng du rlung gis
spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang khebs pa de bzhin du/ sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang khebs
bar byed do/ /sa'i bcud de ni/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper
na mar gsar lta bu'o/ /ro ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /go'u ta ma dag /'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags
shing 'jig rten chags na/ de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad/ las zad/ bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba
mnyam par 'ong zhing / de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan
zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur
ro| |de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang / nyin mo yang med/ zla ba
dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do/ /skyes pa dang / bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na/ sems can sems can zhes
bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis/ mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /
ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de
lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar
myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i
tshe de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po/ /gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur bas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /go'u ta
ma dag /chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung na/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud cig dang / mtshan mo dang /
nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las
kha zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten
nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan no/ /khyed ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis
sems can la khyad du gsod do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /sa'i
bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur
to| |dper na/ da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi
hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang /
sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes de'i don ni/ mi shes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud
de nub pa na/ sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ dong ka'i me tog lta
bu'o/ /ro ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams la kha zas las ches nyung
du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dag dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa
gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad
du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag nub par gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /sa zhag de nub par gyur pa na
sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar byed do/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams
sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba 'ga' zhig gis reg pa na/ sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ e ma'o kyi hud/ e ma'o kyi hud ces smra
ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na/ tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar
gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes bya bar de'i don ni/ mi shes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pa na/
myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / kha dog ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog
lta bu'o/ /ro ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las kha zas la ches
nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten
nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems
can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus/ myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /
myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na/ sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan
dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar bcad pas tshar gcad par 'dod pa na/ sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag
nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang / tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/
mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing / smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin/ smras pa/ 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin
no/ /zhes bya bar de'i don ni/ mi shes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma dang / sbun pa med pa/ shun

pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub brngas na/ nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na/ nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur pas/ brngas shing brngas kyang slar skya pas brngas par yang mi mngon

no/ /de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas

de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/ kha cig la ni/ skyes pa'i dbang po'o/ /kha cig la ni/ bud med kyi dbang po'o/ /de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang
po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta'o/ /ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/ /ji lta ji ltar kun tu
chags pa de lta de ltar zhen to/ /ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
kyang sa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma yin pa byed do/ /sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma
yin pa byed pa yin gyi/ kwa'i sems can/ khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na/ phye ma dang / dri dang /
phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces/ bag ma bde bar gyur cig /ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis/ sems can gyis sems can la log par
zhugs pa mthong ba na/ sas gtor cing / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma yin pa byed do/ /
sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyi/ kwa'i sems can/ khyed kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /go'u ta ma
dag /de ltar na/ sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ da ltar chos su 'dod/ 'dul bar 'dod do/ /sngon smad par
bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do/ /de rnams kyis de zhag gcig spangs pa nas zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun yang spangs so/ /gang nas
sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas de rnams khang pa rtsig pa la brtson par byed de/ 'dir bdag cag
bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ /'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ /zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ go'u ta ma dag /'di ni/ 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i
rtsom pa dang po yin no/ /de yang chos kyis yin gyi/ chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni/ gtso bo yin te/ de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs
ka sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/ /nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/ /de nas sems can snyoms las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis/ nang par gyi sA lu nub
mo blangs so/ /de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can khyod tshur/ sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /kye sems can/ khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni/ nang par gyi sA lu do nub blangs so/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma/ de ni/ legs so/ /kye
ma| de ni/ shin tu legs kyi/ ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo / /snyam du sems nas/ des zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum
gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs so/ /de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can/ khyod tshur/ sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can
des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can/ khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni/ zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun
gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs zin to/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma/ de ni/ legs so/ /kye ma/ de ni/ shin tu legs kyi/ ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA
lu blang ngo / /snyam nas/ des zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gis yongs su longs spyad
pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas g.yogs par gyur to/ /brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam/
yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to/ /de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag /bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma
nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i
zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to/ /bdag cag sa'i bcud la
kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag gi sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang / lji ba nyid dag zhugs par gyur to/ /kha dog
bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/ /bdag cag las

kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis
mngon te kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /
bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs
pa| dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang
yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog
rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du
gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to/ /sa zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i
tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag
rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten
nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis
sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /myu gu'i
tshal de nub pa na/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa/ phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub pa brngas na/ nang skye

zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na/ nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brngas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing
yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gis yongs su longs spyod pas/ zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbun
pa dang / shun pas g.yogs par gyur te/ brngas shing brngas pa yang slar mi skye bas/ brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam/ yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la bdag
cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la 'di ni/ khyed kyi'o/ /'di ni/ nga'i 'o/ /zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o/ /zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas/ zhing bgos te mtshams
bcad mu thug bres so/ /go'u ta ma dag /'di ni/ 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/ /de yang chos kyis yin gyi/ chos ma yin pas ma yin te/
de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni/ chos kyi gtso bo yin no/ /de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par blangs so/ /sems can gzhan
zhig gis/ sems can des rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'i sems can/ khyod
rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang / kwa'i sems can/ song la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /sems can des lan gnyis
lan gsum du yang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so/ /sems can des sems can de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan
gyi sA lu la ma byin par len pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'i sems can/ khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang zhes
des de phar drangs/ tshur drangs nas ji tsam na/ 'khor gyi nang du yang khrid de/ shes ldan dag /sems can 'di rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du/ lan gnyis sam/ lan gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu
la ma byin par len to/ /zhes spyos so/ /de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'i sems can/ khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin
par ci'i phyir blang / kwa'i sems can/ song la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can 'dis
bdag sA lu'i phyir phar drangs/ tshur drangs te/ ji tsam na/ 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spyos so/ /de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'i sems can/

khyod kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs/ tshur drangs nas/ ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas ci'i phyir spyo/ kwa'i sems can/ khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /de nas sems
can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /sA lu'i phyir phar 'dren/ tshur 'dren cing / ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du spyo ba yang snang bas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag
cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi
bdag por bskos dang / des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni/ chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni/ phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gi
zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam nas de rnams 'tshogs shing 'dus te/ de rnams kyi nang nas sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/
lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te 'di skad ces/ kye sems can/ khyod tshur shog /
kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni/ chad pas chod cig /phan gdags par bya ba la ni/ phan thogs shig /kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las
khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no/ /de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni/ chad pas gcod/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams
la ni/ phan 'dogs par byed cing / de la de rnams kyis zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas 'bul te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur cing mang pos bkur bas/
mang pos bkur ba/ mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/ /zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na/ nyams pa las skyob par byed pas/ rgyal rigs/ rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/ /chos
kyis skye rgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas/ rgyal po/ rgyal po/ zhes bya bar grags so/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po mang
pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming / sems can/ sems can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po 'od mdzes
kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming / tshur shog /tshur shog /ces bya bar gyur to/ /'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming / sme ba can/ sme ba can
zhes bya bar gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag/ rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming / sprin mgrin/ sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge

mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming / ta la'i rkang / ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha
