rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang
ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas/ spyi bo skyes/ spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu

byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang / de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma zags nas re res nga las nu/ nga las nu zhes smras pas/ nga las nu/ nga las nu
zhes bya bar grags so/ /go'u ta ma dag/ rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye bar rtog par byed do/ /de rnams bsam/ gzhal/ nye
bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas de na/ de rnams yid las skyes/ yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po drug po 'di
dag ni/ tshe tshad med cing / tshe dpag tu med pa yin/ bar sdom la/ sems can tshur shog sme ba can/ sprin mgrin dang ni de bzhin du/ /ta la'i rkang dang yid las skyes/ /sngon gyi de drug bsdus pa
yin/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma
bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa
zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas/ ming mdzes pa/ mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang
phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras
bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas/ ming nye mdzes/ nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/ da
dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/
dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/
skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas/ ming mdzes ldan/ mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu
'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig
skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs
bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas/ ming nye mdzes ldan/
nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go /go'u ta ma dag/
de ltar na/ rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'od mdzes so/ /'od mdzes kyi dge ba'o/ /dge ba'i dge mchog go /dge mchog gi gso spyong 'phags so/ /gso sbyong 'phags kyi nga las nu'o/ /nga las
nu'i mdzes pa'o/ /mdzes pa'i nye mdzes so/ /nyes mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang / mdzes ldan gyi nye mdzes ldan dang / bzang po dang / legs bzang dang / btang

ba dang / btang zung dang / yan lag dang / yan lag shing rta dang / ngan spong dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / sha ku ni dang / sha ku ni
chen po dang / ku sha dang / nye ba'i ku sha dang / ku sha chen po dang / legs mthong dang / legs mthong chen po dang / rab thob dang / rab thob chen po dang / rab tu sgra bsgrags dang / rab tu sgra
bsgrags chen po dang / 'od byed dang / rtul phod dang / lhun po ldan dang / lhun po yod dang / 'od zer dang / 'od zer ldan dang / 'od zer yod dang / kun nas 'od zer ro/ /go'u ta ma dag /

kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa/ yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ dgra
'dul bar byed pas/ dgra 'dul/ dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong / yul
dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ngo / /de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ ma rgyal ba

las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po drug khri sum stong / yul wA ra NA sir byung ste/ de

rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong / kim pi la'i

grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis

stong / glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po glang pos sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po glang pos sbyin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud

rgyal po lnga stong / yul rdo 'jog tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po bal bu can zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i

rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong / grong khyer brang gis nyal du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po tshan po che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag/ rgyal po chen po che 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo

dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong / grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal
po rgyal byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong / grong khyer ku n+ya kub dzar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya

ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong / grong khyer tsam par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po klu'i lha

zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong / grong khyer ta la'i phreng du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/

rgyal po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong / grong khyer ta ma lir byung ste/ de rnams kyi

tha ma ni/ rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po rgya mtsho lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung

ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong /

grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po mun sel zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud

rgyal po brgya tham pa yang / grong khyer wA ra NA sir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang / tsha

bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong / grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu

dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang / grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po dka'

thub spyod kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang / grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u

ta ma dag /rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang / grong khyer wA ra NA sir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal pos sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba
byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang / grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma

ni/ rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong / grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/
de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po lha chen po'i bu dang /tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri

bzhi stong yang / grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad de/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ngo / /mu khyud las 'bying ba dang sra ba'i mu khyud dang / rko ba

dang / nye bar rko ba dang / rko ba yod pa dang / kun nas rko ba dang / gya nom snang dang / mnyam snang dang / thos pa'i sde dang /chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa chen po dang / rtogs pa'i
sde dang / mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral dang / brtan pa'i sde dang / dga' bas sbyar dang / glen bsal dang / skya rengs dang /phyogs kyi bdag po dang / rdul can dang / bde byed dang / kun
dga' dang / me long gdong dang / skye pa dang / kun nas skyed pa dang / skye bo'i khyu mchog dang / bza' btung can dang / bza' btung mang po can dang / mi thub pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub
pa dang / gnas pa dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / stobs chen dang /stobs chen zhon dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / rtan pa zhon dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu

bcu pa dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu sra dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khro bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / shing rta sra ba'o/ /go'u ta ma

dag /rgyal po shing rta sra ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong / grong khyer kun tu snang bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po zhes

bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po'i bu klu mnyam skyong ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po klu mnyam skyong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya

tham pa yang / grong khyer wA ra NA sir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na/ byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga'
ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs skyes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po legs skyes bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya

tham pa yang / grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ go'u ta ma dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza'o//
de gnyis las/ go'u ta ma ni/ mngon par 'byung bar dga'o/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza ni/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o/ /des/ pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa
mthong nas des bsam pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por 'gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas na/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir
ci'i dus la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab
pa/ yab/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni/ dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu/ gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin sreg
sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni/ 'di'i ched yin te/ nga 'das nas rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des
smras pa/ yab/ bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thogs so/ /de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig /rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas rgyal pos gal gyis bcu par
shes nas gnang ngo / /de'i tshe bsti gnas shig na drang srong mdog nag ces bya ba gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu go'u ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgu la/ dga' ba chen po dang /

yid bde ba skyes nas drang srong mdog nag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyi/ bdag rab

tu phyung zhig /des de rab tu phyung ngo / /drang srong mdog nag ni/ 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu 'thung bas/ de yang drang srong go'u ta ma/ drang srong go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na/ dus gzhan

zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas gzhon nu b+ha ra d+h+wa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong go'u ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po/ dgon
pa'i zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs kyi/ grong 'dabs su gnas par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ rung gi/ grong ngam/ dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni/ mdor na dbang po srung ba yin gyi/ khyod
song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byos la 'dug cig /mkhan po/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong go'u ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas

so| |de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/ des de la dga' mgur spyod pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan bskur
ro| |des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ yang mi gzhan zhig kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo/ dga' mgur spyad kyi tshur shog /des bsam pa/ gal te
bdag song na kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la/ khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni/ legs pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma
la smras pa/ song la pad+ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag la skabs ma mchis te/ slad kyis mchi'o/ /zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras so/ /mi de yang bya ba mang po
zhig yin pas de dang de dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo / /des bsam pa/ nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems bdag gis bsrung bar nus so/ /snyam nas des/ yang bu mo de la
bsgo ba/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na/ skyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi
jo mo skad cig la skabs med/ skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/ bu mo de/ de dang rigs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ skabs ma mchis pa ni/ ma lags mod kyi des khyod kyi
gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/ /de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris
pa skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo/ song la bzang mo la pad+ma'i rtsa lag na re/ skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig/ des song nas bzang mo la smras pa dang /

de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa rigs sam/ des smras pa/ rje'i
sras/ de ni/ bdag gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bud med ni/ rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig/ de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung nas bsad do/ /de nas bu mo mngag

gzhug mas jo mo bsad do/ /jo mo bsad do/ /zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang / de tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong go'u ta ma gnas so/ /de nas skyes

bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas/ ral gri khrag can drang srong go'u ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos der ral gri khrag can mthong

nas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do/ /zhes de nas drang srong go'u ta ma de bskor te/ mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kwa'i rab tu byung ba/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan bzung nas 'di 'dra
ba'i las byed dam/ des smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do/ /des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do/ /
zhes des zhi ba smras kyang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa phyin kha log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de
bkum lags so/ /rgyal po rnams ni/ mi rtog pa yin pas/ des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na/ rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyi gsal zhing la shon cig/ de nas
rab tu byung ba me tog kA ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing / skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa/ lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo
dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal zhing la gshon no/ /de'i mkhan po mdog nag de/ dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su
'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas/ des phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na/ de gsal zhing la gshon par mthong nas/ de/ skad
mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu/ 'di ci zhig/ des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yid chad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa'i
tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po/ gzhan ci lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu/ rma byung ba'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang / mkhan po/ bdag gi lus kyis
rma phyung gi/ sems kyis ni/ ma yin no/ /bu/ ji ltar shes/ mkhan po/ bden pa gsol gyi/ gson cig /bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi/
sems kyis ma yin na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig /bdag nyid chen po de/ lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa

yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing / gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /kun tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /zhes sgra grags pas/ de'i ming

gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to/ /de nas drang srong go'u ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni/ gang / skye ba ni/ gang / tshe phyi ma ni/ gang zhig
lags/ des smras pa/ bram ze rnams na re/ bu med pa la 'gro ba med do/ /zhes zer na/ khyod kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po/ yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na/ bdag

gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gis bu bskyed pa lta ga la mchis/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ sngon yul la spyad pa rje su dran par gyis shig /mkhan po/ tshor ba
drag pos nyen pas da ni/ bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshig rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na/ ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par
shes pa thob pa yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa dang / rlung grang mos reg pas/ sdug bsngal rnam par
mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/ /gang gi tshe des 'khrigs pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las/ khu ba'i thigs pa
gnyis khrag dang lhan cig ltung ngo / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni/ bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/ /khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang / khye'u gnyis shig
byung nas/ de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis bzhugs so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po gya gcig pa/ de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi
ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong go'u ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/ /de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas/ des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis
shig 'dug nas de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo / /nges 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs
pa dang / drang srong go'u ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bsnyod de/ de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i
tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las/ 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas/ de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs/ nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas
ming gnyis pa go'u ta ma/ go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes/ yan lag skyes bya bar gyur to/ /bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas

ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa/ bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bu med par shi nas blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /da
su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di'i gcen go'u ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'di ni/ de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang
bskur ro/ /de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste son pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ go'u ta ma gang khyed cag du mchis/
des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na/ ji ltar bsad/ kho bos dran par bya'o/ /ma nongs so/ /des
de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gal te de lta na/ sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyi/ zhog cig /des sdig pa'i las ci byas/ 'di
dang 'di'o/ /skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do/ /de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams
yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gal te de lta na/ des ma lags kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so/ /zhes de rnams de skad du gtam smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de
gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis
ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis thos te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba
btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las/ de yang bu med par shi'o/ /de nas gcig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu

ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung
ste/ de rnams kyis tha ma ni/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gdong
dang / lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /blon po rnams
kyis smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga yi btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /lha/ gal te de ltar
na| nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/ lha/ ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni/ rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di
dag yod na/ nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur ba lta/ dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo/ /ji tsam na/ rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/
btsun mo dam par 'tshal ba yod pa de rnams kyis brtags te rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas/ de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ khug
cig /de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis su gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go /gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ bkra
shis par gyur cig /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed ci gsol/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du
sras mo slong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na/ 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur
na| de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na/ sbyin no/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ mchis la lha la snyan du gdags par gsol lo/ /zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu
ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo
rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni/ 'os pa ma yin no/ /lha/ don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ re zhig btsun mo blangs la/ lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes mgur spyod
par mdzod cig dang / de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ ci ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de lta na/
dengs la longs shig /de rnams dong nas bsus te/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang
lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgur
'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed/ blon

po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di ltar/ ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o/ /khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad

de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/ des de la pho
nya btang ste tshig rtsub po dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring pa/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na/ de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na/ khyod kyi mthu dang
brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig /kho bo der 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar rlog go /rgyal po de mthu chen po ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/ blon po rnams bsags
nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces springs na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/
des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni/ 'os pa ma yin no/ /de rnams kyis smras
pa| lha/ rgyal po de ni/ stobs dang gzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/
rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni/ spyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas
pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug /lha/ bdag cag ni/ blon po lags te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/ skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa yang spyug la/
skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni/ gzhog go /rgyal po btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes
ldan dag /thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o/ /zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs
bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag /dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go /de nas de rnams
kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo / /blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal
byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so/ /de nas slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig /ci'i phyir slar log /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na/ 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'am gzhon nu rnams
rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/ de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyi/ lha gzigs
pa'i dus la bab lags so/ /rgyal po chas pa dang / skyed mos tshal na ku tse'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grags na/ 'di na
su zhig 'dug /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu rnams so/ /gal te de lta na/ ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/ /blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod
bar mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/
lha| gal te de lta na/ bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig mchi na/ de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de
rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/ /blon

po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na sgo chod cig /de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi

sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye bar skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag
byas te gnas btab ste/ ri dwags bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing / dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do/ /lang tsho dang / dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod

chags kyis shin tu nyen te/ sha dri ngan pa/ skya bo seng seng por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ /khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo seng seng por gyur/ de
rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so/ /des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig
'dug cig /drang srong chen po/ bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag /'di ltar/ rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor pa rnams kyis rung ngo / /de na de rnams drang srong gi
tshig ni/ tshad ma yin no/ /snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod
par byed do/ /de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te/ de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher
ma ni/ sgra yin pas/ drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mthong zin gyi/ kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o/ /drang srong chen po/ ci'i phyir/ bsam
gtan gyi tsher ma ni/ sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so/ /drang srong chen po/ khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig /bdag cag gzhan du mchi na/ 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig
bdag cag la phob cig /shes ldan dag /rung ngo / /drang srong bdag nyid chen po rnams ni/ 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas/ des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun

gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so/ /drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang ngas ser skya'i gzhi/ ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur
to/ /de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/ dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/ /lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang de
rnams der dong ste/ grong khyer gcig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan/ lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar
brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gi phyir bdag cag spyug pa ni/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa de las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las
chung ma blang par mi bya ste/ gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/ /de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma gcig len gyi/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma gnyis pa ni/ mi len to/ /de
nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag /gzhon nu de rnams da ltar ga na 'dug /de rnams kyis rgyas par smras
pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ba' zhig las spyugs pa las/ de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na/ gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti
gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod
par bgyid do/ /de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so/ /grong pa dag /gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod
dam/ lha/ rngo thogs lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrangs nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te ched du brjod pas brjod pa/ kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/ phod pa
yin no/ /kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/ shin tu phod pa yin no/ /zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/ phod pa yin no/ /kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/
shin tu phod pa yin no/ /zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur
to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go /de yang bu med par shi nas/ lag rna rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas glang
po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas/ rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to/ /de'i bu gnas 'jog go /go'u ta ma dag /gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal pos

khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu

bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no/ /
go'u ta ma dag /gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgra'o/ /go'u ta ma dag /'dzam bu gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni/ seng
ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so/ /go'u ta ma dag /seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / tshad med zas so/ /bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang /
bre bo ma dang / tshad med ma'o/ /zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang
ldan no/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'o/ /tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lhas sbyin no/ /gtsang ma'i bu ni/ legs
par rab sad do/ /dkar mo'i bu ni/ phreng ba can no/ /bre bo ma'i ni/ bzang len no/ /tshad med ma'i dge 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni/ sgra gcan zin yin te/ go'u ta ma dag /
mang pos bkur gyi rgyud/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i phreng rgyun chad/ skye ba'i 'khor zad de/ da ni/ yang srid pa med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ legs
so/ /legs so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ yang

khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des na/ de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig /zungs shig /lhogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
dge slong dag /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni/ don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi
bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klog pa'i rigs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po

seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed
pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa
bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/
skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug
pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum+bi ni zhes bya ba yod do/ /lhas bstan na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum
tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtse mo
nyams su myong bar byed do/ /lum+bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha/ kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi
yin na/ ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum+bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par

du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas de'i ming lum+bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o/ /bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los bsgyur ba skyes
par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad la yun ring po nas kye ma'o/ /bdag ni/ seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i
bsam pa 'di yod do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang
ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas pa de'i
gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di
bu mo yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/
bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang /
sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni/ 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /zhes mchi'o/ /
gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni/ 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so/ /zhes mchi lags pas/ des bas na/ bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes
gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so/ /bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la mtshan
mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bstan to/ /yang de rtse
bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /

de btsas pa na/ grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul ma ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston
yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas de bas na/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo
zhes bgyi bar gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan
pa zhig btsas par gyur te/ de ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bstan to/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo
gnyis shig btsas pa ni/ sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen po lags te/ de la gcig la ni/ mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni/ stobs kyi 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /gcig shos la ni/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni/ 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan gyi/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig seng ge'i 'gram gyis slar spring pa/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la
dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /

de yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de/ re zhig 'dod do/ /gcig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o/ /des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi
phyir rgol ba skya seng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas lha/ skya seng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyi/ grogs mdzad
du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ /lha/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te
gzhon nu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam pa zhig blangs pa de sbyin pa lta na/ gtong ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi pa/ gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste/ rmeg bta'o/ /de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha/ gzhon
nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste/ rmeg bta' lags pas/ bdag cag glo ba dga' ba/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig /dbul lo/ /shes ldan dag /shAkya
rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o/ /zhes bcas so/ /lha/ ci khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi/ dral bar mi bya na/ 'on
kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa zhig slong ba ni/ mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa yin no/ /lha/ rung gi de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas seng ge'i 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho
bos tshogs la brtags zin gyi/ bu mo gcig shos kyang bkri zhig /des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po
seng ge'i 'gram shi nas ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa

dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin
du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi skyes ba med par dong nas rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
mgur spyod par byed do/ /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa
dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs
la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams
sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni/ bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni/ rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni
rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi
'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur pa'i las byas shing
bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo
med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni/ bu ram shing gi phreng dang / 'bras dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/
slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so//
zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus

ci lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye rgyu'i tshe lo yar skyes pa na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa
na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi
mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/ blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas/ bden pa rnams kyi snod

du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs
ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag/ byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer
bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par
mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/
rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni/ btsun par bkur ba
yin zhing / mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag/ byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha
zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo / /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas
shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud
med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la/ rigs 'phel bar
'gyur zhing / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang
nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni/ ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang
ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa
'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig/ ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur
ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs
par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag /dga' ldan gyi ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos
te/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la/ de'i bur gyur te bdud rtsi rtogs par bya'i/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don
du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor pa longs shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang
chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig/ da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye rgu ma rung ba'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu gling rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrog pa drug dang / snyoms par
'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/ /de la rtog gi ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can

dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka ta'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/ /rjes su sgrog pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze rgyus brgal dang / bram ze gnas rdeg dang / bram ze

bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring
'phur dang / kun tu rgyu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can no/ /'dir ni/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i
gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing / bdag cag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag
cag gis thos nas/ ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sgyur par bgyid par sems lags so/ /de skad ces smras
pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig /dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis
rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs po dag /'di la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das/ dung gi sgra lags so/ /grogs po
dag /ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrog pa drug dang snyoms par 'jug pa
drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/ /mi rtag pa'i dung 'bud par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/ /bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra
bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/ /rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/ brgya byin gcig gis lha
ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ /nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ /grogs po dag /khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams
sbyor ba longs shig /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor pa len par

bzhed kyi/ ma la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums
kyang gtsang bar byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas nam gyi gung thun la

glang po cher bstan te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so/ /smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes na/ /lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te/ /nang par sprin rum nyi ma gsar
'char ltar/ /de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums zhugs so/ /'di ltar/ sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/ glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rum dral nas zhugs ba dang /

steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / ri brag chen po la 'dzeg pa dang / bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o/ /des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/
shes ldan dag /rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug cig/ de dag gis rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos
de rnams la rmi lam bsnyad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bstan bcos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na/ sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
kyis brgyan pa zhig bltams par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad
pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par
'gyur ro/ /bar sdom la/ 'chi 'pho lha dang rin po che/ /zur brgyad dub dang brtul zhugs brtan/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te
yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing / 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa/

mun nag/ smag tu rgyu pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang brgya chen pos gsal bar gyur
to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang pa yang mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag /sems can
gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su
zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ de la mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar 'jog pa ni/ lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung
dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa ni/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma

dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /dper na/ nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po

ches mi gos pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang /
mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /chos nyis kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de dag thams
cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /dper na/ bai DUR+Ya zur brgyad pa/ bzang po'i rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna lnga/ sngon po dang / ser po
dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan la brgyus pa de/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di ni/ skud pa'o/ /'di ni/ nor bu'o/ /skud pa 'di la nor
bu brgyus pa yin no/ /zhes shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas
bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas
lus ngal ba'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum deng phan chad ji srid
'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go /ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
brdzun du smra ba dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar
ldog par byed do/ /srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / /brdzun du mi smra chang la mi brkam dang / /'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ /'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/ chos
nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/ /nyon mongs
rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ /de yul 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ /skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa

skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo / /snyam nas/ des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di
lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ lha/ btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltams par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho
mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/ sras yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos

smras pa/ nga ming zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de/ rgyal pos

bkug nas bsgo ba dang / des de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan te chu blud pa dang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod
pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ btson thams cad thar par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal pos btson thams cad thar par byas nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan
yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral
bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag skyed mos tshal blta'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal pos skyed mos tshal bstan nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur
to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag skyed mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal po legs par rab sad la lum+bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal yod nas/ de la

rgyal po zas gtsang gis spring ba/ khyod kyi bu mo skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar 'dod kyi/ skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig /de'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /skyed mos tshal gyi
byi dor byos shig /de rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byas so/ /de nas 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dong ngo / /de nas des lum+bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa na/ shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin tu
rgyas pa zhig mthong ste/ de bltams par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pas
skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na/ bltams mi phod kyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des rlung dang char drag cig sprul nas des skye bo'i tshogs de kun tu bros so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang / des bltams par brtsams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bltams
pa dang / brgya byin gyis pags pa'i sleb mos bzung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ /zhes dregs par
'gyur bar mkhyen nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ thong zhig /
thong zhig /phar song zhig /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltams pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur ces bya ba nas shes ldan dag /
sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// //'dul ba bzhi/ bam po gya gnyis pa/ chos
nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma
dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa de'i
tshe/ de'i yum mi 'dug /mi nyal te/ 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltams par byed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la sus
kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun 'dor zhing tshig tu yang gsung la/ 'di ni/ shar phyogs yin te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o/ /'di ni/ lho
phyogs yin te/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /'di ni/ nub phyogs yin te/ nga'i skye ba tha ma ni/ 'di yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ byang phyogs yin te/ srid pa'i
mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ /de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod
la bar snang las chu bsil ba zhig dang / chu dron mo zhig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing / des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems
dpa' bltams pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'bab par 'gyur te/ de la de'i yum chus chu'i bya ba byed do/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'

bltams pa'i mod la lhas bar snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor
ro/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin no/ /gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /bar sdom la/ bltams dang bzhengs dang gom pa bdun/ /chu rgyun gnyis
dang chu mig lha/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe/ rgyal po bzhir yang bu btsas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu
btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas/ de bas na/ 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags
so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i
bu yin pas/ ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ 'jig rten nyi
ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas/ 'di'i ming shar pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas/ 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags te/ de ni/ de lta ma yin
no/ /'on kyang de thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/ /ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba/ 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i
tsha bo ni/ mis byin zhes bya'o/ /des de la dus dus su 'jig pa'i gtam dang / 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas/ de de las rab tu byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltams pa
na/ 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe mis byin phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na/ des snang ba de mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa/ mkhan po/
'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag /gcig car byung bar gyur tam ci/ /'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/ /'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/ /nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du
rno/ /bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/ /yan lag reg na 'di bsil bas/ /nges par thub pa de yi 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ni/ /nges par lhums nas bltams gyur la/ /bltams
nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/ /'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/ /dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas/ /mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag byang chub
sems dpa' ltar mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ da lta byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs pas/ gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod
do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /gang gi nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom
ldan 'das bltams pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang / rim gro ma rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya btsas so/ /bal

glang mo lnga brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang rte'u 'brangs so/ /gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo / /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la
ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos bsam pa/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ bdag don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ gzhon nu'i ming don thams
cad grub pa zhes gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/ 'di lta ste/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya
'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ /shAkya rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u'am bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de/ gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag
'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag
'tshal du chug cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas
grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po/ gzu lums can/ rtsub pa/ btsam pa med pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/ thub
pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsam pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni/ gtum po/ gzu lums can/ btsam pa med pa
yin na/ gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pas/ gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa
'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas
dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha/
gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so/ /rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas/
'di ni/ lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de bas na/ gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa btags pa/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o/ /byang
chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas/ ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu dus dus su sku mnye byos shig /dus dus su khrus byos shig /dus dus su zan
byin cig /dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig /ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su bsku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zan sbyin/
dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la
phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba bskyed do/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la yab dang yum
gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag /jig gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du
ni/ ma yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ /mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan
pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu
rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che'o/ /bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol
gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa/ de nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun pas legs
par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu phyung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nam/ shes ldan dag /gang dag
dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar skyes bu chen
po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni/ gang dag yin/ lha/ gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/ /zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon
nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/ lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha/ 'di
ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag
dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu
ni/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ni/ dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku mdud pa dang / sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis
sleb cing reg pa ste/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/
dper na/ glang po cang shes kyi'am/ rta cang shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ sku ji srid
par 'dom yang de srid la/ 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar mchu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/
sku ro stod spu re re nas skye zhing / de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/
gzhon nu ni/ mdog gser dang 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/
lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i sku ni/ bdun mtho ba ste/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni/ phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung
mgo gnyis dang / ltag pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / sku
drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar pa dang / 'gram
ba seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ ljags

shin tu ring ba nyid dang / srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas byung bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du g.yogs par mdzad pa ste/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i gsung ni/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ spyan mthon mthing la/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/ lha/
'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ 'di dag ni/ gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ni/ ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig
rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so/ /gal te gzhon nu rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por
'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de skrun pa'i yum nongs par 'gyur te/ nongs ma
thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das pa/ lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la mgar
ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs pa/ la ba dkar po gsar pa'i steng du bzhag na/ shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs
bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing / lha'i kha dog ni/ ma thob pa yin no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i
snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag par sbed pa ni/ dper na/ ston ka'i pad+ma skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas/
skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te/ snga ma bzhin no/ /bar sdom la/ mig mi 'dzum dang rnam smin dang / /gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas pa bsdus/
chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzum par gzugs rnam par lta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzum pa ni/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin
no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas/ des na/ de nyin mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu
gzigs so/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na/ gangs can gyi bya skad
snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba
