yin no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ rgyud las 'byung ba'i shes rab dpyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal
po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/ /de nas mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ byang chub sems
dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i mtshan yang gsum btags kyi/ da ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba'i phyir bzhud do/ /de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes de gnyis chas pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i mthus rdzu 'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor song ba dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis sgo srung gi mi la
smras pa/ kye nang rje/ song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongs med lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /zhes gsol cig /de song nas
rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog /nang du zhugs shig /de zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod
yon sbreng bas mchod nas stan bstabs te 'dug pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshes pa'i gtam gyis kun tu dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des
smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa/ khyod kyi sras ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na gzhon
nu nyal gyi/ ma sad kyi bar du re zhig skad cig sdod cig /des smras pa/ lha/ mnal log pa nyid blta'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /de ji tsam na/ byang chub sems dpa' mig ma btsums shing
mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la blta ba mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ /mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don gnyer rnams
kyi gnyid/ /mig la yun ring mi gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod kyi ma mas pang du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis
kyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la bstan lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bstan to/ /de rnams kyis ji skad du

lung bstan/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang
chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ /rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/ /nyes
las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/ /mi mchog
sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur/ /zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo
nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /bdag ni/ bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur par
mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas sdangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skye ba bud med rnams kyis gar mthong na/ ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba
thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas/ /drang srong chen po ci slad ngu bzhin gyur/ /ga las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa 'am/ /tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas
grang / /de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros/ /khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur/ /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las/ /rdo
rje'i ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku las ba spu ni/ /nyag ma gcig kyang g.yo bar mi nus so/ /me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad
dang / /drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug rnon yang / /gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jig mi 'gyur/ /thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ /'jigs par nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /de ni
'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na/ /mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ /tshangs bcas lha yang
rtag tu srung byed pa/ /mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /mi dbang bdag gi rgyud pa mthong nas ni/ /gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag sdug mod/ /chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang 'phrad nas ni/ /
don mi thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang dag smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa/ /'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang / /rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag /skyed cing bsod nams

ldan la rims nad bral/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus bdag gi rdzu 'phrul nyams te bdag rkang gis song nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang rgyal po

'phya bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig nas smras pa/ lha/ khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du dgongs pa skyes pa/ bdag gi rkang

gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te da ni/ rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gi /khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang / grong khyer byi dor byed du stsol cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /

dengs la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lam stor du chug la/ lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gi
khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de dag byos shig /ces dril sgrogs shig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /
gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag /dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bcangs/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng nas

lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya shes ldan dag nyon cig /drang srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas
phyir 'byung gi/ khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig/ de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs kyis

yongs su bskor ba dang / ser skya na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag du ma rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste grong khyer ser skya'i sgor byung nas

rgyal po slar bzlog ste ji ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang / de de la 'dzeg nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs
shig tu 'dug go/ de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal sos te bsam gtan bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang /
sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ 'on kyang phyir thu bar gyur to/ /de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas smras pa/ mkhan
po| bdag cag cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi'i ched dang / bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir lags na/ gal te mkhan pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/ bdud rtsi de las bdag
cag la yang bgos shig /des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi'i ched dang / bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir yin na/ kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ma

rtogs so/ /de lta mod kyi/ shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu gang yin pa des/ bdud rtsi 'di rtogs par 'gyur zhing / bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshim par byed par 'gyur gyi/ de'i drung du rab tu phyung

zhig /khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya/ rus brjod par mi bya/ bram ze'i khye'ur brjod par mi bya ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing / bdud rtsi rtogs
par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na/ /shar gyi phyogs su khyod 'dug
dang / /yang dag sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /'phrad pa'i

mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes smras te/ dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas wA ra NA sir song ste gnas so/ /

de de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ mis byin gyi rus ka t+ya na yin pas/ de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu/ ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon

par byang chub pa na spyan sngar 'gro bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+ya'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las
'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ni/ ka t+ya'i bu chen po/ ka t+ya'i bu chen po/ zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring
po ma lon par ma ma'i bang du bzhugs nas gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol ba na/ de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang /
dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang / des kyang ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas
pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na/ de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus so/ /de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams
na/ mi rung gi/ ma la bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas gzung ngo / /snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de
dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsam pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga
brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na/ gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ glang po che stong thub kyi/ de bas na/ gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /

bar sdom la/ khye'u dang rtsa mo dag dang ni/ /rig pa khang bzang dag dang ni/ /ngang pa mtshon cha dge ba'i snying / /dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpas shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga
brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par gtad nas/ yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di

ni/ ngas shes so/ /de nas des yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag kyang ngas shes kyi gzhan dag smros shig/ srin bu go
chas smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni/ yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi/ gzhan ni/ bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yi ge 'di'i ming
ci yin smros shig/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na/ yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ 'khor los
bsgyur ba'o/ /nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di shes pa ni/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon
par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ /byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags pa la/ nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas
dbang byas pas/ tshangs pa'i yi ge/ tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i zhang po bzang
len zhes bya ba des/ glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa bslab nas 'phong gi slob dpon lhar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa slob pa la zhugs pa na/ bzang len gyis lhar bcas la
smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin du gzhon nu gzhan dag ni/ snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad slobs shig/ lha sbyin 'di ni/ gdug pa'i las byed pa yin gyis/
'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur na mi rung gi/ 'di la gnang du bsnun pa ma ston cig/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la legs par bslab pas gnas lnga po
'di lta ste/ rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grags par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i phyogs kun tu sgra grags

pa/ shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis
glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsam pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de'i

mthus glang po rin po che 'di byung gi/ dong la de kho na la dbul lo/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis glang po rin po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las/ rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal

po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lhas sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas/ de des phrag dog chen po

skyes te/ de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang po che dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung

bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ /lhas sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re zhig 'khor los bsgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag de
la glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/ /ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ glang po che bzang po 'di sus
bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas sbyin gyis so/ /des bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la lhas sbyin gyis mthu sad kyi/ ma la bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o/ /snyam nas mjug ma
nas bzung ste dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar bya bar mtha' gcig tu bor ro/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de
rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /sus bsad/ lhas sbyin gyis so/ /mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin na/ ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /phyogs gang du bsad/
'o nir ro/ /'di sus 'dir khyer te 'ongs/ dga' bos so/ /des dgongs pa/ gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyi/ ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas
mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs bdun las bzlas te bor ro/ /de ltung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i gshong / glang po che'i gshong zhes
bya bar gyur to/ /der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do/ /'dir smras pa/ lhas
byin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/ /dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer/ /byang chub sems dpa'i phyag gis bar snang la/ /rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /gzhon nu rnams kyis
smras pa/ gcod pa byed du 'dong ngo / /zhes de rnams kyis phyir byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa byed du phyir byung ngo / /gzhon nu rnams
'bras rnga bzhin du gcod par byed de/ de rnams kyis shing bcad cing / bcad pa rnams kyis 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bre'i kha gcod pa bzhin du gcod par mdzad do/ /des
shing bcad cing / bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/ de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la
byang che zhes thos na/ 'di gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/ 'di bdag cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni/ ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de thams cad
ni/ 'gyel la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni/ de bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya
'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / bzo la byang ba ma shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyi/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam
nas/ des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas/ des shing de dag thams cad chems chems zer nas 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /de rnams tsha bas byed pa
la zhugs te/ de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag btsugs so/ /lhas byin gyis rkang thabs byas te lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyi shing ta la gcig
phigs so/ /dga' bos ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag las thal nas lcags kyi mda' de sa la zug pa klus
phyung ba dang / chu ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'thung bar brtsams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod
rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/ /gzhon nu rnams shing rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang / mtshan mkhan grong khyer
nas phyir byung ba de rnams kyis gzhon nu shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa la lung bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ gdon
mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes
te shAkya rnams bsags nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur
ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so/ /gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung ste/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/ bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling
bzhir mchi zhing 'dong gi/ 'di'i khyim phubs shig/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gzhon nu la
bud med thams cad bstan nas 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o/ /de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu ni/ sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la stsol du stsal la
de gang la dga' skyes bar 'gyur ba de chung mar blang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches spras pa'i phung po
spungs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang / grong khyer phyag dar dang byi dor byed du bcug nas rgyu skar dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dag bstun te gdan seng ge'i khri bshams pa la

gzhon nu shAkya thub pa bzhag nas seng ge'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te/ blon po rnams dang / gzhan yang / ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du
zhugs so/ /de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i cha byad dang / rgyan dang / gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan de dag
de rnams la byin no/ /shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba/ gzugs dang la tsho la bab pa de/ ma song nas shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang
chub sems dpa' rgyan sbyin gyi song zhig/ des smras pa/ yab/ ci/ 'o skol cag la rgyan ma mchis sam/ bu mo/ /med pa ni/ ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa
de gdam par mdzad do/ /yab/ 'dam yang rung / mi 'dam yang rung / de kho na bdag gi sdum thab lags so/ /bu mo/ gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas song
zhig /de nas grags 'dzin ma na tshod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/ bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid dang ldan
pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpas rgyan thams cad byin nas sor gdub rgya kho na lus pa byang chub sems dpas de la
bstan pa dang / de nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas pa des/ seng ge'i khri'i skas la 'dzeg nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nas rang gis phyung ngo / /blon po rnams
dang / ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ni/ bud med thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa yin te/ 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs
dang bstun par nus pas 'di blang bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang
gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar 'gyur te/ de nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye bar 'gyur la/ ji tsam nyi ma ma

shar ba de srid du ni/ sen mos kyang gcad du rung la/ nyi ma shar nas ni/ mtshon gyis kyang mi chod cing / mes kyang mi tshig pa zhig ser skya'i gzhi dang lhas bstan gyi bar na 'bab chu ro hi ka zhes bya ba'i
'gram na skyes te/ dus dus su chu brug pas de'i rtsa ba brus nas rlung gi shugs kyis 'gyel te gags bzhin du chu bcad de 'dug go/ de nas chus rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi yul ni/ chu med
bas ma rung la/ zas gtsang gi yang chus ma rung ste/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring pa/ shing dge ba'i snying po 'gyel nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i gags su gyur te mchis
na/ gzhon nu mthu dang ldan zhes thos kyi/ da gtang ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo gzhon nu la bka' mi stsol lo/ /'dun pas smras pa/ lha/ bdag la gnang ba 'ba'
zhig stsol cig dang / ci nas kyang gzhon nu la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so/ /'dun pas 'bab chu ro hi
ka'i 'gram du gzhon nu rnams kyi skyed mos tshal re re btsugs nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag /skyed mos tshal du 'dong / de rnams so so'i shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal du dong ba las/
lhas byin gyi skyed mos tshal gyi steng nas ngang pa zhig 'phur ba de/ lhas byin gyis mdas bsnun nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed mos tshal du ltung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bzung nas
mda' phyung ste sman gyis glan nas sos so/ /lhas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la spring pa/ ngang pa'o ni/ sngar ngas bzung ba yin gyi/ skur cig /byang chub sems
dpas slar spring pa/ ngas gang gi tshe kho na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe ngas sems can thams cad bzung ba yin no/ /der byang
chub sems dpa' dang lhas byin lhan cig srid pa tha ma la thog mar sha 'khon de byung ste/ srid pa gzhan rnams su ni/ phal mo che zhig kyang byung ngo / /legs par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnams
shing dge ba'i snying po dbyung ba'i phyir lhags so/ /zhes thos nas/ des skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngags te/ de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang / sgra mthon po grags nas byang chub
sems dpas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po sgra mthon po grags pa 'di ci zhig /'dun pas ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs
pa/ gal te de lta na/ 'byin du 'dong ngo / /zhes byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig dong ba dang / ji tsam na khung nas sprul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du
byung ba dang / 'char kas byang chub sems dpa' thal bar brlags su 'gyur du 'ong zhes mtshon rnon pos rked du bcad pa las/ de'i dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog pas 'char ka nag
bor gyur nas/ de'i ming 'char ka nag po/ 'char ka nag po/ zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis shing dge ba'i snying po 'byin pa la zhugs pa na/ lhas byin gyis 'bad pa dang cung
zad cig g.yos so/ /dga' bos ni/ cung zad cig bteg go/ byang chub sems dpas ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs te dum bu gnyis su chag nas 'bab chu ro hi
ka'i tshu rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig /pha rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig ltung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs la gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag /shing dge ba'i snying po
'di ni/ bsil ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang / shu ba dang / phol mig byung ba la byugs na/ zhi bar 'gyur gyi/ dum bu dum bur byos la khyer cig /gzhon nu rnams rang rang
gi shing rtar zhugs te skyed mos tshal gyi sa nas ser skya'i gzhir dong nas grong khyer du zhugs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs pa la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te 'di
lo bdun du rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba/ steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug
pa byang chub sems dpas gzigs so/ /gzigs ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthe bos shing rta mnan nas mi g.yo bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpas sa 'tsho ma la brtag par brtsams so//
sa 'tsho mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa 'tsho ma la rtog pa na phyag na lcags kyi mda' bsnams pa de phyir brlags so/ /sa 'tsho ma yang byang
chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na/ rkang pa'i mthe bos khang bzang gi gzhi brtol to/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dang sa 'tsho ma phan tshun du rtog par byed cing lhag pa'i
bsam pa skyes par gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ bud med 'di 'dra ba 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so/ /gtam de rgyal po zas gtsang gis
thos nas de 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha
lo sgyur ba la/ kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang
chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/ kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /lha/ bka'
bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song
nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha /bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyi/ lha/ de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ /phyam sgur po ltar kyar
kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo
sgyur ba/ mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ phyam sgur po ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba 'di
ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ni/ rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/

nga yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /

'di ltar/ nga pho brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas nga yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ dar yal rgas shing sgur la mgo
skya ba/ /lag na 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/ /'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gcang gis kha lo
sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ci/ gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga'am/ lha/ ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
na/ lha/ gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na/ mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ phyam sgur po ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing
mchi la/ de'i skra se ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/
sgur po/ phyam sgur po ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ 'di ni/ rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ mi
'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas/ lha/ de ni/ rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nga yang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /lha yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /de skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di lta pho brang du phyin nas

nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /lha/ gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/ de nas nga yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lha zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs

so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gi/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la
dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te/ ci nas kyang
'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ shAkya thub pa'i yab ste zas gtsang des/ /kha lo sgyur las tshig de thos nas ni/ /de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug
phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las yang byin no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/
kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo
sgyur pa la gsungs pa/ kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas/
byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams ta byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por
zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo/ rbab rbab po/ rid pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis
blta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so// sarba mang+ga laM// //
